02355     bnx2x_release_hw_lock(bp, HW_LOCK_RESOURCE_GPIO);
02356 
02357     return 0;
02358 }
02359 
02360 static int bnx2x_set_spio(struct bnx2x *bp, int spio_num, u32 mode)
02361 {
02362     u32 spio_mask = (1 << spio_num);
02363     u32 spio_reg;
02364 
02365     if ((spio_num < MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_4) ||
02366         (spio_num > MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_7)) {
02367         BNX2X_ERR("Invalid SPIO %d\n", spio_num);
02368         return -EINVAL;
02369     }
02370 
02371     bnx2x_acquire_hw_lock(bp, HW_LOCK_RESOURCE_SPIO);
02372     /* read SPIO and mask except the float bits */
02373     spio_reg = (REG_RD(bp, MISC_REG_SPIO) & MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_FLOAT);
02374 
02375     switch (mode) {
02376     case MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_OUTPUT_LOW:
02377         DP(NETIF_MSG_LINK, "Set SPIO %d -> output low\n", spio_num);
02378         /* clear FLOAT and set CLR */
02379         spio_reg &= ~(spio_mask << MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_FLOAT_POS);
02380         spio_reg |=  (spio_mask << MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_CLR_POS);
02381         break;
02382 
02383     case MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_OUTPUT_HIGH:
02384         DP(NETIF_MSG_LINK, "Set SPIO %d -> output high\n", spio_num);
02385         /* clear FLOAT and set SET */
02386         spio_reg &= ~(spio_mask << MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_FLOAT_POS);
02387         spio_reg |=  (spio_mask << MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_SET_POS);
02388         break;
02389 
02390     case MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_INPUT_HI_Z:
02391         DP(NETIF_MSG_LINK, "Set SPIO %d -> input\n", spio_num);
02392         /* set FLOAT */
02393         spio_reg |= (spio_mask << MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_FLOAT_POS);
02394         break;
02395 
02396     default:
02397         break;
02398     }
02399 
02400     REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_SPIO, spio_reg);
02401     bnx2x_release_hw_lock(bp, HW_LOCK_RESOURCE_SPIO);
02402 
02403     return 0;
02404 }
02405 
02406 static void bnx2x_calc_fc_adv(struct bnx2x *bp)
02407 {
02408     switch (bp->link_vars.ieee_fc &
02409         MDIO_COMBO_IEEE0_AUTO_NEG_ADV_PAUSE_MASK) {
02410     case MDIO_COMBO_IEEE0_AUTO_NEG_ADV_PAUSE_NONE:
02411         bp->port.advertising &= ~(ADVERTISED_Asym_Pause |
02412                       ADVERTISED_Pause);
02413         break;
02414 
02415     case MDIO_COMBO_IEEE0_AUTO_NEG_ADV_PAUSE_BOTH:
02416         bp->port.advertising |= (ADVERTISED_Asym_Pause |
02417                      ADVERTISED_Pause);
02418         break;
02419 
02420     case MDIO_COMBO_IEEE0_AUTO_NEG_ADV_PAUSE_ASYMMETRIC:
02421         bp->port.advertising |= ADVERTISED_Asym_Pause;
02422         break;
02423 
02424     default:
02425         bp->port.advertising &= ~(ADVERTISED_Asym_Pause |
02426                       ADVERTISED_Pause);
02427         break;
02428     }
02429 }
02430 
02431 static void bnx2x_link_report(struct bnx2x *bp)
02432 {
02433     if (bp->flags & MF_FUNC_DIS) {
02434         netif_carrier_off(bp->dev);
02435         printk(KERN_ERR PFX "%s NIC Link is Down\n", bp->dev->name);
02436         return;
02437     }
02438 
02439     if (bp->link_vars.link_up) {
02440         u16 line_speed;
02441 
02442         if (bp->state == BNX2X_STATE_OPEN)
02443             netif_carrier_on(bp->dev);
02444         printk(KERN_INFO PFX "%s NIC Link is Up, ", bp->dev->name);
02445 
02446         line_speed = bp->link_vars.line_speed;
02447         if (IS_E1HMF(bp)) {
02448             u16 vn_max_rate;
02449 
02450             vn_max_rate =
02451                 ((bp->mf_config & FUNC_MF_CFG_MAX_BW_MASK) >>
02452                  FUNC_MF_CFG_MAX_BW_SHIFT) * 100;
02453             if (vn_max_rate < line_speed)
02454                 line_speed = vn_max_rate;
02455         }
02456         printk("%d Mbps ", line_speed);
02457 
02458         if (bp->link_vars.duplex == DUPLEX_FULL)
02459             printk("full duplex");
02460         else
02461             printk("half duplex");
02462 
02463         if (bp->link_vars.flow_ctrl != BNX2X_FLOW_CTRL_NONE) {
02464             if (bp->link_vars.flow_ctrl & BNX2X_FLOW_CTRL_RX) {
02465                 printk(", receive ");
02466                 if (bp->link_vars.flow_ctrl &
02467                     BNX2X_FLOW_CTRL_TX)
02468                     printk("& transmit ");
02469             } else {
02470                 printk(", transmit ");
02471             }
02472             printk("flow control ON");
02473         }
02474         printk("\n");
02475 
02476     } else { /* link_down */
02477         netif_carrier_off(bp->dev);
02478         printk(KERN_ERR PFX "%s NIC Link is Down\n", bp->dev->name);
02479     }
02480 }
02481 
02482 static u8 bnx2x_initial_phy_init(struct bnx2x *bp, int load_mode)
02483 {
02484     if (!BP_NOMCP(bp)) {
02485         u8 rc;
02486 
02487         /* Initialize link parameters structure variables */
02488         /* It is recommended to turn off RX FC for jumbo frames
02489            for better performance */
02490         if (bp->dev->mtu > 5000)
02491             bp->link_params.req_fc_auto_adv = BNX2X_FLOW_CTRL_TX;
02492         else
02493             bp->link_params.req_fc_auto_adv = BNX2X_FLOW_CTRL_BOTH;
02494 
02495         bnx2x_acquire_phy_lock(bp);
02496 
02497         if (load_mode == LOAD_DIAG)
02498             bp->link_params.loopback_mode = LOOPBACK_XGXS_10;
02499 
02500         rc = bnx2x_phy_init(&bp->link_params, &bp->link_vars);
02501 
02502         bnx2x_release_phy_lock(bp);
02503 
02504         bnx2x_calc_fc_adv(bp);
02505 
02506         if (CHIP_REV_IS_SLOW(bp) && bp->link_vars.link_up) {
02507             bnx2x_stats_handle(bp, STATS_EVENT_LINK_UP);
02508             bnx2x_link_report(bp);
02509         }
02510 
02511         return rc;
02512     }
02513     BNX2X_ERR("Bootcode is missing - can not initialize link\n");
02514     return -EINVAL;
02515 }
02516 
02517 static void bnx2x_link_set(struct bnx2x *bp)
02518 {
02519     if (!BP_NOMCP(bp)) {
02520         bnx2x_acquire_phy_lock(bp);
02521         bnx2x_phy_init(&bp->link_params, &bp->link_vars);
02522         bnx2x_release_phy_lock(bp);
02523 
02524         bnx2x_calc_fc_adv(bp);
02525     } else
02526         BNX2X_ERR("Bootcode is missing - can not set link\n");
02527 }
02528 
02529 static void bnx2x__link_reset(struct bnx2x *bp)
02530 {
02531     if (!BP_NOMCP(bp)) {
02532         bnx2x_acquire_phy_lock(bp);
02533         bnx2x_link_reset(&bp->link_params, &bp->link_vars, 1);
02534         bnx2x_release_phy_lock(bp);
02535     } else
02536         BNX2X_ERR("Bootcode is missing - can not reset link\n");
02537 }
02538 
02539 static u8 bnx2x_link_test(struct bnx2x *bp)
02540 {
02541     u8 rc = 0;
02542 
02543     if (!BP_NOMCP(bp)) {
02544         bnx2x_acquire_phy_lock(bp);
02545         rc = bnx2x_test_link(&bp->link_params, &bp->link_vars);
02546         bnx2x_release_phy_lock(bp);
02547     } else
02548         BNX2X_ERR("Bootcode is missing - can not test link\n");
02549 
02550     return rc;
02551 }
02552 
02553 static void bnx2x_init_port_minmax(struct bnx2x *bp)
02554 {
02555     u32 r_param = bp->link_vars.line_speed / 8;
02556     u32 fair_periodic_timeout_usec;
02557     u32 t_fair;
02558 
02559     memset(&(bp->cmng.rs_vars), 0,
02560            sizeof(struct rate_shaping_vars_per_port));
02561     memset(&(bp->cmng.fair_vars), 0, sizeof(struct fairness_vars_per_port));
02562 
02563     /* 100 usec in SDM ticks = 25 since each tick is 4 usec */
02564     bp->cmng.rs_vars.rs_periodic_timeout = RS_PERIODIC_TIMEOUT_USEC / 4;
02565 
02566     /* this is the threshold below which no timer arming will occur
02567        1.25 coefficient is for the threshold to be a little bigger
02568        than the real time, to compensate for timer in-accuracy */
02569     bp->cmng.rs_vars.rs_threshold =
02570                 (RS_PERIODIC_TIMEOUT_USEC * r_param * 5) / 4;
02571 
02572     /* resolution of fairness timer */
02573     fair_periodic_timeout_usec = QM_ARB_BYTES / r_param;
02574     /* for 10G it is 1000usec. for 1G it is 10000usec. */
02575     t_fair = T_FAIR_COEF / bp->link_vars.line_speed;
02576 
02577     /* this is the threshold below which we won't arm the timer anymore */
02578     bp->cmng.fair_vars.fair_threshold = QM_ARB_BYTES;
02579 
02580     /* we multiply by 1e3/8 to get bytes/msec.
02581        We don't want the credits to pass a credit
02582        of the t_fair*FAIR_MEM (algorithm resolution) */
02583     bp->cmng.fair_vars.upper_bound = r_param * t_fair * FAIR_MEM;
02584     /* since each tick is 4 usec */
02585     bp->cmng.fair_vars.fairness_timeout = fair_periodic_timeout_usec / 4;
02586 }
02587 
02588 /* Calculates the sum of vn_min_rates.
02589    It's needed for further normalizing of the min_rates.
02590    Returns:
02591      sum of vn_min_rates.
02592        or
02593      0 - if all the min_rates are 0.
02594      In the later case fainess algorithm should be deactivated.
02595      If not all min_rates are zero then those that are zeroes will be set to 1.
02596  */
02597 static void bnx2x_calc_vn_weight_sum(struct bnx2x *bp)
02598 {
02599     int all_zero = 1;
02600     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
02601     int vn;
02602 
02603     bp->vn_weight_sum = 0;
02604     for (vn = VN_0; vn < E1HVN_MAX; vn++) {
02605         int func = 2*vn + port;
02606         u32 vn_cfg = SHMEM_RD(bp, mf_cfg.func_mf_config[func].config);
02607         u32 vn_min_rate = ((vn_cfg & FUNC_MF_CFG_MIN_BW_MASK) >>
02608                    FUNC_MF_CFG_MIN_BW_SHIFT) * 100;
02609 
02610         /* Skip hidden vns */
02611         if (vn_cfg & FUNC_MF_CFG_FUNC_HIDE)
02612             continue;
02613 
02614         /* If min rate is zero - set it to 1 */
02615         if (!vn_min_rate)
02616             vn_min_rate = DEF_MIN_RATE;
02617         else
02618             all_zero = 0;
02619 
02620         bp->vn_weight_sum += vn_min_rate;
02621     }
02622 
02623     /* ... only if all min rates are zeros - disable fairness */
02624     if (all_zero) {
02625         bp->cmng.flags.cmng_enables &=
02626                     ~CMNG_FLAGS_PER_PORT_FAIRNESS_VN;
02627         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "All MIN values are zeroes"
02628            "  fairness will be disabled\n");
02629     } else
02630         bp->cmng.flags.cmng_enables |=
02631                     CMNG_FLAGS_PER_PORT_FAIRNESS_VN;
02632 }
02633 
02634 static void bnx2x_init_vn_minmax(struct bnx2x *bp, int func)
02635 {
02636     struct rate_shaping_vars_per_vn m_rs_vn;
02637     struct fairness_vars_per_vn m_fair_vn;
02638     u32 vn_cfg = SHMEM_RD(bp, mf_cfg.func_mf_config[func].config);
02639     u16 vn_min_rate, vn_max_rate;
02640     int i;
02641 
02642     /* If function is hidden - set min and max to zeroes */
02643     if (vn_cfg & FUNC_MF_CFG_FUNC_HIDE) {
02644         vn_min_rate = 0;
02645         vn_max_rate = 0;
02646 
02647     } else {
02648         vn_min_rate = ((vn_cfg & FUNC_MF_CFG_MIN_BW_MASK) >>
02649                 FUNC_MF_CFG_MIN_BW_SHIFT) * 100;
02650         /* If min rate is zero - set it to 1 */
02651         if (!vn_min_rate)
02652             vn_min_rate = DEF_MIN_RATE;
02653         vn_max_rate = ((vn_cfg & FUNC_MF_CFG_MAX_BW_MASK) >>
02654                 FUNC_MF_CFG_MAX_BW_SHIFT) * 100;
02655     }
02656     DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP,
02657        "func %d: vn_min_rate %d  vn_max_rate %d  vn_weight_sum %d\n",
02658        func, vn_min_rate, vn_max_rate, bp->vn_weight_sum);
02659 
02660     memset(&m_rs_vn, 0, sizeof(struct rate_shaping_vars_per_vn));
02661     memset(&m_fair_vn, 0, sizeof(struct fairness_vars_per_vn));
02662 
02663     /* global vn counter - maximal Mbps for this vn */
02664     m_rs_vn.vn_counter.rate = vn_max_rate;
02665 
02666     /* quota - number of bytes transmitted in this period */
02667     m_rs_vn.vn_counter.quota =
02668                 (vn_max_rate * RS_PERIODIC_TIMEOUT_USEC) / 8;
02669 
02670     if (bp->vn_weight_sum) {
02671         /* credit for each period of the fairness algorithm:
02672            number of bytes in T_FAIR (the vn share the port rate).
02673            vn_weight_sum should not be larger than 10000, thus
02674            T_FAIR_COEF / (8 * vn_weight_sum) will always be greater
02675            than zero */
02676         m_fair_vn.vn_credit_delta =
02677             max_t(u32, (vn_min_rate * (T_FAIR_COEF /
02678                            (8 * bp->vn_weight_sum))),
02679                   (bp->cmng.fair_vars.fair_threshold * 2));
02680         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "m_fair_vn.vn_credit_delta %d\n",
02681            m_fair_vn.vn_credit_delta);
02682     }
02683 
02684     /* Store it to internal memory */
02685     for (i = 0; i < sizeof(struct rate_shaping_vars_per_vn)/4; i++)
02686         REG_WR(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM +
02687                XSTORM_RATE_SHAPING_PER_VN_VARS_OFFSET(func) + i * 4,
02688                ((u32 *)(&m_rs_vn))[i]);
02689 
02690     for (i = 0; i < sizeof(struct fairness_vars_per_vn)/4; i++)
02691         REG_WR(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM +
02692                XSTORM_FAIRNESS_PER_VN_VARS_OFFSET(func) + i * 4,
02693                ((u32 *)(&m_fair_vn))[i]);
02694 }
02695 
02696 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
02697 static void bnx2x_init_cos_credit(struct bnx2x *bp)
02698 {
02699     struct fairness_vars_per_vn m_fair_vn;
02700     int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
02701     int i, cos;
02702 
02703     memset(&m_fair_vn, 0, sizeof(struct fairness_vars_per_vn));
02704 
02705     for (cos = 0; cos < BNX2X_MAX_COS; cos++) {
02706         if (bp->cos_min_rate[cos]) {
02707             m_fair_vn.cos_credit_delta[cos] =
02708             max_t(u32, (bp->cos_min_rate[cos] *
02709                     (T_FAIR_COEF / (8 * bp->cos_weight_sum))),
02710                   (bp->cmng.fair_vars.fair_threshold * 2));
02711         }
02712         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "cos_credit_delta[%d] = %d\n",
02713            cos, m_fair_vn.cos_credit_delta[cos]);
02714     }
02715 
02716     for (i = 0; i < sizeof(struct fairness_vars_per_vn)/4; i++)
02717         REG_WR(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM +
02718                XSTORM_FAIRNESS_PER_VN_VARS_OFFSET(func) + i * 4,
02719                ((u32 *)(&m_fair_vn))[i]);
02720 }
02721 #endif
02722 
02723 /* This function is called upon link interrupt */
02724 static void bnx2x_link_attn(struct bnx2x *bp)
02725 {
02726     u32 prev_link_status = bp->link_vars.link_status;
02727     /* Make sure that we are synced with the current statistics */
02728     bnx2x_stats_handle(bp, STATS_EVENT_STOP);
02729     
02730     bnx2x_link_update(&bp->link_params, &bp->link_vars);
02731 
02732     if (bp->link_vars.link_up) {
02733 
02734         /* dropless flow control */
02735         if (CHIP_IS_E1H(bp) && bp->dropless_fc) {
02736             int port = BP_PORT(bp);
02737             u32 pause_enabled = 0;
02738 
02739 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC
02740             if ((bp->link_vars.flow_ctrl & BNX2X_FLOW_CTRL_TX) ||
02741                 (bp->flags & SAFC_TX_FLAG))
02742 #else /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
02743             if (bp->link_vars.flow_ctrl & BNX2X_FLOW_CTRL_TX)
02744 #endif
02745                 pause_enabled = 1;
02746 
02747             REG_WR(bp, BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM +
02748                    USTORM_ETH_PAUSE_ENABLED_OFFSET(port),
02749                    pause_enabled);
02750         }
02751 
02752         if (bp->link_vars.mac_type == MAC_TYPE_BMAC) {
02753             struct host_port_stats *pstats;
02754 
02755             pstats = bnx2x_sp(bp, port_stats);
02756             /* reset old bmac stats */
02757             memset(&(pstats->mac_stx[0]), 0,
02758                    sizeof(struct mac_stx));
02759         }
02760         if (bp->state == BNX2X_STATE_OPEN)
02761             bnx2x_stats_handle(bp, STATS_EVENT_LINK_UP);
02762     }
02763 
02764     /* indicate link status only if link status actually changed */
02765     if (prev_link_status != bp->link_vars.link_status)
02766         bnx2x_link_report(bp);
02767 
02768     if (IS_E1HMF(bp)) {
02769         int port = BP_PORT(bp);
02770         int func;
02771         int vn;
02772 
02773         /* Set the attention towards other drivers on the same port */
02774         for (vn = VN_0; vn < E1HVN_MAX; vn++) {
02775             if (vn == BP_E1HVN(bp))
02776                 continue;
02777 
02778             func = ((vn << 1) | port);
02779             REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_GENERAL_ATTN_0 +
02780                    (LINK_SYNC_ATTENTION_BIT_FUNC_0 + func)*4, 1);
02781         }
02782 
02783         if (bp->link_vars.link_up) {
02784             int i;
02785 
02786             /* Init rate shaping and fairness contexts */
02787             bnx2x_init_port_minmax(bp);
02788 
02789             for (vn = VN_0; vn < E1HVN_MAX; vn++)
02790                 bnx2x_init_vn_minmax(bp, 2*vn + port);
02791 
02792             /* Store it to internal memory */
02793             for (i = 0;
02794                  i < sizeof(struct cmng_struct_per_port) / 4; i++)
02795                 REG_WR(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM +
02796                   XSTORM_CMNG_PER_PORT_VARS_OFFSET(port) + i*4,
02797                        ((u32 *)(&bp->cmng))[i]);
02798         }
02799 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
02800     } else {
02801         if (bp->link_vars.link_up && bp->cos_weight_sum) {
02802             int port = BP_PORT(bp);
02803             int i;
02804 
02805             /* Init fairness context */
02806             bnx2x_init_port_minmax(bp);
02807 
02808             bnx2x_init_cos_credit(bp);
02809 
02810             /* Store it to internal memory */
02811             for (i = 0;
02812                  i < sizeof(struct cmng_struct_per_port) / 4; i++)
02813                 REG_WR(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM +
02814                   XSTORM_CMNG_PER_PORT_VARS_OFFSET(port) + i*4,
02815                        ((u32 *)(&bp->cmng))[i]);
02816         }
02817 #endif
02818     }
02819 }
02820 
02821 static void bnx2x__link_status_update(struct bnx2x *bp)
02822 {
02823     if ((bp->state != BNX2X_STATE_OPEN) || (bp->flags & MF_FUNC_DIS))
02824         return;
02825 
02826     bnx2x_link_status_update(&bp->link_params, &bp->link_vars);
02827 
02828     if (bp->link_vars.link_up)
02829         bnx2x_stats_handle(bp, STATS_EVENT_LINK_UP);
02830     else
02831         bnx2x_stats_handle(bp, STATS_EVENT_STOP);
02832 
02833     bnx2x_calc_vn_weight_sum(bp);
02834 
02835     /* indicate link status */
02836     bnx2x_link_report(bp);
02837 }
02838 
02839 static void bnx2x_pmf_update(struct bnx2x *bp)
02840 {
02841     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
02842     u32 val;
02843 
02844     bp->port.pmf = 1;
02845     DP(NETIF_MSG_LINK, "pmf %d\n", bp->port.pmf);
02846 
02847     /* enable nig attention */
02848     val = (0xff0f | (1 << (BP_E1HVN(bp) + 4)));
02849     REG_WR(bp, HC_REG_TRAILING_EDGE_0 + port*8, val);
02850     REG_WR(bp, HC_REG_LEADING_EDGE_0 + port*8, val);
02851 
02852     bnx2x_stats_handle(bp, STATS_EVENT_PMF);
02853 }
02854 
02855 /* end of Link */
02856 
02857 /* slow path */
02858 
02859 /*
02860  * General service functions
02861  */
02862 
02863 /* send the MCP a request, block until there is a reply */
02864 u32 bnx2x_fw_command(struct bnx2x *bp, u32 command)
02865 {
02866     int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
02867     u32 seq = ++bp->fw_seq;
02868     u32 rc = 0;
02869     u32 cnt = 1;
02870     u8 delay = CHIP_REV_IS_SLOW(bp) ? 100 : 10;
02871 
02872     mutex_lock(&bp->fw_mb_mutex);
02873     SHMEM_WR(bp, func_mb[func].drv_mb_header, (command | seq));
02874     DP(BNX2X_MSG_MCP, "wrote command (%x) to FW MB\n", (command | seq));
02875 
02876     do {
02877         /* let the FW do it's magic ... */
02878         msleep(delay);
02879 
02880         rc = SHMEM_RD(bp, func_mb[func].fw_mb_header);
02881 
02882         /* Give the FW up to 5 second (500*10ms) */
02883     } while ((seq != (rc & FW_MSG_SEQ_NUMBER_MASK)) && (cnt++ < 500));
02884 
02885     DP(BNX2X_MSG_MCP, "[after %d ms] read (%x) seq is (%x) from FW MB\n",
02886        cnt*delay, rc, seq);
02887 
02888     /* is this a reply to our command? */
02889     if (seq == (rc & FW_MSG_SEQ_NUMBER_MASK))
02890         rc &= FW_MSG_CODE_MASK;
02891     else {
02892         /* FW BUG! */
02893         BNX2X_ERR("FW failed to respond!\n");
02894         bnx2x_fw_dump(bp);
02895         rc = 0;
02896     }
02897     mutex_unlock(&bp->fw_mb_mutex);
02898 
02899     return rc;
02900 }
02901 
02902 static void bnx2x_set_eth_mac_addr_e1h(struct bnx2x *bp, int set);
02903 static void bnx2x_set_rx_mode(struct net_device *dev);
02904 
02905 static void bnx2x_e1h_disable(struct bnx2x *bp)
02906 {
02907     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
02908 
02909     netif_tx_disable(bp->dev);
02910 #if (LINUX_VERSION_CODE < 0x02061f) /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
02911     /* In kernels starting from 2.6.31 netdev layer does this */
02912     bp->dev->trans_start = jiffies; /* prevent tx timeout */
02913 #endif
02914 
02915     REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_LLH0_FUNC_EN + port*8, 0);
02916 
02917     netif_carrier_off(bp->dev);
02918 }
02919 
02920 static void bnx2x_e1h_enable(struct bnx2x *bp)
02921 {
02922     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
02923 
02924     REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_LLH0_FUNC_EN + port*8, 1);
02925 
02926     /* Tx queue should be only reenabled */
02927     netif_tx_wake_all_queues(bp->dev);
02928 
02929     /*
02930      * Should not call netif_carrier_on since it will be called if the link
02931      * is up when checking for link state
02932      */
02933 }
02934 
02935 static void bnx2x_update_min_max(struct bnx2x *bp)
02936 {
02937     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
02938     int vn, i;
02939 
02940     /* Init rate shaping and fairness contexts */
02941     bnx2x_init_port_minmax(bp);
02942 
02943     bnx2x_calc_vn_weight_sum(bp);
02944 
02945     for (vn = VN_0; vn < E1HVN_MAX; vn++)
02946         bnx2x_init_vn_minmax(bp, 2*vn + port);
02947 
02948     if (bp->port.pmf) {
02949         int func;
02950 
02951         /* Set the attention towards other drivers on the same port */
02952         for (vn = VN_0; vn < E1HVN_MAX; vn++) {
02953             if (vn == BP_E1HVN(bp))
02954                 continue;
02955 
02956             func = ((vn << 1) | port);
02957             REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_GENERAL_ATTN_0 +
02958                    (LINK_SYNC_ATTENTION_BIT_FUNC_0 + func)*4, 1);
02959         }
02960 
02961         /* Store it to internal memory */
02962         for (i = 0; i < sizeof(struct cmng_struct_per_port) / 4; i++)
02963             REG_WR(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM +
02964                    XSTORM_CMNG_PER_PORT_VARS_OFFSET(port) + i*4,
02965                    ((u32 *)(&bp->cmng))[i]);
02966     }
02967 }
02968 
02969 static void bnx2x_dcc_event(struct bnx2x *bp, u32 dcc_event)
02970 {
02971     DP(BNX2X_MSG_MCP, "dcc_event 0x%x\n", dcc_event);
02972 
02973     if (dcc_event & DRV_STATUS_DCC_DISABLE_ENABLE_PF) {
02974 
02975         /*
02976          * This is the only place besides the function initialization
02977          * where the bp->flags can change so it is done without any
02978          * locks
02979          */
02980         if (bp->mf_config & FUNC_MF_CFG_FUNC_DISABLED) {
02981             DP(NETIF_MSG_IFDOWN, "mf_cfg function disabled\n");
02982             bp->flags |= MF_FUNC_DIS;
02983 
02984             bnx2x_e1h_disable(bp);
02985         } else {
02986             DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "mf_cfg function enabled\n");
02987             bp->flags &= ~MF_FUNC_DIS;
02988 
02989             bnx2x_e1h_enable(bp);
02990         }
02991         dcc_event &= ~DRV_STATUS_DCC_DISABLE_ENABLE_PF;
02992     }
02993     if (dcc_event & DRV_STATUS_DCC_BANDWIDTH_ALLOCATION) {
02994 
02995         bnx2x_update_min_max(bp);
02996         dcc_event &= ~DRV_STATUS_DCC_BANDWIDTH_ALLOCATION;
02997     }
02998 
02999     /* Report results to MCP */
03000     if (dcc_event)
03001         bnx2x_fw_command(bp, DRV_MSG_CODE_DCC_FAILURE);
03002     else
03003         bnx2x_fw_command(bp, DRV_MSG_CODE_DCC_OK);
03004 }
03005 
03006 /* must be called under the spq lock */
03007 static inline struct eth_spe *bnx2x_sp_get_next(struct bnx2x *bp)
03008 {
03009     struct eth_spe *next_spe = bp->spq_prod_bd;
03010 
03011     if (bp->spq_prod_bd == bp->spq_last_bd) {
03012         bp->spq_prod_bd = bp->spq;
03013         bp->spq_prod_idx = 0;
03014         DP(NETIF_MSG_TIMER, "end of spq\n");
03015     } else {
03016         bp->spq_prod_bd++;
03017         bp->spq_prod_idx++;
03018     }
03019     return next_spe;
03020 }
03021 
03022 /* must be called under the spq lock */
03023 static inline void bnx2x_sp_prod_update(struct bnx2x *bp)
03024 {
03025     int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
03026 
03027     /* Make sure that BD data is updated before writing the producer */
03028     wmb();
03029 
03030     REG_WR(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM + XSTORM_SPQ_PROD_OFFSET(func),
03031            bp->spq_prod_idx);
03032     mmiowb();
03033 }
03034 
03035 /* the slow path queue is odd since completions arrive on the fastpath ring */
03036 int bnx2x_sp_post(struct bnx2x *bp, int command, int cid,
03037           u32 data_hi, u32 data_lo, int common)
03038 {
03039     struct eth_spe *spe;
03040 
03041 #ifdef BNX2X_STOP_ON_ERROR
03042     if (unlikely(bp->panic))
03043         return -EIO;
03044 #endif
03045 
03046     spin_lock_bh(&bp->spq_lock);
03047 
03048     if (!bp->spq_left) {
03049         BNX2X_ERR("BUG! SPQ ring full!\n");
03050         spin_unlock_bh(&bp->spq_lock);
03051         bnx2x_panic();
03052         return -EBUSY;
03053     }
03054 
03055     spe = bnx2x_sp_get_next(bp);
03056 
03057     /* CID needs port number to be encoded int it */
03058     spe->hdr.conn_and_cmd_data =
03059             cpu_to_le32((command << SPE_HDR_CMD_ID_SHIFT) |
03060                     HW_CID(bp, cid));
03061     spe->hdr.type = cpu_to_le16(ETH_CONNECTION_TYPE);
03062     if (common)
03063         spe->hdr.type |=
03064             cpu_to_le16((1 << SPE_HDR_COMMON_RAMROD_SHIFT));
03065     spe->data.mac_config_addr.hi = cpu_to_le32(data_hi);
03066     spe->data.mac_config_addr.lo = cpu_to_le32(data_lo);
03067 
03068     bp->spq_left--;
03069 
03070     DP(BNX2X_MSG_SP/*NETIF_MSG_TIMER*/,
03071        "SPQE[%x] (%x:%x)  command %d  hw_cid %x  data (%x:%x)  left %x\n",
03072        bp->spq_prod_idx, (u32)U64_HI(bp->spq_mapping),
03073        (u32)(U64_LO(bp->spq_mapping) +
03074        (void *)bp->spq_prod_bd - (void *)bp->spq), command,
03075        HW_CID(bp, cid), data_hi, data_lo, bp->spq_left);
03076 
03077     bnx2x_sp_prod_update(bp);
03078     spin_unlock_bh(&bp->spq_lock);
03079     return 0;
03080 }
03081 
03082 /* acquire split MCP access lock register */
03083 static int bnx2x_acquire_alr(struct bnx2x *bp)
03084 {
03085     u32 i, j, val;
03086     int rc = 0;
03087 
03088     might_sleep();
03089     i = 100;
03090     for (j = 0; j < i*10; j++) {
03091         val = (1UL << 31);
03092         REG_WR(bp, GRCBASE_MCP + 0x9c, val);
03093         val = REG_RD(bp, GRCBASE_MCP + 0x9c);
03094         if (val & (1L << 31))
03095             break;
03096 
03097         msleep(5);
03098     }
03099     if (!(val & (1L << 31))) {
03100         BNX2X_ERR("Cannot acquire MCP access lock register\n");
03101         rc = -EBUSY;
03102     }
03103 
03104     return rc;
03105 }
03106 
03107 /* release split MCP access lock register */
03108 static void bnx2x_release_alr(struct bnx2x *bp)
03109 {
03110     u32 val = 0;
03111 
03112     REG_WR(bp, GRCBASE_MCP + 0x9c, val);
03113 }
03114 
03115 static inline u16 bnx2x_update_dsb_idx(struct bnx2x *bp)
03116 {
03117     struct host_def_status_block *def_sb = bp->def_status_blk;
03118     u16 rc = 0;
03119 
03120     barrier(); /* status block is written to by the chip */
03121     if (bp->def_att_idx != def_sb->atten_status_block.attn_bits_index) {
03122         bp->def_att_idx = def_sb->atten_status_block.attn_bits_index;
03123         rc |= 1;
03124     }
03125     if (bp->def_c_idx != def_sb->c_def_status_block.status_block_index) {
03126         bp->def_c_idx = def_sb->c_def_status_block.status_block_index;
03127         rc |= 2;
03128     }
03129     if (bp->def_u_idx != def_sb->u_def_status_block.status_block_index) {
03130         bp->def_u_idx = def_sb->u_def_status_block.status_block_index;
03131         rc |= 4;
03132     }
03133     if (bp->def_x_idx != def_sb->x_def_status_block.status_block_index) {
03134         bp->def_x_idx = def_sb->x_def_status_block.status_block_index;
03135         rc |= 8;
03136     }
03137     if (bp->def_t_idx != def_sb->t_def_status_block.status_block_index) {
03138         bp->def_t_idx = def_sb->t_def_status_block.status_block_index;
03139         rc |= 16;
03140     }
03141     return rc;
03142 }
03143 
03144 /*
03145  * slow path service functions
03146  */
03147 
03148 static void bnx2x_attn_int_asserted(struct bnx2x *bp, u32 asserted)
03149 {
03150     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
03151     u32 hc_addr = (HC_REG_COMMAND_REG + port*32 +
03152                COMMAND_REG_ATTN_BITS_SET);
03153     u32 aeu_addr = port ? MISC_REG_AEU_MASK_ATTN_FUNC_1 :
03154                   MISC_REG_AEU_MASK_ATTN_FUNC_0;
03155     u32 nig_int_mask_addr = port ? NIG_REG_MASK_INTERRUPT_PORT1 :
03156                        NIG_REG_MASK_INTERRUPT_PORT0;
03157     u32 aeu_mask;
03158     u32 nig_mask = 0;
03159 
03160     if (bp->attn_state & asserted)
03161         BNX2X_ERR("IGU ERROR\n");
03162 
03163     bnx2x_acquire_hw_lock(bp, HW_LOCK_RESOURCE_PORT0_ATT_MASK + port);
03164     aeu_mask = REG_RD(bp, aeu_addr);
03165 
03166     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "aeu_mask %x  newly asserted %x\n",
03167        aeu_mask, asserted);
03168     aeu_mask &= ~(asserted & 0xff);
03169     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "new mask %x\n", aeu_mask);
03170 
03171     REG_WR(bp, aeu_addr, aeu_mask);
03172     bnx2x_release_hw_lock(bp, HW_LOCK_RESOURCE_PORT0_ATT_MASK + port);
03173 
03174     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "attn_state %x\n", bp->attn_state);
03175     bp->attn_state |= asserted;
03176     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "new state %x\n", bp->attn_state);
03177 
03178     if (asserted & ATTN_HARD_WIRED_MASK) {
03179         if (asserted & ATTN_NIG_FOR_FUNC) {
03180 
03181             bnx2x_acquire_phy_lock(bp);
03182 
03183             /* save nig interrupt mask */
03184             nig_mask = REG_RD(bp, nig_int_mask_addr);
03185             REG_WR(bp, nig_int_mask_addr, 0);
03186 
03187             bnx2x_link_attn(bp);
03188 
03189             /* handle unicore attn? */
03190         }
03191         if (asserted & ATTN_SW_TIMER_4_FUNC)
03192             DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "ATTN_SW_TIMER_4_FUNC!\n");
03193 
03194         if (asserted & GPIO_2_FUNC)
03195             DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "GPIO_2_FUNC!\n");
03196 
03197         if (asserted & GPIO_3_FUNC)
03198             DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "GPIO_3_FUNC!\n");
03199 
03200         if (asserted & GPIO_4_FUNC)
03201             DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "GPIO_4_FUNC!\n");
03202 
03203         if (port == 0) {
03204             if (asserted & ATTN_GENERAL_ATTN_1) {
03205                 DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "ATTN_GENERAL_ATTN_1!\n");
03206                 REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_GENERAL_ATTN_1, 0x0);
03207             }
03208             if (asserted & ATTN_GENERAL_ATTN_2) {
03209                 DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "ATTN_GENERAL_ATTN_2!\n");
03210                 REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_GENERAL_ATTN_2, 0x0);
03211             }
03212             if (asserted & ATTN_GENERAL_ATTN_3) {
03213                 DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "ATTN_GENERAL_ATTN_3!\n");
03214                 REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_GENERAL_ATTN_3, 0x0);
03215             }
03216         } else {
03217             if (asserted & ATTN_GENERAL_ATTN_4) {
03218                 DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "ATTN_GENERAL_ATTN_4!\n");
03219                 REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_GENERAL_ATTN_4, 0x0);
03220             }
03221             if (asserted & ATTN_GENERAL_ATTN_5) {
03222                 DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "ATTN_GENERAL_ATTN_5!\n");
03223                 REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_GENERAL_ATTN_5, 0x0);
03224             }
03225             if (asserted & ATTN_GENERAL_ATTN_6) {
03226                 DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "ATTN_GENERAL_ATTN_6!\n");
03227                 REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_GENERAL_ATTN_6, 0x0);
03228             }
03229         }
03230 
03231     } /* if hardwired */
03232 
03233     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "about to mask 0x%08x at HC addr 0x%x\n",
03234        asserted, hc_addr);
03235     REG_WR(bp, hc_addr, asserted);
03236 
03237     /* now set back the mask */
03238     if (asserted & ATTN_NIG_FOR_FUNC) {
03239         REG_WR(bp, nig_int_mask_addr, nig_mask);
03240         bnx2x_release_phy_lock(bp);
03241     }
03242 }
03243 
03244 static inline void bnx2x_fan_failure(struct bnx2x *bp)
03245 {
03246     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
03247 
03248     /* mark the failure */
03249     bp->link_params.ext_phy_config &= ~PORT_HW_CFG_XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE_MASK;
03250     bp->link_params.ext_phy_config |= PORT_HW_CFG_XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE_FAILURE;
03251     SHMEM_WR(bp, dev_info.port_hw_config[port].external_phy_config,
03252          bp->link_params.ext_phy_config);
03253 
03254     /* log the failure */
03255     printk(KERN_ERR PFX "Fan Failure on Network Controller %s has caused"
03256            " the driver to shutdown the card to prevent permanent"
03257            " damage.  Please contact OEM Support for assistance\n",
03258            bp->dev->name);
03259 }
03260 
03261 static inline void bnx2x_attn_int_deasserted0(struct bnx2x *bp, u32 attn)
03262 {
03263     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
03264     int reg_offset;
03265     u32 val, swap_val, swap_override;
03266 
03267     reg_offset = (port ? MISC_REG_AEU_ENABLE1_FUNC_1_OUT_0 :
03268                  MISC_REG_AEU_ENABLE1_FUNC_0_OUT_0);
03269 
03270     if (attn & AEU_INPUTS_ATTN_BITS_SPIO5) {
03271 
03272         val = REG_RD(bp, reg_offset);
03273         val &= ~AEU_INPUTS_ATTN_BITS_SPIO5;
03274         REG_WR(bp, reg_offset, val);
03275 
03276         BNX2X_ERR("SPIO5 hw attention\n");
03277 
03278         /* Fan failure attention */
03279         switch (XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE(bp->link_params.ext_phy_config)) {
03280         case PORT_HW_CFG_XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE_SFX7101:
03281             /* Low power mode is controlled by GPIO 2 */
03282             bnx2x_set_gpio(bp, MISC_REGISTERS_GPIO_2,
03283                        MISC_REGISTERS_GPIO_OUTPUT_LOW, port);
03284             /* The PHY reset is controlled by GPIO 1 */
03285             bnx2x_set_gpio(bp, MISC_REGISTERS_GPIO_1,
03286                        MISC_REGISTERS_GPIO_OUTPUT_LOW, port);
03287             break;
03288 
03289         case PORT_HW_CFG_XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE_BCM8727:
03290             /* The PHY reset is controlled by GPIO 1 */
03291             /* fake the port number to cancel the swap done in
03292                set_gpio() */
03293             swap_val = REG_RD(bp, NIG_REG_PORT_SWAP);
03294             swap_override = REG_RD(bp, NIG_REG_STRAP_OVERRIDE);
03295             port = (swap_val && swap_override) ^ 1;
03296             bnx2x_set_gpio(bp, MISC_REGISTERS_GPIO_1,
03297                        MISC_REGISTERS_GPIO_OUTPUT_LOW, port);
03298             break;
03299 
03300         default:
03301             break;
03302         }
03303         bnx2x_fan_failure(bp);
03304     }
03305 
03306     if (attn & (AEU_INPUTS_ATTN_BITS_GPIO3_FUNCTION_0 |
03307             AEU_INPUTS_ATTN_BITS_GPIO3_FUNCTION_1)) {
03308         bnx2x_acquire_phy_lock(bp);
03309         bnx2x_handle_module_detect_int(&bp->link_params);
03310         bnx2x_release_phy_lock(bp);
03311     }
03312 
03313     if (attn & HW_INTERRUT_ASSERT_SET_0) {
03314 
03315         val = REG_RD(bp, reg_offset);
03316         val &= ~(attn & HW_INTERRUT_ASSERT_SET_0);
03317         REG_WR(bp, reg_offset, val);
03318 
03319         BNX2X_ERR("FATAL HW block attention set0 0x%x\n",
03320               (u32)(attn & HW_INTERRUT_ASSERT_SET_0));
03321         bnx2x_panic();
03322     }
03323 }
03324 
03325 static inline void bnx2x_attn_int_deasserted1(struct bnx2x *bp, u32 attn)
03326 {
03327     u32 val;
03328 
03329     if (attn & AEU_INPUTS_ATTN_BITS_DOORBELLQ_HW_INTERRUPT) {
03330 
03331         val = REG_RD(bp, DORQ_REG_DORQ_INT_STS_CLR);
03332         BNX2X_ERR("DB hw attention 0x%x\n", val);
03333         /* DORQ discard attention */
03334         if (val & 0x2)
03335             BNX2X_ERR("FATAL error from DORQ\n");
03336     }
03337 
03338     if (attn & HW_INTERRUT_ASSERT_SET_1) {
03339 
03340         int port = BP_PORT(bp);
03341         int reg_offset;
03342 
03343         reg_offset = (port ? MISC_REG_AEU_ENABLE1_FUNC_1_OUT_1 :
03344                      MISC_REG_AEU_ENABLE1_FUNC_0_OUT_1);
03345 
03346         val = REG_RD(bp, reg_offset);
03347         val &= ~(attn & HW_INTERRUT_ASSERT_SET_1);
03348         REG_WR(bp, reg_offset, val);
03349 
03350         BNX2X_ERR("FATAL HW block attention set1 0x%x\n",
03351               (u32)(attn & HW_INTERRUT_ASSERT_SET_1));
03352         bnx2x_panic();
03353     }
03354 }
03355 
03356 static inline void bnx2x_attn_int_deasserted2(struct bnx2x *bp, u32 attn)
03357 {
03358     u32 val;
03359 
03360     if (attn & AEU_INPUTS_ATTN_BITS_CFC_HW_INTERRUPT) {
03361 
03362         val = REG_RD(bp, CFC_REG_CFC_INT_STS_CLR);
03363         BNX2X_ERR("CFC hw attention 0x%x\n", val);
03364         /* CFC error attention */
03365         if (val & 0x2)
03366             BNX2X_ERR("FATAL error from CFC\n");
03367     }
03368 
03369     if (attn & AEU_INPUTS_ATTN_BITS_PXP_HW_INTERRUPT) {
03370 
03371         val = REG_RD(bp, PXP_REG_PXP_INT_STS_CLR_0);
03372         BNX2X_ERR("PXP hw attention 0x%x\n", val);
03373         /* RQ_USDMDP_FIFO_OVERFLOW */
03374         if (val & 0x18000)
03375             BNX2X_ERR("FATAL error from PXP\n");
03376     }
03377 
03378     if (attn & HW_INTERRUT_ASSERT_SET_2) {
03379 
03380         int port = BP_PORT(bp);
03381         int reg_offset;
03382 
03383         reg_offset = (port ? MISC_REG_AEU_ENABLE1_FUNC_1_OUT_2 :
03384                      MISC_REG_AEU_ENABLE1_FUNC_0_OUT_2);
03385 
03386         val = REG_RD(bp, reg_offset);
03387         val &= ~(attn & HW_INTERRUT_ASSERT_SET_2);
03388         REG_WR(bp, reg_offset, val);
03389 
03390         BNX2X_ERR("FATAL HW block attention set2 0x%x\n",
03391               (u32)(attn & HW_INTERRUT_ASSERT_SET_2));
03392         bnx2x_panic();
03393     }
03394 }
03395 
03396 static inline void bnx2x_attn_int_deasserted3(struct bnx2x *bp, u32 attn)
03397 {
03398     u32 val;
03399 
03400     if (attn & EVEREST_GEN_ATTN_IN_USE_MASK) {
03401 
03402         if (attn & BNX2X_PMF_LINK_ASSERT) {
03403             int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
03404 
03405             REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_GENERAL_ATTN_12 + func*4, 0);
03406             bp->mf_config = SHMEM_RD(bp,
03407                        mf_cfg.func_mf_config[func].config);
03408             val = SHMEM_RD(bp, func_mb[func].drv_status);
03409             if (val & DRV_STATUS_DCC_EVENT_MASK)
03410                 bnx2x_dcc_event(bp,
03411                         (val & DRV_STATUS_DCC_EVENT_MASK));
03412             bnx2x__link_status_update(bp);
03413             if ((bp->port.pmf == 0) && (val & DRV_STATUS_PMF))
03414                 bnx2x_pmf_update(bp);
03415 
03416         } else if (attn & BNX2X_MC_ASSERT_BITS) {
03417 
03418             BNX2X_ERR("MC assert!\n");
03419             REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_GENERAL_ATTN_10, 0);
03420             REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_GENERAL_ATTN_9, 0);
03421             REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_GENERAL_ATTN_8, 0);
03422             REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_GENERAL_ATTN_7, 0);
03423             bnx2x_panic();
03424 
03425         } else if (attn & BNX2X_MCP_ASSERT) {
03426 
03427             BNX2X_ERR("MCP assert!\n");
03428             REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_GENERAL_ATTN_11, 0);
03429             bnx2x_fw_dump(bp);
03430 
03431         } else
03432             BNX2X_ERR("Unknown HW assert! (attn 0x%x)\n", attn);
03433     }
03434 
03435     if (attn & EVEREST_LATCHED_ATTN_IN_USE_MASK) {
03436         BNX2X_ERR("LATCHED attention 0x%08x (masked)\n", attn);
03437         if (attn & BNX2X_GRC_TIMEOUT) {
03438             val = CHIP_IS_E1H(bp) ?
03439                 REG_RD(bp, MISC_REG_GRC_TIMEOUT_ATTN) : 0;
03440             BNX2X_ERR("GRC time-out 0x%08x\n", val);
03441         }
03442         if (attn & BNX2X_GRC_RSV) {
03443             val = CHIP_IS_E1H(bp) ?
03444                 REG_RD(bp, MISC_REG_GRC_RSV_ATTN) : 0;
03445             BNX2X_ERR("GRC reserved 0x%08x\n", val);
03446         }
03447         REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_CLR_LATCH_SIGNAL, 0x7ff);
03448     }
03449 }
03450 
03451 static void bnx2x_attn_int_deasserted(struct bnx2x *bp, u32 deasserted)
03452 {
03453     struct attn_route attn;
03454     struct attn_route group_mask;
03455     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
03456     int index;
03457     u32 reg_addr;
03458     u32 val;
03459     u32 aeu_mask;
03460 
03461     /* need to take HW lock because MCP or other port might also
03462        try to handle this event */
03463     bnx2x_acquire_alr(bp);
03464 
03465     attn.sig[0] = REG_RD(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_AFTER_INVERT_1_FUNC_0 + port*4);
03466     attn.sig[1] = REG_RD(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_AFTER_INVERT_2_FUNC_0 + port*4);
03467     attn.sig[2] = REG_RD(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_AFTER_INVERT_3_FUNC_0 + port*4);
03468     attn.sig[3] = REG_RD(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_AFTER_INVERT_4_FUNC_0 + port*4);
03469     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "attn: %08x %08x %08x %08x\n",
03470        attn.sig[0], attn.sig[1], attn.sig[2], attn.sig[3]);
03471 
03472     for (index = 0; index < MAX_DYNAMIC_ATTN_GRPS; index++) {
03473         if (deasserted & (1 << index)) {
03474             group_mask = bp->attn_group[index];
03475 
03476             DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "group[%d]: %08x %08x %08x %08x\n",
03477                index, group_mask.sig[0], group_mask.sig[1],
03478                group_mask.sig[2], group_mask.sig[3]);
03479 
03480             bnx2x_attn_int_deasserted3(bp,
03481                     attn.sig[3] & group_mask.sig[3]);
03482             bnx2x_attn_int_deasserted1(bp,
03483                     attn.sig[1] & group_mask.sig[1]);
03484             bnx2x_attn_int_deasserted2(bp,
03485                     attn.sig[2] & group_mask.sig[2]);
03486             bnx2x_attn_int_deasserted0(bp,
03487                     attn.sig[0] & group_mask.sig[0]);
03488 
03489             if ((attn.sig[0] & group_mask.sig[0] &
03490                         HW_PRTY_ASSERT_SET_0) ||
03491                 (attn.sig[1] & group_mask.sig[1] &
03492                         HW_PRTY_ASSERT_SET_1) ||
03493                 (attn.sig[2] & group_mask.sig[2] &
03494                         HW_PRTY_ASSERT_SET_2))
03495                 BNX2X_ERR("FATAL HW block parity attention\n");
03496         }
03497     }
03498 
03499     bnx2x_release_alr(bp);
03500 
03501     reg_addr = (HC_REG_COMMAND_REG + port*32 + COMMAND_REG_ATTN_BITS_CLR);
03502 
03503     val = ~deasserted;
03504     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "about to mask 0x%08x at HC addr 0x%x\n",
03505        val, reg_addr);
03506     REG_WR(bp, reg_addr, val);
03507 
03508     if (~bp->attn_state & deasserted)
03509         BNX2X_ERR("IGU ERROR\n");
03510 
03511     reg_addr = port ? MISC_REG_AEU_MASK_ATTN_FUNC_1 :
03512               MISC_REG_AEU_MASK_ATTN_FUNC_0;
03513 
03514     bnx2x_acquire_hw_lock(bp, HW_LOCK_RESOURCE_PORT0_ATT_MASK + port);
03515     aeu_mask = REG_RD(bp, reg_addr);
03516 
03517     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "aeu_mask %x  newly deasserted %x\n",
03518        aeu_mask, deasserted);
03519     aeu_mask |= (deasserted & 0xff);
03520     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "new mask %x\n", aeu_mask);
03521 
03522     REG_WR(bp, reg_addr, aeu_mask);
03523     bnx2x_release_hw_lock(bp, HW_LOCK_RESOURCE_PORT0_ATT_MASK + port);
03524 
03525     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "attn_state %x\n", bp->attn_state);
03526     bp->attn_state &= ~deasserted;
03527     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "new state %x\n", bp->attn_state);
03528 }
03529 
03530 static void bnx2x_attn_int(struct bnx2x *bp)
03531 {
03532     /* read local copy of bits */
03533     u32 attn_bits = le32_to_cpu(bp->def_status_blk->atten_status_block.
03534                                 attn_bits);
03535     u32 attn_ack = le32_to_cpu(bp->def_status_blk->atten_status_block.
03536                                 attn_bits_ack);
03537     u32 attn_state = bp->attn_state;
03538 
03539     /* look for changed bits */
03540     u32 asserted   =  attn_bits & ~attn_ack & ~attn_state;
03541     u32 deasserted = ~attn_bits &  attn_ack &  attn_state;
03542 
03543     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW,
03544        "attn_bits %x  attn_ack %x  asserted %x  deasserted %x\n",
03545        attn_bits, attn_ack, asserted, deasserted);
03546 
03547     if (~(attn_bits ^ attn_ack) & (attn_bits ^ attn_state))
03548         BNX2X_ERR("BAD attention state\n");
03549 
03550     /* handle bits that were raised */
03551     if (asserted)
03552         bnx2x_attn_int_asserted(bp, asserted);
03553 
03554     if (deasserted)
03555         bnx2x_attn_int_deasserted(bp, deasserted);
03556 }
03557 
03558 #if defined(INIT_DELAYED_WORK_DEFERRABLE) || defined(INIT_WORK_NAR) || (VMWARE_ESX_DDK_VERSION >= 40000) /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
03559 static void bnx2x_sp_task(struct work_struct *work)
03560 {
03561 #if (LINUX_VERSION_CODE >= 0x020614) /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
03562     struct bnx2x *bp = container_of(work, struct bnx2x, sp_task.work);
03563 #else
03564     struct bnx2x *bp = container_of(work, struct bnx2x, sp_task);
03565 #endif
03566 #else
03567 static void bnx2x_sp_task(void *data)
03568 {
03569     struct bnx2x *bp = (struct bnx2x *)data;
03570 #endif
03571     u16 status;
03572 
03573 #if (LINUX_VERSION_CODE < 0x020618) /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
03574     bp->sp_running = 1;
03575     smp_mb(); /* make sure close can see this */
03576 #endif
03577 
03578     /* Return here if interrupt is disabled */
03579     if (unlikely(atomic_read(&bp->intr_sem) != 0)) {
03580         DP(NETIF_MSG_INTR, "called but intr_sem not 0, returning\n");
03581 #if (LINUX_VERSION_CODE >= 0x020618) /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
03582         return;
03583 #else
03584         goto sp_task_exit;
03585 #endif
03586     }
03587 
03588     status = bnx2x_update_dsb_idx(bp);
03589 /*  if (status == 0)                     */
03590 /*      BNX2X_ERR("spurious slowpath interrupt!\n"); */
03591 
03592     DP(NETIF_MSG_INTR, "got a slowpath interrupt (status 0x%x)\n", status);
03593 
03594     /* HW attentions */
03595     if (status & 0x1) {
03596         bnx2x_attn_int(bp);
03597         status &= ~0x1;
03598     }
03599 
03600     /* CStorm events: STAT_QUERY */
03601     if (status & 0x2) {
03602         DP(BNX2X_MSG_SP, "CStorm events: STAT_QUERY\n");
03603         status &= ~0x2;
03604     }
03605 
03606     if (unlikely(status))
03607         DP(NETIF_MSG_INTR, "got an unknown interrupt! (status 0x%x)\n",
03608            status);
03609 
03610     bnx2x_ack_sb(bp, DEF_SB_ID, ATTENTION_ID, le16_to_cpu(bp->def_att_idx),
03611              IGU_INT_NOP, 1);
03612     bnx2x_ack_sb(bp, DEF_SB_ID, USTORM_ID, le16_to_cpu(bp->def_u_idx),
03613              IGU_INT_NOP, 1);
03614     bnx2x_ack_sb(bp, DEF_SB_ID, CSTORM_ID, le16_to_cpu(bp->def_c_idx),
03615              IGU_INT_NOP, 1);
03616     bnx2x_ack_sb(bp, DEF_SB_ID, XSTORM_ID, le16_to_cpu(bp->def_x_idx),
03617              IGU_INT_NOP, 1);
03618     bnx2x_ack_sb(bp, DEF_SB_ID, TSTORM_ID, le16_to_cpu(bp->def_t_idx),
03619              IGU_INT_ENABLE, 1);
03620 
03621 #if (LINUX_VERSION_CODE < 0x020618) /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
03622 sp_task_exit:
03623     bp->sp_running = 0;
03624     smp_mb(); /* make sure close can see this */
03625 #endif
03626 }
03627 
03628 #ifdef CONFIG_PCI_MSI /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
03629 #if (LINUX_VERSION_CODE < 0x020613) && (VMWARE_ESX_DDK_VERSION < 40000)
03630 static irqreturn_t bnx2x_msix_sp_int(int irq, void *dev_instance,
03631                      struct pt_regs *regs)
03632 #else /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
03633 static irqreturn_t bnx2x_msix_sp_int(int irq, void *dev_instance)
03634 #endif
03635 {
03636     struct net_device *dev = dev_instance;
03637     struct bnx2x *bp = netdev_priv(dev);
03638 
03639     /* Return here if interrupt is disabled */
03640     if (unlikely(atomic_read(&bp->intr_sem) != 0)) {
03641         DP(NETIF_MSG_INTR, "called but intr_sem not 0, returning\n");
03642         return IRQ_HANDLED;
03643     }
03644 
03645     bnx2x_ack_sb(bp, DEF_SB_ID, TSTORM_ID, 0, IGU_INT_DISABLE, 0);
03646 
03647 #ifdef BNX2X_STOP_ON_ERROR
03648     if (unlikely(bp->panic))
03649         return IRQ_HANDLED;
03650 #endif
03651 
03652 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
03653     {
03654         struct cnic_ops *c_ops;
03655 
03656         rcu_read_lock();
03657         c_ops = rcu_dereference(bp->cnic_ops);
03658         if (c_ops)
03659             c_ops->cnic_handler(bp->cnic_data, NULL);
03660         rcu_read_unlock();
03661     }
03662 #endif
03663 #if (LINUX_VERSION_CODE >= 0x020614) /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
03664     queue_delayed_work(bnx2x_wq, &bp->sp_task, 0);
03665 #else
03666     queue_work(bnx2x_wq, &bp->sp_task);
03667 #endif
03668 
03669     return IRQ_HANDLED;
03670 }
03671 #endif
03672 
03673 /* end of slow path */
03674 
03675 /* Statistics */
03676 
03677 /****************************************************************************
03678 * Macros
03679 ****************************************************************************/
03680 
03681 /* sum[hi:lo] += add[hi:lo] */
03682 #define ADD_64(s_hi, a_hi, s_lo, a_lo) \
03683     do { \
03684         s_lo += a_lo; \
03685         s_hi += a_hi + ((s_lo < a_lo) ? 1 : 0); \
03686     } while (0)
03687 
03688 /* difference = minuend - subtrahend */
03689 #define DIFF_64(d_hi, m_hi, s_hi, d_lo, m_lo, s_lo) \
03690     do { \
03691         if (m_lo < s_lo) { \
03692             /* underflow */ \
03693             d_hi = m_hi - s_hi; \
03694             if (d_hi > 0) { \
03695                 /* we can 'loan' 1 */ \
03696                 d_hi--; \
03697                 d_lo = m_lo + (UINT_MAX - s_lo) + 1; \
03698             } else { \
03699                 /* m_hi <= s_hi */ \
03700                 d_hi = 0; \
03701                 d_lo = 0; \
03702             } \
03703         } else { \
03704             /* m_lo >= s_lo */ \
03705             if (m_hi < s_hi) { \
03706                 d_hi = 0; \
03707                 d_lo = 0; \
03708             } else { \
03709                 /* m_hi >= s_hi */ \
03710                 d_hi = m_hi - s_hi; \
03711                 d_lo = m_lo - s_lo; \
03712             } \
03713         } \
03714     } while (0)
03715 
03716 #define UPDATE_STAT64(s, t) \
03717     do { \
03718         DIFF_64(diff.hi, new->s##_hi, pstats->mac_stx[0].t##_hi, \
03719             diff.lo, new->s##_lo, pstats->mac_stx[0].t##_lo); \
03720         pstats->mac_stx[0].t##_hi = new->s##_hi; \
03721         pstats->mac_stx[0].t##_lo = new->s##_lo; \
03722         ADD_64(pstats->mac_stx[1].t##_hi, diff.hi, \
03723                pstats->mac_stx[1].t##_lo, diff.lo); \
03724     } while (0)
03725 
03726 #define UPDATE_STAT64_NIG(s, t) \
03727     do { \
03728         DIFF_64(diff.hi, new->s##_hi, old->s##_hi, \
03729             diff.lo, new->s##_lo, old->s##_lo); \
03730         ADD_64(estats->t##_hi, diff.hi, \
03731                estats->t##_lo, diff.lo); \
03732     } while (0)
03733 
03734 /* sum[hi:lo] += add */
03735 #define ADD_EXTEND_64(s_hi, s_lo, a) \
03736     do { \
03737         s_lo += a; \
03738         s_hi += (s_lo < a) ? 1 : 0; \
03739     } while (0)
03740 
03741 #define UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(s) \
03742     do { \
03743         ADD_EXTEND_64(pstats->mac_stx[1].s##_hi, \
03744                   pstats->mac_stx[1].s##_lo, \
03745                   new->s); \
03746     } while (0)
03747 
03748 #define UPDATE_EXTEND_TSTAT(s, t) \
03749     do { \
03750         diff = le32_to_cpu(tclient->s) - le32_to_cpu(old_tclient->s); \
03751         old_tclient->s = tclient->s; \
03752         ADD_EXTEND_64(qstats->t##_hi, qstats->t##_lo, diff); \
03753     } while (0)
03754 
03755 #define UPDATE_EXTEND_USTAT(s, t) \
03756     do { \
03757         diff = le32_to_cpu(uclient->s) - le32_to_cpu(old_uclient->s); \
03758         old_uclient->s = uclient->s; \
03759         ADD_EXTEND_64(qstats->t##_hi, qstats->t##_lo, diff); \
03760     } while (0)
03761 
03762 #define UPDATE_EXTEND_XSTAT(s, t) \
03763     do { \
03764         diff = le32_to_cpu(xclient->s) - le32_to_cpu(old_xclient->s); \
03765         old_xclient->s = xclient->s; \
03766         ADD_EXTEND_64(qstats->t##_hi, qstats->t##_lo, diff); \
03767     } while (0)
03768 
03769 /* minuend -= subtrahend */
03770 #define SUB_64(m_hi, s_hi, m_lo, s_lo) \
03771     do { \
03772         DIFF_64(m_hi, m_hi, s_hi, m_lo, m_lo, s_lo); \
03773     } while (0)
03774 
03775 /* minuend[hi:lo] -= subtrahend */
03776 #define SUB_EXTEND_64(m_hi, m_lo, s) \
03777     do { \
03778         SUB_64(m_hi, 0, m_lo, s); \
03779     } while (0)
03780 
03781 #define SUB_EXTEND_USTAT(s, t) \
03782     do { \
03783         diff = le32_to_cpu(uclient->s) - le32_to_cpu(old_uclient->s); \
03784         SUB_EXTEND_64(qstats->t##_hi, qstats->t##_lo, diff); \
03785     } while (0)
03786 
03787 /*
03788  * General service functions
03789  */
03790 
03791 static inline long bnx2x_hilo(u32 *hiref)
03792 {
03793     u32 lo = *(hiref + 1);
03794 #if (BITS_PER_LONG == 64)
03795     u32 hi = *hiref;
03796 
03797     return HILO_U64(hi, lo);
03798 #else
03799     return lo;
03800 #endif
03801 }
03802 
03803 /*
03804  * Init service functions
03805  */
03806 
03807 static void bnx2x_storm_stats_post(struct bnx2x *bp)
03808 {
03809     if (!bp->stats_pending) {
03810         struct eth_query_ramrod_data ramrod_data = {0};
03811         int i, rc;
03812 
03813         ramrod_data.drv_counter = bp->stats_counter++;
03814         ramrod_data.collect_port = bp->port.pmf ? 1 : 0;
03815         for_each_queue(bp, i)
03816             ramrod_data.ctr_id_vector |= (1 << bp->fp[i].cl_id);
03817 
03818         rc = bnx2x_sp_post(bp, RAMROD_CMD_ID_ETH_STAT_QUERY, 0,
03819                    ((u32 *)&ramrod_data)[1],
03820                    ((u32 *)&ramrod_data)[0], 0);
03821         if (rc == 0) {
03822             /* stats ramrod has it's own slot on the spq */
03823             bp->spq_left++;
03824             bp->stats_pending = 1;
03825         }
03826     }
03827 }
03828 
03829 static void bnx2x_hw_stats_post(struct bnx2x *bp)
03830 {
03831     struct dmae_command *dmae = &bp->stats_dmae;
03832     u32 *stats_comp = bnx2x_sp(bp, stats_comp);
03833 
03834     *stats_comp = DMAE_COMP_VAL;
03835     if (CHIP_REV_IS_SLOW(bp))
03836         return;
03837 
03838     /* loader */
03839     if (bp->executer_idx) {
03840         int loader_idx = PMF_DMAE_C(bp);
03841 
03842         memset(dmae, 0, sizeof(struct dmae_command));
03843 
03844         dmae->opcode = (DMAE_CMD_SRC_PCI | DMAE_CMD_DST_GRC |
03845                 DMAE_CMD_C_DST_GRC | DMAE_CMD_C_ENABLE |
03846                 DMAE_CMD_DST_RESET |
03847 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN
03848                 DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_B_DW_SWAP |
03849 #else
03850                 DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_DW_SWAP |
03851 #endif
03852                 (BP_PORT(bp) ? DMAE_CMD_PORT_1 :
03853                            DMAE_CMD_PORT_0) |
03854                 (BP_E1HVN(bp) << DMAE_CMD_E1HVN_SHIFT));
03855         dmae->src_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, dmae[0]));
03856         dmae->src_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, dmae[0]));
03857         dmae->dst_addr_lo = (DMAE_REG_CMD_MEM +
03858                      sizeof(struct dmae_command) *
03859                      (loader_idx + 1)) >> 2;
03860         dmae->dst_addr_hi = 0;
03861         dmae->len = sizeof(struct dmae_command) >> 2;
03862         if (CHIP_IS_E1(bp))
03863             dmae->len--;
03864         dmae->comp_addr_lo = dmae_reg_go_c[loader_idx + 1] >> 2;
03865         dmae->comp_addr_hi = 0;
03866         dmae->comp_val = 1;
03867 
03868         *stats_comp = 0;
03869         bnx2x_post_dmae(bp, dmae, loader_idx);
03870 
03871     } else if (bp->func_stx) {
03872         *stats_comp = 0;
03873         bnx2x_post_dmae(bp, dmae, INIT_DMAE_C(bp));
03874     }
03875 }
03876 
03877 static int bnx2x_stats_comp(struct bnx2x *bp)
03878 {
03879     u32 *stats_comp = bnx2x_sp(bp, stats_comp);
03880     int cnt = 10;
03881 
03882     might_sleep();
03883     while (*stats_comp != DMAE_COMP_VAL) {
03884         if (!cnt) {
03885             BNX2X_ERR("timeout waiting for stats finished\n");
03886             break;
03887         }
03888         cnt--;
03889         msleep(1);
03890     }
03891     return 1;
03892 }
03893 
03894 /*
03895  * Statistics service functions
03896  */
03897 
03898 static void bnx2x_stats_pmf_update(struct bnx2x *bp)
03899 {
03900     struct dmae_command *dmae;
03901     u32 opcode;
03902     int loader_idx = PMF_DMAE_C(bp);
03903     u32 *stats_comp = bnx2x_sp(bp, stats_comp);
03904 
03905     /* sanity */
03906     if (!IS_E1HMF(bp) || !bp->port.pmf || !bp->port.port_stx) {
03907         BNX2X_ERR("BUG!\n");
03908         return;
03909     }
03910 
03911     bp->executer_idx = 0;
03912 
03913     opcode = (DMAE_CMD_SRC_GRC | DMAE_CMD_DST_PCI |
03914           DMAE_CMD_C_ENABLE |
03915           DMAE_CMD_SRC_RESET | DMAE_CMD_DST_RESET |
03916 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN
03917           DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_B_DW_SWAP |
03918 #else
03919           DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_DW_SWAP |
03920 #endif
03921           (BP_PORT(bp) ? DMAE_CMD_PORT_1 : DMAE_CMD_PORT_0) |
03922           (BP_E1HVN(bp) << DMAE_CMD_E1HVN_SHIFT));
03923 
03924     dmae = bnx2x_sp(bp, dmae[bp->executer_idx++]);
03925     dmae->opcode = (opcode | DMAE_CMD_C_DST_GRC);
03926     dmae->src_addr_lo = bp->port.port_stx >> 2;
03927     dmae->src_addr_hi = 0;
03928     dmae->dst_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, port_stats));
03929     dmae->dst_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, port_stats));
03930     dmae->len = DMAE_LEN32_RD_MAX;
03931     dmae->comp_addr_lo = dmae_reg_go_c[loader_idx] >> 2;
03932     dmae->comp_addr_hi = 0;
03933     dmae->comp_val = 1;
03934 
03935     dmae = bnx2x_sp(bp, dmae[bp->executer_idx++]);
03936     dmae->opcode = (opcode | DMAE_CMD_C_DST_PCI);
03937     dmae->src_addr_lo = (bp->port.port_stx >> 2) + DMAE_LEN32_RD_MAX;
03938     dmae->src_addr_hi = 0;
03939     dmae->dst_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, port_stats) +
03940                    DMAE_LEN32_RD_MAX * 4);
03941     dmae->dst_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, port_stats) +
03942                    DMAE_LEN32_RD_MAX * 4);
03943     dmae->len = (sizeof(struct host_port_stats) >> 2) - DMAE_LEN32_RD_MAX;
03944     dmae->comp_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, stats_comp));
03945     dmae->comp_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, stats_comp));
03946     dmae->comp_val = DMAE_COMP_VAL;
03947 
03948     *stats_comp = 0;
03949     bnx2x_hw_stats_post(bp);
03950     bnx2x_stats_comp(bp);
03951 }
03952 
03953 static void bnx2x_port_stats_init(struct bnx2x *bp)
03954 {
03955     struct dmae_command *dmae;
03956     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
03957     int vn = BP_E1HVN(bp);
03958     u32 opcode;
03959     int loader_idx = PMF_DMAE_C(bp);
03960     u32 mac_addr;
03961     u32 *stats_comp = bnx2x_sp(bp, stats_comp);
03962 
03963     /* sanity */
03964     if (!bp->link_vars.link_up || !bp->port.pmf) {
03965         BNX2X_ERR("BUG!\n");
03966         return;
03967     }
03968 
03969     bp->executer_idx = 0;
03970 
03971     /* MCP */
03972     opcode = (DMAE_CMD_SRC_PCI | DMAE_CMD_DST_GRC |
03973           DMAE_CMD_C_DST_GRC | DMAE_CMD_C_ENABLE |
03974           DMAE_CMD_SRC_RESET | DMAE_CMD_DST_RESET |
03975 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN
03976           DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_B_DW_SWAP |
03977 #else
03978           DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_DW_SWAP |
03979 #endif
03980           (port ? DMAE_CMD_PORT_1 : DMAE_CMD_PORT_0) |
03981           (vn << DMAE_CMD_E1HVN_SHIFT));
03982 
03983     if (bp->port.port_stx) {
03984 
03985         dmae = bnx2x_sp(bp, dmae[bp->executer_idx++]);
03986         dmae->opcode = opcode;
03987         dmae->src_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, port_stats));
03988         dmae->src_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, port_stats));
03989         dmae->dst_addr_lo = bp->port.port_stx >> 2;
03990         dmae->dst_addr_hi = 0;
03991         dmae->len = sizeof(struct host_port_stats) >> 2;
03992         dmae->comp_addr_lo = dmae_reg_go_c[loader_idx] >> 2;
03993         dmae->comp_addr_hi = 0;
03994         dmae->comp_val = 1;
03995     }
03996 
03997     if (bp->func_stx) {
03998 
03999         dmae = bnx2x_sp(bp, dmae[bp->executer_idx++]);
04000         dmae->opcode = opcode;
04001         dmae->src_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, func_stats));
04002         dmae->src_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, func_stats));
04003         dmae->dst_addr_lo = bp->func_stx >> 2;
04004         dmae->dst_addr_hi = 0;
04005         dmae->len = sizeof(struct host_func_stats) >> 2;
04006         dmae->comp_addr_lo = dmae_reg_go_c[loader_idx] >> 2;
04007         dmae->comp_addr_hi = 0;
04008         dmae->comp_val = 1;
04009     }
04010 
04011     /* MAC */
04012     opcode = (DMAE_CMD_SRC_GRC | DMAE_CMD_DST_PCI |
04013           DMAE_CMD_C_DST_GRC | DMAE_CMD_C_ENABLE |
04014           DMAE_CMD_SRC_RESET | DMAE_CMD_DST_RESET |
04015 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN
04016           DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_B_DW_SWAP |
04017 #else
04018           DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_DW_SWAP |
04019 #endif
04020           (port ? DMAE_CMD_PORT_1 : DMAE_CMD_PORT_0) |
04021           (vn << DMAE_CMD_E1HVN_SHIFT));
04022 
04023     if (bp->link_vars.mac_type == MAC_TYPE_BMAC) {
04024 
04025         mac_addr = (port ? NIG_REG_INGRESS_BMAC1_MEM :
04026                    NIG_REG_INGRESS_BMAC0_MEM);
04027 
04028         /* BIGMAC_REGISTER_TX_STAT_GTPKT ..
04029            BIGMAC_REGISTER_TX_STAT_GTBYT */
04030         dmae = bnx2x_sp(bp, dmae[bp->executer_idx++]);
04031         dmae->opcode = opcode;
04032         dmae->src_addr_lo = (mac_addr +
04033                      BIGMAC_REGISTER_TX_STAT_GTPKT) >> 2;
04034         dmae->src_addr_hi = 0;
04035         dmae->dst_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mac_stats));
04036         dmae->dst_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mac_stats));
04037         dmae->len = (8 + BIGMAC_REGISTER_TX_STAT_GTBYT -
04038                  BIGMAC_REGISTER_TX_STAT_GTPKT) >> 2;
04039         dmae->comp_addr_lo = dmae_reg_go_c[loader_idx] >> 2;
04040         dmae->comp_addr_hi = 0;
04041         dmae->comp_val = 1;
04042 
04043         /* BIGMAC_REGISTER_RX_STAT_GR64 ..
04044            BIGMAC_REGISTER_RX_STAT_GRIPJ */
04045         dmae = bnx2x_sp(bp, dmae[bp->executer_idx++]);
04046         dmae->opcode = opcode;
04047         dmae->src_addr_lo = (mac_addr +
04048                      BIGMAC_REGISTER_RX_STAT_GR64) >> 2;
04049         dmae->src_addr_hi = 0;
04050         dmae->dst_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mac_stats) +
04051                 offsetof(struct bmac_stats, rx_stat_gr64_lo));
04052         dmae->dst_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mac_stats) +
04053                 offsetof(struct bmac_stats, rx_stat_gr64_lo));
04054         dmae->len = (8 + BIGMAC_REGISTER_RX_STAT_GRIPJ -
04055                  BIGMAC_REGISTER_RX_STAT_GR64) >> 2;
04056         dmae->comp_addr_lo = dmae_reg_go_c[loader_idx] >> 2;
04057         dmae->comp_addr_hi = 0;
04058         dmae->comp_val = 1;
04059 
04060     } else if (bp->link_vars.mac_type == MAC_TYPE_EMAC) {
04061 
04062         mac_addr = (port ? GRCBASE_EMAC1 : GRCBASE_EMAC0);
04063 
04064         /* EMAC_REG_EMAC_RX_STAT_AC (EMAC_REG_EMAC_RX_STAT_AC_COUNT)*/
04065         dmae = bnx2x_sp(bp, dmae[bp->executer_idx++]);
04066         dmae->opcode = opcode;
04067         dmae->src_addr_lo = (mac_addr +
04068                      EMAC_REG_EMAC_RX_STAT_AC) >> 2;
04069         dmae->src_addr_hi = 0;
04070         dmae->dst_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mac_stats));
04071         dmae->dst_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mac_stats));
04072         dmae->len = EMAC_REG_EMAC_RX_STAT_AC_COUNT;
04073         dmae->comp_addr_lo = dmae_reg_go_c[loader_idx] >> 2;
04074         dmae->comp_addr_hi = 0;
04075         dmae->comp_val = 1;
04076 
04077         /* EMAC_REG_EMAC_RX_STAT_AC_28 */
04078         dmae = bnx2x_sp(bp, dmae[bp->executer_idx++]);
04079         dmae->opcode = opcode;
04080         dmae->src_addr_lo = (mac_addr +
04081                      EMAC_REG_EMAC_RX_STAT_AC_28) >> 2;
04082         dmae->src_addr_hi = 0;
04083         dmae->dst_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mac_stats) +
04084              offsetof(struct emac_stats, rx_stat_falsecarriererrors));
04085         dmae->dst_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mac_stats) +
04086              offsetof(struct emac_stats, rx_stat_falsecarriererrors));
04087         dmae->len = 1;
04088         dmae->comp_addr_lo = dmae_reg_go_c[loader_idx] >> 2;
04089         dmae->comp_addr_hi = 0;
04090         dmae->comp_val = 1;
04091 
04092         /* EMAC_REG_EMAC_TX_STAT_AC (EMAC_REG_EMAC_TX_STAT_AC_COUNT)*/
04093         dmae = bnx2x_sp(bp, dmae[bp->executer_idx++]);
04094         dmae->opcode = opcode;
04095         dmae->src_addr_lo = (mac_addr +
04096                      EMAC_REG_EMAC_TX_STAT_AC) >> 2;
04097         dmae->src_addr_hi = 0;
04098         dmae->dst_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mac_stats) +
04099             offsetof(struct emac_stats, tx_stat_ifhcoutoctets));
04100         dmae->dst_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mac_stats) +
04101             offsetof(struct emac_stats, tx_stat_ifhcoutoctets));
04102         dmae->len = EMAC_REG_EMAC_TX_STAT_AC_COUNT;
04103         dmae->comp_addr_lo = dmae_reg_go_c[loader_idx] >> 2;
04104         dmae->comp_addr_hi = 0;
04105         dmae->comp_val = 1;
04106     }
04107 
04108     /* NIG */
04109     dmae = bnx2x_sp(bp, dmae[bp->executer_idx++]);
04110     dmae->opcode = opcode;
04111     dmae->src_addr_lo = (port ? NIG_REG_STAT1_BRB_DISCARD :
04112                     NIG_REG_STAT0_BRB_DISCARD) >> 2;
04113     dmae->src_addr_hi = 0;
04114     dmae->dst_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, nig_stats));
04115     dmae->dst_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, nig_stats));
04116     dmae->len = (sizeof(struct nig_stats) - 4*sizeof(u32)) >> 2;
04117     dmae->comp_addr_lo = dmae_reg_go_c[loader_idx] >> 2;
04118     dmae->comp_addr_hi = 0;
04119     dmae->comp_val = 1;
04120 
04121     dmae = bnx2x_sp(bp, dmae[bp->executer_idx++]);
04122     dmae->opcode = opcode;
04123     dmae->src_addr_lo = (port ? NIG_REG_STAT1_EGRESS_MAC_PKT0 :
04124                     NIG_REG_STAT0_EGRESS_MAC_PKT0) >> 2;
04125     dmae->src_addr_hi = 0;
04126     dmae->dst_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, nig_stats) +
04127             offsetof(struct nig_stats, egress_mac_pkt0_lo));
04128     dmae->dst_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, nig_stats) +
04129             offsetof(struct nig_stats, egress_mac_pkt0_lo));
04130     dmae->len = (2*sizeof(u32)) >> 2;
04131     dmae->comp_addr_lo = dmae_reg_go_c[loader_idx] >> 2;
04132     dmae->comp_addr_hi = 0;
04133     dmae->comp_val = 1;
04134 
04135     dmae = bnx2x_sp(bp, dmae[bp->executer_idx++]);
04136     dmae->opcode = (DMAE_CMD_SRC_GRC | DMAE_CMD_DST_PCI |
04137             DMAE_CMD_C_DST_PCI | DMAE_CMD_C_ENABLE |
04138             DMAE_CMD_SRC_RESET | DMAE_CMD_DST_RESET |
04139 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN
04140             DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_B_DW_SWAP |
04141 #else
04142             DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_DW_SWAP |
04143 #endif
04144             (port ? DMAE_CMD_PORT_1 : DMAE_CMD_PORT_0) |
04145             (vn << DMAE_CMD_E1HVN_SHIFT));
04146     dmae->src_addr_lo = (port ? NIG_REG_STAT1_EGRESS_MAC_PKT1 :
04147                     NIG_REG_STAT0_EGRESS_MAC_PKT1) >> 2;
04148     dmae->src_addr_hi = 0;
04149     dmae->dst_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, nig_stats) +
04150             offsetof(struct nig_stats, egress_mac_pkt1_lo));
04151     dmae->dst_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, nig_stats) +
04152             offsetof(struct nig_stats, egress_mac_pkt1_lo));
04153     dmae->len = (2*sizeof(u32)) >> 2;
04154     dmae->comp_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, stats_comp));
04155     dmae->comp_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, stats_comp));
04156     dmae->comp_val = DMAE_COMP_VAL;
04157 
04158     *stats_comp = 0;
04159 }
04160 
04161 static void bnx2x_func_stats_init(struct bnx2x *bp)
04162 {
04163     struct dmae_command *dmae = &bp->stats_dmae;
04164     u32 *stats_comp = bnx2x_sp(bp, stats_comp);
04165 
04166     /* sanity */
04167     if (!bp->func_stx) {
04168         BNX2X_ERR("BUG!\n");
04169         return;
04170     }
04171 
04172     bp->executer_idx = 0;
04173     memset(dmae, 0, sizeof(struct dmae_command));
04174 
04175     dmae->opcode = (DMAE_CMD_SRC_PCI | DMAE_CMD_DST_GRC |
04176             DMAE_CMD_C_DST_PCI | DMAE_CMD_C_ENABLE |
04177             DMAE_CMD_SRC_RESET | DMAE_CMD_DST_RESET |
04178 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN
04179             DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_B_DW_SWAP |
04180 #else
04181             DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_DW_SWAP |
04182 #endif
04183             (BP_PORT(bp) ? DMAE_CMD_PORT_1 : DMAE_CMD_PORT_0) |
04184             (BP_E1HVN(bp) << DMAE_CMD_E1HVN_SHIFT));
04185     dmae->src_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, func_stats));
04186     dmae->src_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, func_stats));
04187     dmae->dst_addr_lo = bp->func_stx >> 2;
04188     dmae->dst_addr_hi = 0;
04189     dmae->len = sizeof(struct host_func_stats) >> 2;
04190     dmae->comp_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, stats_comp));
04191     dmae->comp_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, stats_comp));
04192     dmae->comp_val = DMAE_COMP_VAL;
04193 
04194     *stats_comp = 0;
04195 }
04196 
04197 static void bnx2x_stats_start(struct bnx2x *bp)
04198 {
04199     if (bp->port.pmf)
04200         bnx2x_port_stats_init(bp);
04201 
04202     else if (bp->func_stx)
04203         bnx2x_func_stats_init(bp);
04204 
04205     bnx2x_hw_stats_post(bp);
04206     bnx2x_storm_stats_post(bp);
04207 }
04208 
04209 static void bnx2x_stats_pmf_start(struct bnx2x *bp)
04210 {
04211     bnx2x_stats_comp(bp);
04212     bnx2x_stats_pmf_update(bp);
04213     bnx2x_stats_start(bp);
04214 }
04215 
04216 static void bnx2x_stats_restart(struct bnx2x *bp)
04217 {
04218     bnx2x_stats_comp(bp);
04219     bnx2x_stats_start(bp);
04220 }
04221 
04222 static void bnx2x_bmac_stats_update(struct bnx2x *bp)
04223 {
04224     struct bmac_stats *new = bnx2x_sp(bp, mac_stats.bmac_stats);
04225     struct host_port_stats *pstats = bnx2x_sp(bp, port_stats);
04226     struct bnx2x_eth_stats *estats = &bp->eth_stats;
04227     struct {
04228         u32 lo;
04229         u32 hi;
04230     } diff;
04231 
04232     UPDATE_STAT64(rx_stat_grerb, rx_stat_ifhcinbadoctets);
04233     UPDATE_STAT64(rx_stat_grfcs, rx_stat_dot3statsfcserrors);
04234     UPDATE_STAT64(rx_stat_grund, rx_stat_etherstatsundersizepkts);
04235     UPDATE_STAT64(rx_stat_grovr, rx_stat_dot3statsframestoolong);
04236     UPDATE_STAT64(rx_stat_grfrg, rx_stat_etherstatsfragments);
04237     UPDATE_STAT64(rx_stat_grjbr, rx_stat_etherstatsjabbers);
04238     UPDATE_STAT64(rx_stat_grxcf, rx_stat_maccontrolframesreceived);
04239     UPDATE_STAT64(rx_stat_grxpf, rx_stat_xoffstateentered);
04240     UPDATE_STAT64(rx_stat_grxpf, rx_stat_bmac_xpf);
04241     UPDATE_STAT64(tx_stat_gtxpf, tx_stat_outxoffsent);
04242     UPDATE_STAT64(tx_stat_gtxpf, tx_stat_flowcontroldone);
04243     UPDATE_STAT64(tx_stat_gt64, tx_stat_etherstatspkts64octets);
04244     UPDATE_STAT64(tx_stat_gt127,
04245                 tx_stat_etherstatspkts65octetsto127octets);
04246     UPDATE_STAT64(tx_stat_gt255,
04247                 tx_stat_etherstatspkts128octetsto255octets);
04248     UPDATE_STAT64(tx_stat_gt511,
04249                 tx_stat_etherstatspkts256octetsto511octets);
04250     UPDATE_STAT64(tx_stat_gt1023,
04251                 tx_stat_etherstatspkts512octetsto1023octets);
04252     UPDATE_STAT64(tx_stat_gt1518,
04253                 tx_stat_etherstatspkts1024octetsto1522octets);
04254     UPDATE_STAT64(tx_stat_gt2047, tx_stat_bmac_2047);
04255     UPDATE_STAT64(tx_stat_gt4095, tx_stat_bmac_4095);
04256     UPDATE_STAT64(tx_stat_gt9216, tx_stat_bmac_9216);
04257     UPDATE_STAT64(tx_stat_gt16383, tx_stat_bmac_16383);
04258     UPDATE_STAT64(tx_stat_gterr,
04259                 tx_stat_dot3statsinternalmactransmiterrors);
04260     UPDATE_STAT64(tx_stat_gtufl, tx_stat_bmac_ufl);
04261 
04262     estats->pause_frames_received_hi =
04263                 pstats->mac_stx[1].rx_stat_bmac_xpf_hi;
04264     estats->pause_frames_received_lo =
04265                 pstats->mac_stx[1].rx_stat_bmac_xpf_lo;
04266 
04267     estats->pause_frames_sent_hi =
04268                 pstats->mac_stx[1].tx_stat_outxoffsent_hi;
04269     estats->pause_frames_sent_lo =
04270                 pstats->mac_stx[1].tx_stat_outxoffsent_lo;
04271 }
04272 
04273 static void bnx2x_emac_stats_update(struct bnx2x *bp)
04274 {
04275     struct emac_stats *new = bnx2x_sp(bp, mac_stats.emac_stats);
04276     struct host_port_stats *pstats = bnx2x_sp(bp, port_stats);
04277     struct bnx2x_eth_stats *estats = &bp->eth_stats;
04278 
04279     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(rx_stat_ifhcinbadoctets);
04280     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_ifhcoutbadoctets);
04281     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(rx_stat_dot3statsfcserrors);
04282     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(rx_stat_dot3statsalignmenterrors);
04283     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(rx_stat_dot3statscarriersenseerrors);
04284     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(rx_stat_falsecarriererrors);
04285     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(rx_stat_etherstatsundersizepkts);
04286     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(rx_stat_dot3statsframestoolong);
04287     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(rx_stat_etherstatsfragments);
04288     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(rx_stat_etherstatsjabbers);
04289     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(rx_stat_maccontrolframesreceived);
04290     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(rx_stat_xoffstateentered);
04291     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(rx_stat_xonpauseframesreceived);
04292     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(rx_stat_xoffpauseframesreceived);
04293     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_outxonsent);
04294     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_outxoffsent);
04295     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_flowcontroldone);
04296     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_etherstatscollisions);
04297     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_dot3statssinglecollisionframes);
04298     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_dot3statsmultiplecollisionframes);
04299     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_dot3statsdeferredtransmissions);
04300     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_dot3statsexcessivecollisions);
04301     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_dot3statslatecollisions);
04302     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_etherstatspkts64octets);
04303     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_etherstatspkts65octetsto127octets);
04304     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_etherstatspkts128octetsto255octets);
04305     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_etherstatspkts256octetsto511octets);
04306     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_etherstatspkts512octetsto1023octets);
04307     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_etherstatspkts1024octetsto1522octets);
04308     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_etherstatspktsover1522octets);
04309     UPDATE_EXTEND_STAT(tx_stat_dot3statsinternalmactransmiterrors);
04310 
04311     estats->pause_frames_received_hi =
04312             pstats->mac_stx[1].rx_stat_xonpauseframesreceived_hi;
04313     estats->pause_frames_received_lo =
04314             pstats->mac_stx[1].rx_stat_xonpauseframesreceived_lo;
04315     ADD_64(estats->pause_frames_received_hi,
04316            pstats->mac_stx[1].rx_stat_xoffpauseframesreceived_hi,
04317            estats->pause_frames_received_lo,
04318            pstats->mac_stx[1].rx_stat_xoffpauseframesreceived_lo);
04319 
04320     estats->pause_frames_sent_hi =
04321             pstats->mac_stx[1].tx_stat_outxonsent_hi;
04322     estats->pause_frames_sent_lo =
04323             pstats->mac_stx[1].tx_stat_outxonsent_lo;
04324     ADD_64(estats->pause_frames_sent_hi,
04325            pstats->mac_stx[1].tx_stat_outxoffsent_hi,
04326            estats->pause_frames_sent_lo,
04327            pstats->mac_stx[1].tx_stat_outxoffsent_lo);
04328 }
04329 
04330 static int bnx2x_hw_stats_update(struct bnx2x *bp)
04331 {
04332     struct nig_stats *new = bnx2x_sp(bp, nig_stats);
04333     struct nig_stats *old = &(bp->port.old_nig_stats);
04334     struct host_port_stats *pstats = bnx2x_sp(bp, port_stats);
04335     struct bnx2x_eth_stats *estats = &bp->eth_stats;
04336     struct {
04337         u32 lo;
04338         u32 hi;
04339     } diff;
04340 
04341     if (bp->link_vars.mac_type == MAC_TYPE_BMAC)
04342         bnx2x_bmac_stats_update(bp);
04343 
04344     else if (bp->link_vars.mac_type == MAC_TYPE_EMAC)
04345         bnx2x_emac_stats_update(bp);
04346 
04347     else { /* unreached */
04348         BNX2X_ERR("stats updated by DMAE but no MAC active\n");
04349         return -1;
04350     }
04351 
04352     ADD_EXTEND_64(pstats->brb_drop_hi, pstats->brb_drop_lo,
04353               new->brb_discard - old->brb_discard);
04354     ADD_EXTEND_64(estats->brb_truncate_hi, estats->brb_truncate_lo,
04355               new->brb_truncate - old->brb_truncate);
04356 
04357     UPDATE_STAT64_NIG(egress_mac_pkt0,
04358                     etherstatspkts1024octetsto1522octets);
04359     UPDATE_STAT64_NIG(egress_mac_pkt1, etherstatspktsover1522octets);
04360 
04361     memcpy(old, new, sizeof(struct nig_stats));
04362 
04363     memcpy(&(estats->rx_stat_ifhcinbadoctets_hi), &(pstats->mac_stx[1]),
04364            sizeof(struct mac_stx));
04365     estats->brb_drop_hi = pstats->brb_drop_hi;
04366     estats->brb_drop_lo = pstats->brb_drop_lo;
04367 
04368     pstats->host_port_stats_start = ++pstats->host_port_stats_end;
04369 
04370     if (!BP_NOMCP(bp)) {
04371         u32 nig_timer_max =
04372             SHMEM_RD(bp, port_mb[BP_PORT(bp)].stat_nig_timer);
04373         if (nig_timer_max != estats->nig_timer_max) {
04374             estats->nig_timer_max = nig_timer_max;
04375             BNX2X_ERR("NIG timer max (%u)\n",
04376                   estats->nig_timer_max);
04377         }
04378     }
04379 
04380     return 0;
04381 }
04382 
04383 static int bnx2x_storm_stats_update(struct bnx2x *bp)
04384 {
04385     struct eth_stats_query *stats = bnx2x_sp(bp, fw_stats);
04386     struct tstorm_per_port_stats *tport =
04387                     &stats->tstorm_common.port_statistics;
04388     struct host_func_stats *fstats = bnx2x_sp(bp, func_stats);
04389     struct bnx2x_eth_stats *estats = &bp->eth_stats;
04390     int i;
04391 
04392     memcpy(&(fstats->total_bytes_received_hi),
04393            &(bnx2x_sp(bp, func_stats_base)->total_bytes_received_hi),
04394            sizeof(struct host_func_stats) - 2*sizeof(u32));
04395     estats->error_bytes_received_hi = 0;
04396     estats->error_bytes_received_lo = 0;
04397     estats->etherstatsoverrsizepkts_hi = 0;
04398     estats->etherstatsoverrsizepkts_lo = 0;
04399     estats->no_buff_discard_hi = 0;
04400     estats->no_buff_discard_lo = 0;
04401 
04402     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
04403         struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[i];
04404         int cl_id = fp->cl_id;
04405         struct tstorm_per_client_stats *tclient =
04406                 &stats->tstorm_common.client_statistics[cl_id];
04407         struct tstorm_per_client_stats *old_tclient = &fp->old_tclient;
04408         struct ustorm_per_client_stats *uclient =
04409                 &stats->ustorm_common.client_statistics[cl_id];
04410         struct ustorm_per_client_stats *old_uclient = &fp->old_uclient;
04411         struct xstorm_per_client_stats *xclient =
04412                 &stats->xstorm_common.client_statistics[cl_id];
04413         struct xstorm_per_client_stats *old_xclient = &fp->old_xclient;
04414         struct bnx2x_eth_q_stats *qstats = &fp->eth_q_stats;
04415         u32 diff;
04416 
04417         /* are storm stats valid? */
04418         if ((u16)(le16_to_cpu(xclient->stats_counter) + 1) !=
04419                             bp->stats_counter) {
04420             DP(BNX2X_MSG_STATS, "[%d] stats not updated by xstorm"
04421                "  xstorm counter (0x%x) != stats_counter (0x%x)\n",
04422                i, xclient->stats_counter, bp->stats_counter);
