04423             return -1;
04424         }
04425         if ((u16)(le16_to_cpu(tclient->stats_counter) + 1) !=
04426                             bp->stats_counter) {
04427             DP(BNX2X_MSG_STATS, "[%d] stats not updated by tstorm"
04428                "  tstorm counter (0x%x) != stats_counter (0x%x)\n",
04429                i, tclient->stats_counter, bp->stats_counter);
04430             return -2;
04431         }
04432         if ((u16)(le16_to_cpu(uclient->stats_counter) + 1) !=
04433                             bp->stats_counter) {
04434             DP(BNX2X_MSG_STATS, "[%d] stats not updated by ustorm"
04435                "  ustorm counter (0x%x) != stats_counter (0x%x)\n",
04436                i, uclient->stats_counter, bp->stats_counter);
04437             return -4;
04438         }
04439 
04440         qstats->total_bytes_received_hi =
04441             le32_to_cpu(tclient->rcv_broadcast_bytes.hi);
04442         qstats->total_bytes_received_lo =
04443             le32_to_cpu(tclient->rcv_broadcast_bytes.lo);
04444 
04445         ADD_64(qstats->total_bytes_received_hi,
04446                le32_to_cpu(tclient->rcv_multicast_bytes.hi),
04447                qstats->total_bytes_received_lo,
04448                le32_to_cpu(tclient->rcv_multicast_bytes.lo));
04449 
04450         ADD_64(qstats->total_bytes_received_hi,
04451                le32_to_cpu(tclient->rcv_unicast_bytes.hi),
04452                qstats->total_bytes_received_lo,
04453                le32_to_cpu(tclient->rcv_unicast_bytes.lo));
04454 
04455         SUB_64(qstats->total_bytes_received_hi,
04456                le32_to_cpu(uclient->bcast_no_buff_bytes.hi),
04457                qstats->total_bytes_received_lo,
04458                le32_to_cpu(uclient->bcast_no_buff_bytes.lo));
04459 
04460         SUB_64(qstats->total_bytes_received_hi,
04461                le32_to_cpu(uclient->mcast_no_buff_bytes.hi),
04462                qstats->total_bytes_received_lo,
04463                le32_to_cpu(uclient->mcast_no_buff_bytes.lo));
04464 
04465         SUB_64(qstats->total_bytes_received_hi,
04466                le32_to_cpu(uclient->ucast_no_buff_bytes.hi),
04467                qstats->total_bytes_received_lo,
04468                le32_to_cpu(uclient->ucast_no_buff_bytes.lo));
04469 
04470         qstats->valid_bytes_received_hi =
04471                     qstats->total_bytes_received_hi;
04472         qstats->valid_bytes_received_lo =
04473                     qstats->total_bytes_received_lo;
04474 
04475         qstats->error_bytes_received_hi =
04476                 le32_to_cpu(tclient->rcv_error_bytes.hi);
04477         qstats->error_bytes_received_lo =
04478                 le32_to_cpu(tclient->rcv_error_bytes.lo);
04479 
04480         ADD_64(qstats->total_bytes_received_hi,
04481                qstats->error_bytes_received_hi,
04482                qstats->total_bytes_received_lo,
04483                qstats->error_bytes_received_lo);
04484 
04485         UPDATE_EXTEND_TSTAT(rcv_unicast_pkts,
04486                     total_unicast_packets_received);
04487         UPDATE_EXTEND_TSTAT(rcv_multicast_pkts,
04488                     total_multicast_packets_received);
04489         UPDATE_EXTEND_TSTAT(rcv_broadcast_pkts,
04490                     total_broadcast_packets_received);
04491         UPDATE_EXTEND_TSTAT(packets_too_big_discard,
04492                     etherstatsoverrsizepkts);
04493         UPDATE_EXTEND_TSTAT(no_buff_discard, no_buff_discard);
04494 
04495         SUB_EXTEND_USTAT(ucast_no_buff_pkts,
04496                     total_unicast_packets_received);
04497         SUB_EXTEND_USTAT(mcast_no_buff_pkts,
04498                     total_multicast_packets_received);
04499         SUB_EXTEND_USTAT(bcast_no_buff_pkts,
04500                     total_broadcast_packets_received);
04501         UPDATE_EXTEND_USTAT(ucast_no_buff_pkts, no_buff_discard);
04502         UPDATE_EXTEND_USTAT(mcast_no_buff_pkts, no_buff_discard);
04503         UPDATE_EXTEND_USTAT(bcast_no_buff_pkts, no_buff_discard);
04504 
04505         qstats->total_bytes_transmitted_hi =
04506                 le32_to_cpu(xclient->unicast_bytes_sent.hi);
04507         qstats->total_bytes_transmitted_lo =
04508                 le32_to_cpu(xclient->unicast_bytes_sent.lo);
04509 
04510         ADD_64(qstats->total_bytes_transmitted_hi,
04511                le32_to_cpu(xclient->multicast_bytes_sent.hi),
04512                qstats->total_bytes_transmitted_lo,
04513                le32_to_cpu(xclient->multicast_bytes_sent.lo));
04514 
04515         ADD_64(qstats->total_bytes_transmitted_hi,
04516                le32_to_cpu(xclient->broadcast_bytes_sent.hi),
04517                qstats->total_bytes_transmitted_lo,
04518                le32_to_cpu(xclient->broadcast_bytes_sent.lo));
04519 
04520         UPDATE_EXTEND_XSTAT(unicast_pkts_sent,
04521                     total_unicast_packets_transmitted);
04522         UPDATE_EXTEND_XSTAT(multicast_pkts_sent,
04523                     total_multicast_packets_transmitted);
04524         UPDATE_EXTEND_XSTAT(broadcast_pkts_sent,
04525                     total_broadcast_packets_transmitted);
04526 
04527         old_tclient->checksum_discard = tclient->checksum_discard;
04528         old_tclient->ttl0_discard = tclient->ttl0_discard;
04529 
04530         ADD_64(fstats->total_bytes_received_hi,
04531                qstats->total_bytes_received_hi,
04532                fstats->total_bytes_received_lo,
04533                qstats->total_bytes_received_lo);
04534         ADD_64(fstats->total_bytes_transmitted_hi,
04535                qstats->total_bytes_transmitted_hi,
04536                fstats->total_bytes_transmitted_lo,
04537                qstats->total_bytes_transmitted_lo);
04538         ADD_64(fstats->total_unicast_packets_received_hi,
04539                qstats->total_unicast_packets_received_hi,
04540                fstats->total_unicast_packets_received_lo,
04541                qstats->total_unicast_packets_received_lo);
04542         ADD_64(fstats->total_multicast_packets_received_hi,
04543                qstats->total_multicast_packets_received_hi,
04544                fstats->total_multicast_packets_received_lo,
04545                qstats->total_multicast_packets_received_lo);
04546         ADD_64(fstats->total_broadcast_packets_received_hi,
04547                qstats->total_broadcast_packets_received_hi,
04548                fstats->total_broadcast_packets_received_lo,
04549                qstats->total_broadcast_packets_received_lo);
04550         ADD_64(fstats->total_unicast_packets_transmitted_hi,
04551                qstats->total_unicast_packets_transmitted_hi,
04552                fstats->total_unicast_packets_transmitted_lo,
04553                qstats->total_unicast_packets_transmitted_lo);
04554         ADD_64(fstats->total_multicast_packets_transmitted_hi,
04555                qstats->total_multicast_packets_transmitted_hi,
04556                fstats->total_multicast_packets_transmitted_lo,
04557                qstats->total_multicast_packets_transmitted_lo);
04558         ADD_64(fstats->total_broadcast_packets_transmitted_hi,
04559                qstats->total_broadcast_packets_transmitted_hi,
04560                fstats->total_broadcast_packets_transmitted_lo,
04561                qstats->total_broadcast_packets_transmitted_lo);
04562         ADD_64(fstats->valid_bytes_received_hi,
04563                qstats->valid_bytes_received_hi,
04564                fstats->valid_bytes_received_lo,
04565                qstats->valid_bytes_received_lo);
04566 
04567         ADD_64(estats->error_bytes_received_hi,
04568                qstats->error_bytes_received_hi,
04569                estats->error_bytes_received_lo,
04570                qstats->error_bytes_received_lo);
04571         ADD_64(estats->etherstatsoverrsizepkts_hi,
04572                qstats->etherstatsoverrsizepkts_hi,
04573                estats->etherstatsoverrsizepkts_lo,
04574                qstats->etherstatsoverrsizepkts_lo);
04575         ADD_64(estats->no_buff_discard_hi, qstats->no_buff_discard_hi,
04576                estats->no_buff_discard_lo, qstats->no_buff_discard_lo);
04577     }
04578 
04579     ADD_64(fstats->total_bytes_received_hi,
04580            estats->rx_stat_ifhcinbadoctets_hi,
04581            fstats->total_bytes_received_lo,
04582            estats->rx_stat_ifhcinbadoctets_lo);
04583 
04584     memcpy(estats, &(fstats->total_bytes_received_hi),
04585            sizeof(struct host_func_stats) - 2*sizeof(u32));
04586 
04587     ADD_64(estats->etherstatsoverrsizepkts_hi,
04588            estats->rx_stat_dot3statsframestoolong_hi,
04589            estats->etherstatsoverrsizepkts_lo,
04590            estats->rx_stat_dot3statsframestoolong_lo);
04591     ADD_64(estats->error_bytes_received_hi,
04592            estats->rx_stat_ifhcinbadoctets_hi,
04593            estats->error_bytes_received_lo,
04594            estats->rx_stat_ifhcinbadoctets_lo);
04595 
04596     if (bp->port.pmf) {
04597         estats->mac_filter_discard =
04598                 le32_to_cpu(tport->mac_filter_discard);
04599         estats->xxoverflow_discard =
04600                 le32_to_cpu(tport->xxoverflow_discard);
04601         estats->brb_truncate_discard =
04602                 le32_to_cpu(tport->brb_truncate_discard);
04603         estats->mac_discard = le32_to_cpu(tport->mac_discard);
04604     }
04605 
04606     fstats->host_func_stats_start = ++fstats->host_func_stats_end;
04607 
04608     bp->stats_pending = 0;
04609 
04610     return 0;
04611 }
04612 
04613 static void bnx2x_net_stats_update(struct bnx2x *bp)
04614 {
04615     struct bnx2x_eth_stats *estats = &bp->eth_stats;
04616 #if (LINUX_VERSION_CODE >= 0x020618) /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
04617     struct net_device_stats *nstats = &bp->dev->stats;
04618 #else
04619     struct net_device_stats *nstats = &bp->net_stats;
04620 #endif
04621     int i;
04622 
04623     nstats->rx_packets =
04624         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->total_unicast_packets_received_hi) +
04625         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->total_multicast_packets_received_hi) +
04626         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->total_broadcast_packets_received_hi);
04627 
04628     nstats->tx_packets =
04629         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->total_unicast_packets_transmitted_hi) +
04630         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->total_multicast_packets_transmitted_hi) +
04631         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->total_broadcast_packets_transmitted_hi);
04632 
04633     nstats->rx_bytes = bnx2x_hilo(&estats->total_bytes_received_hi);
04634 
04635     nstats->tx_bytes = bnx2x_hilo(&estats->total_bytes_transmitted_hi);
04636 
04637     nstats->rx_dropped = estats->mac_discard;
04638     for_each_queue(bp, i)
04639         nstats->rx_dropped +=
04640             le32_to_cpu(bp->fp[i].old_tclient.checksum_discard);
04641 
04642     nstats->tx_dropped = 0;
04643 
04644     nstats->multicast =
04645         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->total_multicast_packets_received_hi);
04646 
04647     nstats->collisions =
04648         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->tx_stat_etherstatscollisions_hi);
04649 
04650     nstats->rx_length_errors =
04651         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->rx_stat_etherstatsundersizepkts_hi) +
04652         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->etherstatsoverrsizepkts_hi);
04653     nstats->rx_over_errors = bnx2x_hilo(&estats->brb_drop_hi) +
04654                  bnx2x_hilo(&estats->brb_truncate_hi);
04655     nstats->rx_crc_errors =
04656         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->rx_stat_dot3statsfcserrors_hi);
04657     nstats->rx_frame_errors =
04658         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->rx_stat_dot3statsalignmenterrors_hi);
04659     nstats->rx_fifo_errors = bnx2x_hilo(&estats->no_buff_discard_hi);
04660     nstats->rx_missed_errors = estats->xxoverflow_discard;
04661 
04662     nstats->rx_errors = nstats->rx_length_errors +
04663                 nstats->rx_over_errors +
04664                 nstats->rx_crc_errors +
04665                 nstats->rx_frame_errors +
04666                 nstats->rx_fifo_errors +
04667                 nstats->rx_missed_errors;
04668 
04669     nstats->tx_aborted_errors =
04670         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->tx_stat_dot3statslatecollisions_hi) +
04671         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->tx_stat_dot3statsexcessivecollisions_hi);
04672     nstats->tx_carrier_errors =
04673         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->rx_stat_dot3statscarriersenseerrors_hi);
04674     nstats->tx_fifo_errors = 0;
04675     nstats->tx_heartbeat_errors = 0;
04676     nstats->tx_window_errors = 0;
04677 
04678     nstats->tx_errors = nstats->tx_aborted_errors +
04679                 nstats->tx_carrier_errors +
04680         bnx2x_hilo(&estats->tx_stat_dot3statsinternalmactransmiterrors_hi);
04681 }
04682 
04683 static void bnx2x_drv_stats_update(struct bnx2x *bp)
04684 {
04685     struct bnx2x_eth_stats *estats = &bp->eth_stats;
04686     int i;
04687 
04688     estats->driver_xoff = 0;
04689     estats->rx_err_discard_pkt = 0;
04690     estats->rx_skb_alloc_failed = 0;
04691     estats->hw_csum_err = 0;
04692     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
04693         struct bnx2x_eth_q_stats *qstats = &bp->fp[i].eth_q_stats;
04694 
04695         estats->rx_err_discard_pkt += qstats->rx_err_discard_pkt;
04696         estats->rx_skb_alloc_failed += qstats->rx_skb_alloc_failed;
04697         estats->hw_csum_err += qstats->hw_csum_err;
04698     }
04699     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
04700         struct bnx2x_eth_q_stats *qstats = &bp->fp[i].eth_q_stats;
04701 
04702         estats->driver_xoff += qstats->driver_xoff;
04703     }
04704 }
04705 
04706 static void bnx2x_stats_update(struct bnx2x *bp)
04707 {
04708     u32 *stats_comp = bnx2x_sp(bp, stats_comp);
04709 
04710     if (*stats_comp != DMAE_COMP_VAL)
04711         return;
04712 
04713     if (bp->port.pmf)
04714         bnx2x_hw_stats_update(bp);
04715 
04716     if (bnx2x_storm_stats_update(bp) && (bp->stats_pending++ == 3)) {
04717         BNX2X_ERR("storm stats were not updated for 3 times\n");
04718         bnx2x_panic();
04719         return;
04720     }
04721 
04722     bnx2x_net_stats_update(bp);
04723     bnx2x_drv_stats_update(bp);
04724 
04725     if (bp->msglevel & NETIF_MSG_TIMER) {
04726         struct bnx2x_eth_stats *estats = &bp->eth_stats;
04727         int i;
04728 
04729         printk(KERN_DEBUG "%s: brb drops %u  brb truncate %u\n",
04730                bp->dev->name,
04731                estats->brb_drop_lo, estats->brb_truncate_lo);
04732 
04733         for_each_queue(bp, i) {
04734             struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[i];
04735             struct bnx2x_eth_q_stats *qstats = &fp->eth_q_stats;
04736 
04737             printk(KERN_DEBUG "%s: rx usage(%4u)  *rx_cons_sb(%u)"
04738                       "  rx pkt(%lu)  rx calls(%lu %lu)\n",
04739                    fp->name, (le16_to_cpu(*fp->rx_cons_sb) -
04740                    fp->rx_comp_cons),
04741                    le16_to_cpu(*fp->rx_cons_sb),
04742                    bnx2x_hilo(&qstats->
04743                       total_unicast_packets_received_hi),
04744                    fp->rx_calls, fp->rx_pkt);
04745         }
04746 
04747         for_each_queue(bp, i) {
04748             struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[i];
04749             struct bnx2x_eth_q_stats *qstats = &fp->eth_q_stats;
04750 #ifdef BNX2X_MULTI_QUEUE /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
04751             struct netdev_queue *txq = netdev_get_tx_queue(bp->dev, i);
04752 #endif
04753 
04754             printk(KERN_DEBUG "%s: tx avail(%4u)  *tx_cons_sb(%u)"
04755                       "  tx pkt(%lu) tx calls (%lu)"
04756                       "  %s (Xoff events %u)\n",
04757                    fp->name, bnx2x_tx_avail(fp),
04758                    le16_to_cpu(*fp->tx_cons_sb),
04759                    bnx2x_hilo(&qstats->
04760                       total_unicast_packets_transmitted_hi),
04761                    fp->tx_pkt,
04762 #ifdef BNX2X_MULTI_QUEUE /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
04763                    (netif_tx_queue_stopped(txq) ? "Xoff" : "Xon"),
04764 #else
04765                    (netif_queue_stopped(bp->dev) ? "Xoff" : "Xon"),
04766 #endif
04767                    qstats->driver_xoff);
04768         }
04769     }
04770 
04771     bnx2x_hw_stats_post(bp);
04772     bnx2x_storm_stats_post(bp);
04773 }
04774 
04775 static void bnx2x_port_stats_stop(struct bnx2x *bp)
04776 {
04777     struct dmae_command *dmae;
04778     u32 opcode;
04779     int loader_idx = PMF_DMAE_C(bp);
04780     u32 *stats_comp = bnx2x_sp(bp, stats_comp);
04781 
04782     bp->executer_idx = 0;
04783 
04784     opcode = (DMAE_CMD_SRC_PCI | DMAE_CMD_DST_GRC |
04785           DMAE_CMD_C_ENABLE |
04786           DMAE_CMD_SRC_RESET | DMAE_CMD_DST_RESET |
04787 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN
04788           DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_B_DW_SWAP |
04789 #else
04790           DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_DW_SWAP |
04791 #endif
04792           (BP_PORT(bp) ? DMAE_CMD_PORT_1 : DMAE_CMD_PORT_0) |
04793           (BP_E1HVN(bp) << DMAE_CMD_E1HVN_SHIFT));
04794 
04795     if (bp->port.port_stx) {
04796 
04797         dmae = bnx2x_sp(bp, dmae[bp->executer_idx++]);
04798         if (bp->func_stx)
04799             dmae->opcode = (opcode | DMAE_CMD_C_DST_GRC);
04800         else
04801             dmae->opcode = (opcode | DMAE_CMD_C_DST_PCI);
04802         dmae->src_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, port_stats));
04803         dmae->src_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, port_stats));
04804         dmae->dst_addr_lo = bp->port.port_stx >> 2;
04805         dmae->dst_addr_hi = 0;
04806         dmae->len = sizeof(struct host_port_stats) >> 2;
04807         if (bp->func_stx) {
04808             dmae->comp_addr_lo = dmae_reg_go_c[loader_idx] >> 2;
04809             dmae->comp_addr_hi = 0;
04810             dmae->comp_val = 1;
04811         } else {
04812             dmae->comp_addr_lo =
04813                 U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, stats_comp));
04814             dmae->comp_addr_hi =
04815                 U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, stats_comp));
04816             dmae->comp_val = DMAE_COMP_VAL;
04817 
04818             *stats_comp = 0;
04819         }
04820     }
04821 
04822     if (bp->func_stx) {
04823 
04824         dmae = bnx2x_sp(bp, dmae[bp->executer_idx++]);
04825         dmae->opcode = (opcode | DMAE_CMD_C_DST_PCI);
04826         dmae->src_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, func_stats));
04827         dmae->src_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, func_stats));
04828         dmae->dst_addr_lo = bp->func_stx >> 2;
04829         dmae->dst_addr_hi = 0;
04830         dmae->len = sizeof(struct host_func_stats) >> 2;
04831         dmae->comp_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, stats_comp));
04832         dmae->comp_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, stats_comp));
04833         dmae->comp_val = DMAE_COMP_VAL;
04834 
04835         *stats_comp = 0;
04836     }
04837 }
04838 
04839 static void bnx2x_stats_stop(struct bnx2x *bp)
04840 {
04841     int update = 0;
04842 
04843     bnx2x_stats_comp(bp);
04844 
04845     if (bp->port.pmf)
04846         update = (bnx2x_hw_stats_update(bp) == 0);
04847 
04848     update |= (bnx2x_storm_stats_update(bp) == 0);
04849 
04850     if (update) {
04851         bnx2x_net_stats_update(bp);
04852 
04853         if (bp->port.pmf)
04854             bnx2x_port_stats_stop(bp);
04855 
04856         bnx2x_hw_stats_post(bp);
04857         bnx2x_stats_comp(bp);
04858     }
04859 }
04860 
04861 static void bnx2x_stats_do_nothing(struct bnx2x *bp)
04862 {
04863 }
04864 
04865 static const struct {
04866     void (*action)(struct bnx2x *bp);
04867     enum bnx2x_stats_state next_state;
04868 } bnx2x_stats_stm[STATS_STATE_MAX][STATS_EVENT_MAX] = {
04869 /* state    event   */
04870 {
04871 /* DISABLED PMF */ {bnx2x_stats_pmf_update, STATS_STATE_DISABLED},
04872 /*      LINK_UP */ {bnx2x_stats_start,      STATS_STATE_ENABLED},
04873 /*      UPDATE  */ {bnx2x_stats_do_nothing, STATS_STATE_DISABLED},
04874 /*      STOP    */ {bnx2x_stats_do_nothing, STATS_STATE_DISABLED}
04875 },
04876 {
04877 /* ENABLED  PMF */ {bnx2x_stats_pmf_start,  STATS_STATE_ENABLED},
04878 /*      LINK_UP */ {bnx2x_stats_restart,    STATS_STATE_ENABLED},
04879 /*      UPDATE  */ {bnx2x_stats_update,     STATS_STATE_ENABLED},
04880 /*      STOP    */ {bnx2x_stats_stop,       STATS_STATE_DISABLED}
04881 }
04882 };
04883 
04884 static void bnx2x_stats_handle(struct bnx2x *bp, enum bnx2x_stats_event event)
04885 {
04886     enum bnx2x_stats_state state = bp->stats_state;
04887 
04888     if (unlikely(bp->panic))
04889         return;
04890 
04891     bnx2x_stats_stm[state][event].action(bp);
04892     bp->stats_state = bnx2x_stats_stm[state][event].next_state;
04893 
04894     /* Make sure the state has been "changed" */
04895     smp_wmb();
04896 
04897     if ((event != STATS_EVENT_UPDATE) || (bp->msglevel & NETIF_MSG_TIMER))
04898         DP(BNX2X_MSG_STATS, "state %d -> event %d -> state %d\n",
04899            state, event, bp->stats_state);
04900 }
04901 
04902 static void bnx2x_port_stats_base_init(struct bnx2x *bp)
04903 {
04904     struct dmae_command *dmae;
04905     u32 *stats_comp = bnx2x_sp(bp, stats_comp);
04906 
04907     /* sanity */
04908     if (!bp->port.pmf || !bp->port.port_stx) {
04909         BNX2X_ERR("BUG!\n");
04910         return;
04911     }
04912 
04913     bp->executer_idx = 0;
04914 
04915     dmae = bnx2x_sp(bp, dmae[bp->executer_idx++]);
04916     dmae->opcode = (DMAE_CMD_SRC_PCI | DMAE_CMD_DST_GRC |
04917             DMAE_CMD_C_DST_PCI | DMAE_CMD_C_ENABLE |
04918             DMAE_CMD_SRC_RESET | DMAE_CMD_DST_RESET |
04919 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN
04920             DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_B_DW_SWAP |
04921 #else
04922             DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_DW_SWAP |
04923 #endif
04924             (BP_PORT(bp) ? DMAE_CMD_PORT_1 : DMAE_CMD_PORT_0) |
04925             (BP_E1HVN(bp) << DMAE_CMD_E1HVN_SHIFT));
04926     dmae->src_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, port_stats));
04927     dmae->src_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, port_stats));
04928     dmae->dst_addr_lo = bp->port.port_stx >> 2;
04929     dmae->dst_addr_hi = 0;
04930     dmae->len = sizeof(struct host_port_stats) >> 2;
04931     dmae->comp_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, stats_comp));
04932     dmae->comp_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, stats_comp));
04933     dmae->comp_val = DMAE_COMP_VAL;
04934 
04935     *stats_comp = 0;
04936     bnx2x_hw_stats_post(bp);
04937     bnx2x_stats_comp(bp);
04938 }
04939 
04940 static void bnx2x_func_stats_base_init(struct bnx2x *bp)
04941 {
04942     int vn, vn_max = IS_E1HMF(bp) ? E1HVN_MAX : E1VN_MAX;
04943     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
04944     int func;
04945     u32 func_stx;
04946 
04947     /* sanity */
04948     if (!bp->port.pmf || !bp->func_stx) {
04949         BNX2X_ERR("BUG!\n");
04950         return;
04951     }
04952 
04953     /* save our func_stx */
04954     func_stx = bp->func_stx;
04955 
04956     for (vn = VN_0; vn < vn_max; vn++) {
04957         func = 2*vn + port;
04958 
04959         bp->func_stx = SHMEM_RD(bp, func_mb[func].fw_mb_param);
04960         bnx2x_func_stats_init(bp);
04961         bnx2x_hw_stats_post(bp);
04962         bnx2x_stats_comp(bp);
04963     }
04964 
04965     /* restore our func_stx */
04966     bp->func_stx = func_stx;
04967 }
04968 
04969 static void bnx2x_func_stats_base_update(struct bnx2x *bp)
04970 {
04971     struct dmae_command *dmae = &bp->stats_dmae;
04972     u32 *stats_comp = bnx2x_sp(bp, stats_comp);
04973 
04974     /* sanity */
04975     if (!bp->func_stx) {
04976         BNX2X_ERR("BUG!\n");
04977         return;
04978     }
04979 
04980     bp->executer_idx = 0;
04981     memset(dmae, 0, sizeof(struct dmae_command));
04982 
04983     dmae->opcode = (DMAE_CMD_SRC_GRC | DMAE_CMD_DST_PCI |
04984             DMAE_CMD_C_DST_PCI | DMAE_CMD_C_ENABLE |
04985             DMAE_CMD_SRC_RESET | DMAE_CMD_DST_RESET |
04986 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN
04987             DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_B_DW_SWAP |
04988 #else
04989             DMAE_CMD_ENDIANITY_DW_SWAP |
04990 #endif
04991             (BP_PORT(bp) ? DMAE_CMD_PORT_1 : DMAE_CMD_PORT_0) |
04992             (BP_E1HVN(bp) << DMAE_CMD_E1HVN_SHIFT));
04993     dmae->src_addr_lo = bp->func_stx >> 2;
04994     dmae->src_addr_hi = 0;
04995     dmae->dst_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, func_stats_base));
04996     dmae->dst_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, func_stats_base));
04997     dmae->len = sizeof(struct host_func_stats) >> 2;
04998     dmae->comp_addr_lo = U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, stats_comp));
04999     dmae->comp_addr_hi = U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, stats_comp));
05000     dmae->comp_val = DMAE_COMP_VAL;
05001 
05002     *stats_comp = 0;
05003     bnx2x_hw_stats_post(bp);
05004     bnx2x_stats_comp(bp);
05005 }
05006 
05007 static void bnx2x_stats_init(struct bnx2x *bp)
05008 {
05009     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
05010     int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
05011     int i;
05012 
05013     bp->stats_pending = 0;
05014     bp->executer_idx = 0;
05015     bp->stats_counter = 0;
05016 
05017     /* port and func stats for management */
05018     if (!BP_NOMCP(bp)) {
05019         bp->port.port_stx = SHMEM_RD(bp, port_mb[port].port_stx);
05020         bp->func_stx = SHMEM_RD(bp, func_mb[func].fw_mb_param);
05021 
05022     } else {
05023         bp->port.port_stx = 0;
05024         bp->func_stx = 0;
05025     }
05026     DP(BNX2X_MSG_STATS, "port_stx 0x%x  func_stx 0x%x\n",
05027        bp->port.port_stx, bp->func_stx);
05028 
05029     /* port stats */
05030     memset(&(bp->port.old_nig_stats), 0, sizeof(struct nig_stats));
05031     bp->port.old_nig_stats.brb_discard =
05032             REG_RD(bp, NIG_REG_STAT0_BRB_DISCARD + port*0x38);
05033     bp->port.old_nig_stats.brb_truncate =
05034             REG_RD(bp, NIG_REG_STAT0_BRB_TRUNCATE + port*0x38);
05035     REG_RD_DMAE(bp, NIG_REG_STAT0_EGRESS_MAC_PKT0 + port*0x50,
05036             &(bp->port.old_nig_stats.egress_mac_pkt0_lo), 2);
05037     REG_RD_DMAE(bp, NIG_REG_STAT0_EGRESS_MAC_PKT1 + port*0x50,
05038             &(bp->port.old_nig_stats.egress_mac_pkt1_lo), 2);
05039 
05040     /* function stats */
05041     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
05042         struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[i];
05043 
05044         memset(&fp->old_tclient, 0,
05045                sizeof(struct tstorm_per_client_stats));
05046         memset(&fp->old_uclient, 0,
05047                sizeof(struct ustorm_per_client_stats));
05048         memset(&fp->old_xclient, 0,
05049                sizeof(struct xstorm_per_client_stats));
05050         memset(&fp->eth_q_stats, 0, sizeof(struct bnx2x_eth_q_stats));
05051     }
05052 
05053 #if (LINUX_VERSION_CODE >= 0x020618) /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
05054     memset(&bp->dev->stats, 0, sizeof(struct net_device_stats));
05055 #else
05056     memset(&bp->net_stats, 0, sizeof(struct net_device_stats));
05057 #endif
05058     memset(&bp->eth_stats, 0, sizeof(struct bnx2x_eth_stats));
05059 
05060     bp->stats_state = STATS_STATE_DISABLED;
05061 
05062     if (bp->port.pmf) {
05063         if (bp->port.port_stx)
05064             bnx2x_port_stats_base_init(bp);
05065 
05066         if (bp->func_stx)
05067             bnx2x_func_stats_base_init(bp);
05068 
05069     } else if (bp->func_stx)
05070         bnx2x_func_stats_base_update(bp);
05071 }
05072 
05073 static void bnx2x_timer(unsigned long data)
05074 {
05075     struct bnx2x *bp = (struct bnx2x *) data;
05076 
05077     if (!netif_running(bp->dev))
05078         return;
05079 
05080     if (atomic_read(&bp->intr_sem) != 0)
05081         goto timer_restart;
05082 
05083     if (poll) {
05084         struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[0];
05085         int rc;
05086 
05087         bnx2x_tx_int(fp);
05088         rc = bnx2x_rx_int(fp, 1000);
05089     }
05090 
05091     if (!BP_NOMCP(bp)) {
05092         int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
05093         u32 drv_pulse;
05094         u32 mcp_pulse;
05095 
05096         ++bp->fw_drv_pulse_wr_seq;
05097         bp->fw_drv_pulse_wr_seq &= DRV_PULSE_SEQ_MASK;
05098         /* TBD - add SYSTEM_TIME */
05099         drv_pulse = bp->fw_drv_pulse_wr_seq;
05100         SHMEM_WR(bp, func_mb[func].drv_pulse_mb, drv_pulse);
05101 
05102         mcp_pulse = (SHMEM_RD(bp, func_mb[func].mcp_pulse_mb) &
05103                  MCP_PULSE_SEQ_MASK);
05104         /* The delta between driver pulse and mcp response
05105          * should be 1 (before mcp response) or 0 (after mcp response)
05106          */
05107         if ((drv_pulse != mcp_pulse) &&
05108             (drv_pulse != ((mcp_pulse + 1) & MCP_PULSE_SEQ_MASK))) {
05109             /* someone lost a heartbeat... */
05110             BNX2X_ERR("drv_pulse (0x%x) != mcp_pulse (0x%x)\n",
05111                   drv_pulse, mcp_pulse);
05112         }
05113     }
05114 
05115     if (bp->state == BNX2X_STATE_OPEN)
05116         bnx2x_stats_handle(bp, STATS_EVENT_UPDATE);
05117 
05118 timer_restart:
05119     mod_timer(&bp->timer, jiffies + bp->current_interval);
05120 }
05121 
05122 /* end of Statistics */
05123 
05124 /* nic init */
05125 
05126 /*
05127  * nic init service functions
05128  */
05129 
05130 static void bnx2x_zero_sb(struct bnx2x *bp, int sb_id)
05131 {
05132     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
05133 
05134     /* "CSTORM" */
05135     bnx2x_init_fill(bp, CSEM_REG_FAST_MEMORY +
05136             CSTORM_SB_HOST_STATUS_BLOCK_U_OFFSET(port, sb_id), 0,
05137             CSTORM_SB_STATUS_BLOCK_U_SIZE / 4);
05138     bnx2x_init_fill(bp, CSEM_REG_FAST_MEMORY +
05139             CSTORM_SB_HOST_STATUS_BLOCK_C_OFFSET(port, sb_id), 0,
05140             CSTORM_SB_STATUS_BLOCK_C_SIZE / 4);
05141 }
05142 
05143 static void bnx2x_init_sb(struct bnx2x *bp, struct host_status_block *sb,
05144               dma_addr_t mapping, int sb_id)
05145 {
05146     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
05147     int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
05148     int index;
05149     u64 section;
05150 
05151     /* USTORM */
05152     section = ((u64)mapping) + offsetof(struct host_status_block,
05153                         u_status_block);
05154     sb->u_status_block.status_block_id = sb_id;
05155 
05156     REG_WR(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05157            CSTORM_SB_HOST_SB_ADDR_U_OFFSET(port, sb_id), U64_LO(section));
05158     REG_WR(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05159            ((CSTORM_SB_HOST_SB_ADDR_U_OFFSET(port, sb_id)) + 4),
05160            U64_HI(section));
05161     REG_WR8(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM + FP_USB_FUNC_OFF +
05162         CSTORM_SB_HOST_STATUS_BLOCK_U_OFFSET(port, sb_id), func);
05163 
05164     for (index = 0; index < HC_USTORM_SB_NUM_INDICES; index++)
05165         REG_WR16(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05166              CSTORM_SB_HC_DISABLE_U_OFFSET(port, sb_id, index), 1);
05167 
05168     /* CSTORM */
05169     section = ((u64)mapping) + offsetof(struct host_status_block,
05170                         c_status_block);
05171     sb->c_status_block.status_block_id = sb_id;
05172 
05173     REG_WR(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05174            CSTORM_SB_HOST_SB_ADDR_C_OFFSET(port, sb_id), U64_LO(section));
05175     REG_WR(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05176            ((CSTORM_SB_HOST_SB_ADDR_C_OFFSET(port, sb_id)) + 4),
05177            U64_HI(section));
05178     REG_WR8(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM + FP_CSB_FUNC_OFF +
05179         CSTORM_SB_HOST_STATUS_BLOCK_C_OFFSET(port, sb_id), func);
05180 
05181     for (index = 0; index < HC_CSTORM_SB_NUM_INDICES; index++)
05182         REG_WR16(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05183              CSTORM_SB_HC_DISABLE_C_OFFSET(port, sb_id, index), 1);
05184 
05185     bnx2x_ack_sb(bp, sb_id, CSTORM_ID, 0, IGU_INT_ENABLE, 0);
05186 }
05187 
05188 static void bnx2x_zero_def_sb(struct bnx2x *bp)
05189 {
05190     int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
05191 
05192     bnx2x_init_fill(bp, TSEM_REG_FAST_MEMORY +
05193             TSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_STATUS_BLOCK_OFFSET(func), 0,
05194             sizeof(struct tstorm_def_status_block)/4);
05195     bnx2x_init_fill(bp, CSEM_REG_FAST_MEMORY +
05196             CSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_STATUS_BLOCK_U_OFFSET(func), 0,
05197             sizeof(struct cstorm_def_status_block_u)/4);
05198     bnx2x_init_fill(bp, CSEM_REG_FAST_MEMORY +
05199             CSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_STATUS_BLOCK_C_OFFSET(func), 0,
05200             sizeof(struct cstorm_def_status_block_c)/4);
05201     bnx2x_init_fill(bp, XSEM_REG_FAST_MEMORY +
05202             XSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_STATUS_BLOCK_OFFSET(func), 0,
05203             sizeof(struct xstorm_def_status_block)/4);
05204 }
05205 
05206 static void bnx2x_init_def_sb(struct bnx2x *bp,
05207                   struct host_def_status_block *def_sb,
05208                   dma_addr_t mapping, int sb_id)
05209 {
05210     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
05211     int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
05212     int index, val, reg_offset;
05213     u64 section;
05214 
05215     /* ATTN */
05216     section = ((u64)mapping) + offsetof(struct host_def_status_block,
05217                         atten_status_block);
05218     def_sb->atten_status_block.status_block_id = sb_id;
05219 
05220     bp->attn_state = 0;
05221 
05222     reg_offset = (port ? MISC_REG_AEU_ENABLE1_FUNC_1_OUT_0 :
05223                  MISC_REG_AEU_ENABLE1_FUNC_0_OUT_0);
05224 
05225     for (index = 0; index < MAX_DYNAMIC_ATTN_GRPS; index++) {
05226         bp->attn_group[index].sig[0] = REG_RD(bp,
05227                              reg_offset + 0x10*index);
05228         bp->attn_group[index].sig[1] = REG_RD(bp,
05229                            reg_offset + 0x4 + 0x10*index);
05230         bp->attn_group[index].sig[2] = REG_RD(bp,
05231                            reg_offset + 0x8 + 0x10*index);
05232         bp->attn_group[index].sig[3] = REG_RD(bp,
05233                            reg_offset + 0xc + 0x10*index);
05234     }
05235 
05236     reg_offset = (port ? HC_REG_ATTN_MSG1_ADDR_L :
05237                  HC_REG_ATTN_MSG0_ADDR_L);
05238 
05239     REG_WR(bp, reg_offset, U64_LO(section));
05240     REG_WR(bp, reg_offset + 4, U64_HI(section));
05241 
05242     reg_offset = (port ? HC_REG_ATTN_NUM_P1 : HC_REG_ATTN_NUM_P0);
05243 
05244     val = REG_RD(bp, reg_offset);
05245     val |= sb_id;
05246     REG_WR(bp, reg_offset, val);
05247 
05248     /* USTORM */
05249     section = ((u64)mapping) + offsetof(struct host_def_status_block,
05250                         u_def_status_block);
05251     def_sb->u_def_status_block.status_block_id = sb_id;
05252 
05253     REG_WR(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05254            CSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_SB_ADDR_U_OFFSET(func), U64_LO(section));
05255     REG_WR(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05256            ((CSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_SB_ADDR_U_OFFSET(func)) + 4),
05257            U64_HI(section));
05258     REG_WR8(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM + DEF_USB_FUNC_OFF +
05259         CSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_STATUS_BLOCK_U_OFFSET(func), func);
05260 
05261     for (index = 0; index < HC_USTORM_DEF_SB_NUM_INDICES; index++)
05262         REG_WR16(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05263              CSTORM_DEF_SB_HC_DISABLE_U_OFFSET(func, index), 1);
05264 
05265     /* CSTORM */
05266     section = ((u64)mapping) + offsetof(struct host_def_status_block,
05267                         c_def_status_block);
05268     def_sb->c_def_status_block.status_block_id = sb_id;
05269 
05270     REG_WR(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05271            CSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_SB_ADDR_C_OFFSET(func), U64_LO(section));
05272     REG_WR(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05273            ((CSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_SB_ADDR_C_OFFSET(func)) + 4),
05274            U64_HI(section));
05275     REG_WR8(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM + DEF_CSB_FUNC_OFF +
05276         CSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_STATUS_BLOCK_C_OFFSET(func), func);
05277 
05278     for (index = 0; index < HC_CSTORM_DEF_SB_NUM_INDICES; index++)
05279         REG_WR16(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05280              CSTORM_DEF_SB_HC_DISABLE_C_OFFSET(func, index), 1);
05281 
05282     /* TSTORM */
05283     section = ((u64)mapping) + offsetof(struct host_def_status_block,
05284                         t_def_status_block);
05285     def_sb->t_def_status_block.status_block_id = sb_id;
05286 
05287     REG_WR(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM +
05288            TSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_SB_ADDR_OFFSET(func), U64_LO(section));
05289     REG_WR(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM +
05290            ((TSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_SB_ADDR_OFFSET(func)) + 4),
05291            U64_HI(section));
05292     REG_WR8(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM + DEF_TSB_FUNC_OFF +
05293         TSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_STATUS_BLOCK_OFFSET(func), func);
05294 
05295     for (index = 0; index < HC_TSTORM_DEF_SB_NUM_INDICES; index++)
05296         REG_WR16(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM +
05297              TSTORM_DEF_SB_HC_DISABLE_OFFSET(func, index), 1);
05298 
05299     /* XSTORM */
05300     section = ((u64)mapping) + offsetof(struct host_def_status_block,
05301                         x_def_status_block);
05302     def_sb->x_def_status_block.status_block_id = sb_id;
05303 
05304     REG_WR(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM +
05305            XSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_SB_ADDR_OFFSET(func), U64_LO(section));
05306     REG_WR(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM +
05307            ((XSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_SB_ADDR_OFFSET(func)) + 4),
05308            U64_HI(section));
05309     REG_WR8(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM + DEF_XSB_FUNC_OFF +
05310         XSTORM_DEF_SB_HOST_STATUS_BLOCK_OFFSET(func), func);
05311 
05312     for (index = 0; index < HC_XSTORM_DEF_SB_NUM_INDICES; index++)
05313         REG_WR16(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM +
05314              XSTORM_DEF_SB_HC_DISABLE_OFFSET(func, index), 1);
05315 
05316     bp->stats_pending = 0;
05317     bp->set_mac_pending = 0;
05318 
05319     bnx2x_ack_sb(bp, sb_id, CSTORM_ID, 0, IGU_INT_ENABLE, 0);
05320 }
05321 
05322 static void bnx2x_update_coalesce(struct bnx2x *bp)
05323 {
05324     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
05325     int i;
05326 
05327     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
05328         int sb_id = bp->fp[i].sb_id;
05329 
05330         /* HC_INDEX_U_ETH_RX_CQ_CONS */
05331         REG_WR8(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05332             CSTORM_SB_HC_TIMEOUT_U_OFFSET(port, sb_id,
05333                               U_SB_ETH_RX_CQ_INDEX),
05334             bp->rx_ticks/(4 * BNX2X_BTR));
05335         REG_WR16(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05336              CSTORM_SB_HC_DISABLE_U_OFFSET(port, sb_id,
05337                                U_SB_ETH_RX_CQ_INDEX),
05338              (bp->rx_ticks/(4 * BNX2X_BTR)) ? 0 : 1);
05339 
05340         /* HC_INDEX_C_ETH_TX_CQ_CONS */
05341         REG_WR8(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05342             CSTORM_SB_HC_TIMEOUT_C_OFFSET(port, sb_id,
05343                               C_SB_ETH_TX_CQ_INDEX),
05344             bp->tx_ticks/(4 * BNX2X_BTR));
05345         REG_WR16(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM +
05346              CSTORM_SB_HC_DISABLE_C_OFFSET(port, sb_id,
05347                                C_SB_ETH_TX_CQ_INDEX),
05348              (bp->tx_ticks/(4 * BNX2X_BTR)) ? 0 : 1);
05349     }
05350 }
05351 
05352 static inline void bnx2x_free_tpa_pool(struct bnx2x *bp,
05353                        struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp, int last)
05354 {
05355     int i;
05356 
05357     for (i = 0; i < last; i++) {
05358         struct sw_rx_bd *rx_buf = &(fp->tpa_pool[i]);
05359         struct sk_buff *skb = rx_buf->skb;
05360 
05361         if (skb == NULL) {
05362             DP(NETIF_MSG_IFDOWN, "tpa bin %d empty on free\n", i);
05363             continue;
05364         }
05365 
05366         if (fp->tpa_state[i] == BNX2X_TPA_START)
05367             pci_unmap_single(bp->pdev,
05368                      pci_unmap_addr(rx_buf, mapping),
05369                      bp->rx_buf_size, PCI_DMA_FROMDEVICE);
05370 
05371         dev_kfree_skb(skb);
05372         rx_buf->skb = NULL;
05373     }
05374 }
05375 
05376 static void bnx2x_init_rx_rings(struct bnx2x *bp)
05377 {
05378     int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
05379     int max_agg_queues = CHIP_IS_E1(bp) ? ETH_MAX_AGGREGATION_QUEUES_E1 :
05380                           ETH_MAX_AGGREGATION_QUEUES_E1H;
05381     u16 ring_prod, cqe_ring_prod;
05382     int i, j;
05383 
05384     bp->rx_buf_size = bp->dev->mtu + ETH_OVREHEAD + BNX2X_RX_ALIGN;
05385     DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP,
05386        "mtu %d  rx_buf_size %d\n", bp->dev->mtu, bp->rx_buf_size);
05387 
05388     if (bp->flags & TPA_ENABLE_FLAG) {
05389 
05390         for_each_queue(bp, j) {
05391             struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[j];
05392 
05393             for (i = 0; i < max_agg_queues; i++) {
05394                 fp->tpa_pool[i].skb =
05395                    netdev_alloc_skb(bp->dev, bp->rx_buf_size);
05396                 if (!fp->tpa_pool[i].skb) {
05397                     BNX2X_ERR("Failed to allocate TPA "
05398                           "skb pool for queue[%d] - "
05399                           "disabling TPA on this "
05400                           "queue!\n", j);
05401                     bnx2x_free_tpa_pool(bp, fp, i);
05402                     fp->disable_tpa = 1;
05403                     break;
05404                 }
05405                 pci_unmap_addr_set((struct sw_rx_bd *)
05406                             &bp->fp->tpa_pool[i],
05407                            mapping, 0);
05408                 fp->tpa_state[i] = BNX2X_TPA_STOP;
05409             }
05410         }
05411     }
05412 
05413     for_each_queue(bp, j) {
05414         struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[j];
05415 
05416         fp->rx_bd_cons = 0;
05417         fp->rx_cons_sb = BNX2X_RX_SB_INDEX;
05418         fp->rx_bd_cons_sb = BNX2X_RX_SB_BD_INDEX;
05419 
05420 #if defined(__NO_TPA__)
05421         fp->disable_tpa = 1;
05422 #else /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
05423         /* "next page" elements initialization */
05424         /* SGE ring */
05425         for (i = 1; i <= NUM_RX_SGE_PAGES; i++) {
05426             struct eth_rx_sge *sge;
05427 
05428             sge = &fp->rx_sge_ring[RX_SGE_CNT * i - 2];
05429             sge->addr_hi =
05430                 cpu_to_le32(U64_HI(fp->rx_sge_mapping +
05431                     BCM_PAGE_SIZE*(i % NUM_RX_SGE_PAGES)));
05432             sge->addr_lo =
05433                 cpu_to_le32(U64_LO(fp->rx_sge_mapping +
05434                     BCM_PAGE_SIZE*(i % NUM_RX_SGE_PAGES)));
05435         }
05436 
05437         bnx2x_init_sge_ring_bit_mask(fp);
05438 #endif
05439 
05440         /* RX BD ring */
05441         for (i = 1; i <= NUM_RX_RINGS; i++) {
05442             struct eth_rx_bd *rx_bd;
05443 
05444             rx_bd = &fp->rx_desc_ring[RX_DESC_CNT * i - 2];
05445             rx_bd->addr_hi =
05446                 cpu_to_le32(U64_HI(fp->rx_desc_mapping +
05447                         BCM_PAGE_SIZE*(i % NUM_RX_RINGS)));
05448             rx_bd->addr_lo =
05449                 cpu_to_le32(U64_LO(fp->rx_desc_mapping +
05450                         BCM_PAGE_SIZE*(i % NUM_RX_RINGS)));
05451         }
05452 
05453         /* CQ ring */
05454         for (i = 1; i <= NUM_RCQ_RINGS; i++) {
05455             struct eth_rx_cqe_next_page *nextpg;
05456 
05457             nextpg = (struct eth_rx_cqe_next_page *)
05458                 &fp->rx_comp_ring[RCQ_DESC_CNT * i - 1];
05459             nextpg->addr_hi =
05460                 cpu_to_le32(U64_HI(fp->rx_comp_mapping +
05461                        BCM_PAGE_SIZE*(i % NUM_RCQ_RINGS)));
05462             nextpg->addr_lo =
05463                 cpu_to_le32(U64_LO(fp->rx_comp_mapping +
05464                        BCM_PAGE_SIZE*(i % NUM_RCQ_RINGS)));
05465         }
05466 
05467 #if !defined(__NO_TPA__) /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
05468         /* Allocate SGEs and initialize the ring elements */
05469         for (i = 0, ring_prod = 0;
05470              i < MAX_RX_SGE_CNT*NUM_RX_SGE_PAGES; i++) {
05471 
05472             if (bnx2x_alloc_rx_sge(bp, fp, ring_prod) < 0) {
05473                 BNX2X_ERR("was only able to allocate "
05474                       "%d rx sges\n", i);
05475                 BNX2X_ERR("disabling TPA for queue[%d]\n", j);
05476                 /* Cleanup already allocated elements */
05477                 bnx2x_free_rx_sge_range(bp, fp, ring_prod);
05478                 bnx2x_free_tpa_pool(bp, fp, max_agg_queues);
05479                 fp->disable_tpa = 1;
05480                 ring_prod = 0;
05481                 break;
05482             }
05483             ring_prod = NEXT_SGE_IDX(ring_prod);
05484         }
05485         fp->rx_sge_prod = ring_prod;
05486 #endif
05487 
05488         /* Allocate BDs and initialize BD ring */
05489         fp->rx_comp_cons = 0;
05490         cqe_ring_prod = ring_prod = 0;
05491         for (i = 0; i < bp->rx_ring_size; i++) {
05492             if (bnx2x_alloc_rx_skb(bp, fp, ring_prod) < 0) {
05493                 BNX2X_ERR("was only able to allocate "
05494                       "%d rx skbs on queue[%d]\n", i, j);
05495                 fp->eth_q_stats.rx_skb_alloc_failed++;
05496                 break;
05497             }
05498             ring_prod = NEXT_RX_IDX(ring_prod);
05499             cqe_ring_prod = NEXT_RCQ_IDX(cqe_ring_prod);
05500             WARN_ON(ring_prod <= i);
05501         }
05502 
05503         fp->rx_bd_prod = ring_prod;
05504         /* must not have more available CQEs than BDs */
05505         fp->rx_comp_prod = min_t(u16, NUM_RCQ_RINGS*RCQ_DESC_CNT,
05506                      cqe_ring_prod);
05507         fp->rx_pkt = fp->rx_calls = 0;
05508 
05509         /* Warning!
05510          * this will generate an interrupt (to the TSTORM)
05511          * must only be done after chip is initialized
05512          */
05513         bnx2x_update_rx_prod(bp, fp, ring_prod, fp->rx_comp_prod,
05514                      fp->rx_sge_prod);
05515         if (j != 0)
05516             continue;
05517 
05518         REG_WR(bp, BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM +
05519                USTORM_MEM_WORKAROUND_ADDRESS_OFFSET(func),
05520                U64_LO(fp->rx_comp_mapping));
05521         REG_WR(bp, BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM +
05522                USTORM_MEM_WORKAROUND_ADDRESS_OFFSET(func) + 4,
05523                U64_HI(fp->rx_comp_mapping));
05524     }
05525 }
05526 
05527 static void bnx2x_init_tx_ring(struct bnx2x *bp)
05528 {
05529     int i, j;
05530 
05531     for_each_queue(bp, j) {
05532         struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[j];
05533 
05534         for (i = 1; i <= NUM_TX_RINGS; i++) {
05535             struct eth_tx_next_bd *tx_next_bd =
05536                 &fp->tx_desc_ring[TX_DESC_CNT * i - 1].next_bd;
05537 
05538             tx_next_bd->addr_hi =
05539                 cpu_to_le32(U64_HI(fp->tx_desc_mapping +
05540                         BCM_PAGE_SIZE*(i % NUM_TX_RINGS)));
05541             tx_next_bd->addr_lo =
05542                 cpu_to_le32(U64_LO(fp->tx_desc_mapping +
05543                         BCM_PAGE_SIZE*(i % NUM_TX_RINGS)));
05544         }
05545 
05546         fp->tx_db.data.header.header = DOORBELL_HDR_DB_TYPE;
05547         fp->tx_db.data.zero_fill1 = 0;
05548         fp->tx_db.data.prod = 0;
05549 
05550         fp->tx_pkt_prod = 0;
05551         fp->tx_pkt_cons = 0;
05552         fp->tx_bd_prod = 0;
05553         fp->tx_bd_cons = 0;
05554         fp->tx_cons_sb = BNX2X_TX_SB_INDEX;
05555         fp->tx_pkt = 0;
05556     }
05557 }
05558 
05559 static void bnx2x_init_sp_ring(struct bnx2x *bp)
05560 {
05561     int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
05562 
05563     spin_lock_init(&bp->spq_lock);
05564 
05565     bp->spq_left = MAX_SPQ_PENDING;
05566     bp->spq_prod_idx = 0;
05567     bp->dsb_sp_prod = BNX2X_SP_DSB_INDEX;
05568     bp->spq_prod_bd = bp->spq;
05569     bp->spq_last_bd = bp->spq_prod_bd + MAX_SP_DESC_CNT;
05570 
05571     REG_WR(bp, XSEM_REG_FAST_MEMORY + XSTORM_SPQ_PAGE_BASE_OFFSET(func),
05572            U64_LO(bp->spq_mapping));
05573     REG_WR(bp,
05574            XSEM_REG_FAST_MEMORY + XSTORM_SPQ_PAGE_BASE_OFFSET(func) + 4,
05575            U64_HI(bp->spq_mapping));
05576 
05577     REG_WR(bp, XSEM_REG_FAST_MEMORY + XSTORM_SPQ_PROD_OFFSET(func),
05578            bp->spq_prod_idx);
05579 }
05580 
05581 static void bnx2x_init_context(struct bnx2x *bp)
05582 {
05583     int i;
05584 
05585     /* Rx */
05586     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
05587         struct eth_context *context = bnx2x_sp(bp, context[i].eth);
05588         struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[i];
05589         u8 cl_id = fp->cl_id;
05590 
05591         context->ustorm_st_context.common.sb_index_numbers =
05592                         BNX2X_RX_SB_INDEX_NUM;
05593         context->ustorm_st_context.common.clientId = cl_id;
05594         context->ustorm_st_context.common.status_block_id = fp->sb_id;
05595         context->ustorm_st_context.common.flags =
05596             (USTORM_ETH_ST_CONTEXT_CONFIG_ENABLE_MC_ALIGNMENT |
05597              USTORM_ETH_ST_CONTEXT_CONFIG_ENABLE_STATISTICS);
05598         context->ustorm_st_context.common.statistics_counter_id =
05599                         cl_id;
05600         context->ustorm_st_context.common.mc_alignment_log_size =
05601                         BNX2X_RX_ALIGN_SHIFT;
05602         context->ustorm_st_context.common.bd_buff_size =
05603                         bp->rx_buf_size;
05604         context->ustorm_st_context.common.bd_page_base_hi =
05605                         U64_HI(fp->rx_desc_mapping);
05606         context->ustorm_st_context.common.bd_page_base_lo =
05607                         U64_LO(fp->rx_desc_mapping);
05608         if (!fp->disable_tpa) {
05609             context->ustorm_st_context.common.flags |=
05610                 USTORM_ETH_ST_CONTEXT_CONFIG_ENABLE_TPA;
05611             context->ustorm_st_context.common.sge_buff_size =
05612                 (u16)min_t(u32, SGE_PAGE_SIZE*PAGES_PER_SGE,
05613                        0xffff);
05614             context->ustorm_st_context.common.sge_page_base_hi =
05615                         U64_HI(fp->rx_sge_mapping);
05616             context->ustorm_st_context.common.sge_page_base_lo =
05617                         U64_LO(fp->rx_sge_mapping);
05618 
05619             context->ustorm_st_context.common.max_sges_for_packet =
05620                 SGE_PAGE_ALIGN(bp->dev->mtu) >> SGE_PAGE_SHIFT;
05621             context->ustorm_st_context.common.max_sges_for_packet =
05622                 ((context->ustorm_st_context.common.
05623                   max_sges_for_packet + PAGES_PER_SGE - 1) &
05624                  (~(PAGES_PER_SGE - 1))) >> PAGES_PER_SGE_SHIFT;
05625         }
05626 
05627         context->ustorm_ag_context.cdu_usage =
05628             CDU_RSRVD_VALUE_TYPE_A(HW_CID(bp, i),
05629                            CDU_REGION_NUMBER_UCM_AG,
05630                            ETH_CONNECTION_TYPE);
05631 
05632 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
05633         switch (bp->multi_mode) {
05634         case ETH_RSS_MODE_DISABLED:
05635         case ETH_RSS_MODE_REGULAR:
05636             break;
05637 
05638         case ETH_RSS_MODE_VLAN_PRI:
05639         case ETH_RSS_MODE_E1HOV_PRI:
05640         case ETH_RSS_MODE_IP_DSCP:
05641             context->xstorm_st_context.safc_group_en = 1;
05642             context->xstorm_st_context.safc_group_num = fp->cos;
05643             break;
05644 
05645         default:
05646             break;
05647         }
05648 #endif
05649         context->xstorm_ag_context.cdu_reserved =
05650             CDU_RSRVD_VALUE_TYPE_A(HW_CID(bp, i),
05651                            CDU_REGION_NUMBER_XCM_AG,
05652                            ETH_CONNECTION_TYPE);
05653     }
05654 
05655     /* Tx */
05656     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
05657         struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[i];
05658         struct eth_context *context =
05659             bnx2x_sp(bp, context[i].eth);
05660 
05661         context->cstorm_st_context.sb_index_number =
05662                         C_SB_ETH_TX_CQ_INDEX;
05663         context->cstorm_st_context.status_block_id = fp->sb_id;
05664 
05665         context->xstorm_st_context.tx_bd_page_base_hi =
05666                         U64_HI(fp->tx_desc_mapping);
05667         context->xstorm_st_context.tx_bd_page_base_lo =
05668                         U64_LO(fp->tx_desc_mapping);
05669         context->xstorm_st_context.statistics_data = (fp->cl_id |
05670                 XSTORM_ETH_ST_CONTEXT_STATISTICS_ENABLE);
05671     }
05672 }
05673 
05674 static void bnx2x_init_ind_table(struct bnx2x *bp)
05675 {
05676     int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
05677 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC
05678     int i, cos;
05679     u8 val;
05680 #else /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
05681     int i;
05682 #endif
05683 
05684     if (bp->multi_mode == ETH_RSS_MODE_DISABLED)
05685         return;
05686 
05687     DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP,
05688        "Initializing indirection table  multi_mode %d\n", bp->multi_mode);
05689 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC
05690     for (i = 0; i < TSTORM_INDIRECTION_TABLE_SIZE; i++) {
05691         cos = bp->pri_map[i / BNX2X_MAX_ENTRIES_PER_PRI];
05692         val = bp->fp->cl_id + bp->cos_map[cos] +
05693               (i % bp->qs_per_cos[cos]);
05694         REG_WR8(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM +
05695             TSTORM_INDIRECTION_TABLE_OFFSET(func) + i, val);
05696     }
05697 #else /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
05698     for (i = 0; i < TSTORM_INDIRECTION_TABLE_SIZE; i++)
05699         REG_WR8(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM +
05700             TSTORM_INDIRECTION_TABLE_OFFSET(func) + i,
05701             bp->fp->cl_id + (i % bp->num_queues));
05702 #endif
05703 }
05704 
05705 static void bnx2x_set_client_config(struct bnx2x *bp)
05706 {
05707     struct tstorm_eth_client_config tstorm_client = {0};
05708     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
05709     int i;
05710 
05711     tstorm_client.mtu = bp->dev->mtu;
05712     tstorm_client.config_flags =
05713                 (TSTORM_ETH_CLIENT_CONFIG_STATSITICS_ENABLE |
05714                  TSTORM_ETH_CLIENT_CONFIG_E1HOV_REM_ENABLE);
05715 #ifdef BCM_VLAN
05716     if (bp->rx_mode && bp->vlgrp && (bp->flags & HW_VLAN_RX_FLAG)) {
05717         tstorm_client.config_flags |=
05718                 TSTORM_ETH_CLIENT_CONFIG_VLAN_REM_ENABLE;
05719         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "vlan removal enabled\n");
05720     }
05721 #endif
05722 
05723     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
05724         tstorm_client.statistics_counter_id = bp->fp[i].cl_id;
05725 
05726         REG_WR(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM +
05727                TSTORM_CLIENT_CONFIG_OFFSET(port, bp->fp[i].cl_id),
05728                ((u32 *)&tstorm_client)[0]);
05729         REG_WR(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM +
05730                TSTORM_CLIENT_CONFIG_OFFSET(port, bp->fp[i].cl_id) + 4,
05731                ((u32 *)&tstorm_client)[1]);
05732     }
05733 
05734     DP(BNX2X_MSG_OFF, "tstorm_client: 0x%08x 0x%08x\n",
05735        ((u32 *)&tstorm_client)[0], ((u32 *)&tstorm_client)[1]);
05736 }
05737 
05738 void bnx2x_set_storm_rx_mode(struct bnx2x *bp)
05739 {
05740     struct tstorm_eth_mac_filter_config tstorm_mac_filter = {0};
05741     int mode = bp->rx_mode;
05742     int mask = bp->rx_mode_cl_mask;
05743     int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
05744     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
05745     int i;
05746     /* All but management unicast packets should pass to the host as well */
05747     u32 llh_mask =
05748         NIG_LLH0_BRB1_DRV_MASK_REG_LLH0_BRB1_DRV_MASK_BRCST |
05749         NIG_LLH0_BRB1_DRV_MASK_REG_LLH0_BRB1_DRV_MASK_MLCST |
05750         NIG_LLH0_BRB1_DRV_MASK_REG_LLH0_BRB1_DRV_MASK_VLAN |
05751         NIG_LLH0_BRB1_DRV_MASK_REG_LLH0_BRB1_DRV_MASK_NO_VLAN;
05752 
05753     DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "rx mode %d  mask 0x%x\n", mode, mask);
05754 
05755     switch (mode) {
05756     case BNX2X_RX_MODE_NONE: /* no Rx */
05757         tstorm_mac_filter.ucast_drop_all = mask;
05758         tstorm_mac_filter.mcast_drop_all = mask;
05759         tstorm_mac_filter.bcast_drop_all = mask;
05760         break;
05761 
05762     case BNX2X_RX_MODE_NORMAL:
05763         tstorm_mac_filter.bcast_accept_all = mask;
05764         break;
05765 
05766     case BNX2X_RX_MODE_ALLMULTI:
05767         tstorm_mac_filter.mcast_accept_all = mask;
05768         tstorm_mac_filter.bcast_accept_all = mask;
05769         break;
05770 
05771     case BNX2X_RX_MODE_PROMISC:
05772         tstorm_mac_filter.ucast_accept_all = mask;
05773         tstorm_mac_filter.mcast_accept_all = mask;
05774         tstorm_mac_filter.bcast_accept_all = mask;
05775         /* pass management unicast packets as well */
05776         llh_mask |= NIG_LLH0_BRB1_DRV_MASK_REG_LLH0_BRB1_DRV_MASK_UNCST;
05777         break;
05778 
05779     default:
05780         BNX2X_ERR("BAD rx mode (%d)\n", mode);
05781         break;
05782     }
05783 
05784     REG_WR(bp,
05785            (port ? NIG_REG_LLH1_BRB1_DRV_MASK : NIG_REG_LLH0_BRB1_DRV_MASK),
05786            llh_mask);
05787 
05788     for (i = 0; i < sizeof(struct tstorm_eth_mac_filter_config)/4; i++) {
05789         REG_WR(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM +
05790                TSTORM_MAC_FILTER_CONFIG_OFFSET(func) + i * 4,
05791                ((u32 *)&tstorm_mac_filter)[i]);
05792 
05793 /*      DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "tstorm_mac_filter[%d]: 0x%08x\n", i,
05794            ((u32 *)&tstorm_mac_filter)[i]); */
05795     }
05796 
05797     if (mode != BNX2X_RX_MODE_NONE)
05798         bnx2x_set_client_config(bp);
05799 }
05800 
05801 static void bnx2x_init_internal_common(struct bnx2x *bp)
05802 {
05803     int i;
05804 
05805     /* Zero this manually as its initialization is
05806        currently missing in the initTool */
05807     for (i = 0; i < (USTORM_AGG_DATA_SIZE >> 2); i++)
05808         REG_WR(bp, BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM +
05809                USTORM_AGG_DATA_OFFSET + i * 4, 0);
05810 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
05811     if (bp->flags & SAFC_TX_FLAG) {
05812         REG_WR(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM +
05813                TSTORM_COMMON_SAFC_WORKAROUND_ENABLE_OFFSET, 1);
05814         REG_WR(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM +
05815                TSTORM_COMMON_SAFC_WORKAROUND_TIMEOUT_10USEC_OFFSET, 10);
05816         REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_SW_TIMER_VAL + 0xc, 10);
05817         REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_SW_TIMER_RELOAD_VAL_4, 10);
05818     }
05819 #endif
05820 }
05821 
05822 static void bnx2x_init_internal_port(struct bnx2x *bp)
05823 {
05824     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
05825 
05826     REG_WR(bp,
05827            BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM + CSTORM_HC_BTR_U_OFFSET(port), BNX2X_BTR);
05828     REG_WR(bp,
05829            BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM + CSTORM_HC_BTR_C_OFFSET(port), BNX2X_BTR);
05830     REG_WR(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM + TSTORM_HC_BTR_OFFSET(port), BNX2X_BTR);
05831     REG_WR(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM + XSTORM_HC_BTR_OFFSET(port), BNX2X_BTR);
05832 }
05833 
05834 static void bnx2x_init_internal_func(struct bnx2x *bp)
05835 {
05836     struct tstorm_eth_function_common_config tstorm_config = {0};
05837     struct stats_indication_flags stats_flags = {0};
05838     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
05839     int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
05840     int i, j;
05841     u32 offset;
05842     u16 max_agg_size;
05843 
05844     if (is_multi(bp)) {
05845 #if defined(__VMKLNX__) && defined(__VMKNETDDI_QUEUEOPS__)
05846         /* enable queue 0 as the default queue */
05847         tstorm_config.config_flags =
05848             TSTORM_ETH_FUNCTION_COMMON_CONFIG_DEFAULT_ENABLE;
05849 #else /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
05850         tstorm_config.config_flags = MULTI_FLAGS(bp);
05851         tstorm_config.rss_result_mask = MULTI_MASK;
05852 #endif
05853     }
05854 
05855     /* Enable TPA if needed */
05856     if (bp->flags & TPA_ENABLE_FLAG)
05857         tstorm_config.config_flags |=
05858             TSTORM_ETH_FUNCTION_COMMON_CONFIG_ENABLE_TPA;
05859 
05860     if (IS_E1HMF(bp))
05861         tstorm_config.config_flags |=
05862                 TSTORM_ETH_FUNCTION_COMMON_CONFIG_E1HOV_IN_CAM;
05863 
05864     tstorm_config.leading_client_id = BP_L_ID(bp);
05865 
05866     REG_WR(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM +
05867            TSTORM_FUNCTION_COMMON_CONFIG_OFFSET(func),
05868            (*(u32 *)&tstorm_config));
05869 
05870     bp->rx_mode = BNX2X_RX_MODE_NONE; /* no rx until link is up */
05871     bp->rx_mode_cl_mask = (1 << BP_L_ID(bp));
05872     bnx2x_set_storm_rx_mode(bp);
05873 
05874     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
05875         u8 cl_id = bp->fp[i].cl_id;
05876 
05877         /* reset xstorm per client statistics */
05878         offset = BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM +
05879              XSTORM_PER_COUNTER_ID_STATS_OFFSET(port, cl_id);
05880         for (j = 0;
05881              j < sizeof(struct xstorm_per_client_stats) / 4; j++)
05882             REG_WR(bp, offset + j*4, 0);
05883 
05884         /* reset tstorm per client statistics */
05885         offset = BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM +
05886              TSTORM_PER_COUNTER_ID_STATS_OFFSET(port, cl_id);
05887         for (j = 0;
05888              j < sizeof(struct tstorm_per_client_stats) / 4; j++)
05889             REG_WR(bp, offset + j*4, 0);
05890 
05891         /* reset ustorm per client statistics */
05892         offset = BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM +
05893              USTORM_PER_COUNTER_ID_STATS_OFFSET(port, cl_id);
05894         for (j = 0;
05895              j < sizeof(struct ustorm_per_client_stats) / 4; j++)
05896             REG_WR(bp, offset + j*4, 0);
05897     }
05898 
05899     /* Init statistics related context */
05900     stats_flags.collect_eth = 1;
05901 
05902     REG_WR(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM + XSTORM_STATS_FLAGS_OFFSET(func),
05903            ((u32 *)&stats_flags)[0]);
05904     REG_WR(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM + XSTORM_STATS_FLAGS_OFFSET(func) + 4,
05905            ((u32 *)&stats_flags)[1]);
05906 
05907     REG_WR(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM + TSTORM_STATS_FLAGS_OFFSET(func),
05908            ((u32 *)&stats_flags)[0]);
05909     REG_WR(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM + TSTORM_STATS_FLAGS_OFFSET(func) + 4,
05910            ((u32 *)&stats_flags)[1]);
05911 
05912     REG_WR(bp, BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM + USTORM_STATS_FLAGS_OFFSET(func),
05913            ((u32 *)&stats_flags)[0]);
05914     REG_WR(bp, BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM + USTORM_STATS_FLAGS_OFFSET(func) + 4,
05915            ((u32 *)&stats_flags)[1]);
05916 
05917     REG_WR(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM + CSTORM_STATS_FLAGS_OFFSET(func),
05918            ((u32 *)&stats_flags)[0]);
05919     REG_WR(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM + CSTORM_STATS_FLAGS_OFFSET(func) + 4,
05920            ((u32 *)&stats_flags)[1]);
05921 
05922     REG_WR(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM +
05923            XSTORM_ETH_STATS_QUERY_ADDR_OFFSET(func),
05924            U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, fw_stats)));
05925     REG_WR(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM +
05926            XSTORM_ETH_STATS_QUERY_ADDR_OFFSET(func) + 4,
05927            U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, fw_stats)));
05928 
05929     REG_WR(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM +
05930            TSTORM_ETH_STATS_QUERY_ADDR_OFFSET(func),
05931            U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, fw_stats)));
05932     REG_WR(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM +
05933            TSTORM_ETH_STATS_QUERY_ADDR_OFFSET(func) + 4,
05934            U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, fw_stats)));
05935 
05936     REG_WR(bp, BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM +
05937            USTORM_ETH_STATS_QUERY_ADDR_OFFSET(func),
05938            U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, fw_stats)));
05939     REG_WR(bp, BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM +
05940            USTORM_ETH_STATS_QUERY_ADDR_OFFSET(func) + 4,
05941            U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, fw_stats)));
05942 
05943     if (CHIP_IS_E1H(bp)) {
05944         REG_WR8(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM + XSTORM_FUNCTION_MODE_OFFSET,
05945             IS_E1HMF(bp));
05946         REG_WR8(bp, BAR_TSTRORM_INTMEM + TSTORM_FUNCTION_MODE_OFFSET,
05947             IS_E1HMF(bp));
05948         REG_WR8(bp, BAR_CSTRORM_INTMEM + CSTORM_FUNCTION_MODE_OFFSET,
05949             IS_E1HMF(bp));
05950         REG_WR8(bp, BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM + USTORM_FUNCTION_MODE_OFFSET,
05951             IS_E1HMF(bp));
05952 
05953         REG_WR16(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM + XSTORM_E1HOV_OFFSET(func),
05954              bp->e1hov);
05955     }
05956 
05957     /* Init CQ ring mapping and aggregation size, the FW limit is 8 frags */
05958     max_agg_size = min_t(u32, (min_t(u32, 8, MAX_SKB_FRAGS) *
05959                    SGE_PAGE_SIZE * PAGES_PER_SGE), 0xffff);
05960     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
05961         struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[i];
05962 
05963         REG_WR(bp, BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM +
05964                USTORM_CQE_PAGE_BASE_OFFSET(port, fp->cl_id),
05965                U64_LO(fp->rx_comp_mapping));
05966         REG_WR(bp, BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM +
05967                USTORM_CQE_PAGE_BASE_OFFSET(port, fp->cl_id) + 4,
05968                U64_HI(fp->rx_comp_mapping));
05969 
05970         /* Next page */
05971         REG_WR(bp, BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM +
05972                USTORM_CQE_PAGE_NEXT_OFFSET(port, fp->cl_id),
05973                U64_LO(fp->rx_comp_mapping + BCM_PAGE_SIZE));
05974         REG_WR(bp, BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM +
05975                USTORM_CQE_PAGE_NEXT_OFFSET(port, fp->cl_id) + 4,
05976                U64_HI(fp->rx_comp_mapping + BCM_PAGE_SIZE));
05977 
05978         REG_WR16(bp, BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM +
05979              USTORM_MAX_AGG_SIZE_OFFSET(port, fp->cl_id),
05980              max_agg_size);
05981     }
05982 
05983     /* dropless flow control */
05984     if (CHIP_IS_E1H(bp)) {
05985         struct ustorm_eth_rx_pause_data_e1h rx_pause = {0};
05986 
05987         rx_pause.bd_thr_low = 250;
05988         rx_pause.cqe_thr_low = 250;
05989         rx_pause.cos = 1;
05990         rx_pause.sge_thr_low = 0;
05991         rx_pause.bd_thr_high = 350;
05992         rx_pause.cqe_thr_high = 350;
05993         rx_pause.sge_thr_high = 0;
05994 
05995         for_each_queue(bp, i) {
05996             struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[i];
05997 
05998             if (!fp->disable_tpa) {
05999                 rx_pause.sge_thr_low = 150;
06000                 rx_pause.sge_thr_high = 250;
06001             }
06002 
06003 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
06004             if (bp->flags & SAFC_TX_FLAG) {
06005                 rx_pause.cos = 0;
06006                 for (j = 0; j < BNX2X_MAX_PRIORITY; j++)
06007                     if (bp->pri_map[j] == fp->cos)
06008                         rx_pause.cos |= (1 << j);
06009             }
06010 #endif
06011 
06012             offset = BAR_USTRORM_INTMEM +
06013                  USTORM_ETH_RING_PAUSE_DATA_OFFSET(port,
06014                                    fp->cl_id);
06015             for (j = 0;
06016                  j < sizeof(struct ustorm_eth_rx_pause_data_e1h)/4;
06017                  j++)
06018                 REG_WR(bp, offset + j*4,
06019                        ((u32 *)&rx_pause)[j]);
06020         }
06021     }
06022 
06023     memset(&(bp->cmng), 0, sizeof(struct cmng_struct_per_port));
06024 
06025     /* Init rate shaping and fairness contexts */
06026     if (IS_E1HMF(bp)) {
06027         int vn;
06028 
06029         /* During init there is no active link
06030            Until link is up, set link rate to 10Gbps */
06031         bp->link_vars.line_speed = SPEED_10000;
06032         bnx2x_init_port_minmax(bp);
06033 
06034         if (!BP_NOMCP(bp))
06035             bp->mf_config =
06036                   SHMEM_RD(bp, mf_cfg.func_mf_config[func].config);
06037         bnx2x_calc_vn_weight_sum(bp);
06038 
06039         for (vn = VN_0; vn < E1HVN_MAX; vn++)
06040             bnx2x_init_vn_minmax(bp, 2*vn + port);
06041 
06042         /* Enable rate shaping and fairness */
06043         bp->cmng.flags.cmng_enables |=
06044                     CMNG_FLAGS_PER_PORT_RATE_SHAPING_VN;
06045 
06046     } else {
06047 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC
06048         if (bp->cos_weight_sum) {
06049             /* During init there is no active link
06050                Until link is up, set link rate to 10Gbps */
06051             bp->link_vars.line_speed = SPEED_10000;
06052             bnx2x_init_port_minmax(bp);
06053 
06054             bnx2x_init_cos_credit(bp);
06055 
06056             /* Enable fairness */
06057             bp->cmng.flags.cmng_enables =
06058                     CMNG_FLAGS_PER_PORT_FAIRNESS_COS;
06059         } else
06060             DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "All MIN values are zeroes"
06061                "  fairness will be disabled\n");
06062 #else /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
06063         /* rate shaping and fairness are disabled */
06064         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP,
06065            "single function mode  minmax will be disabled\n");
06066 #endif
06067     }
06068 
06069 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
06070     switch (bp->multi_mode) {
06071     case ETH_RSS_MODE_DISABLED:
06072     case ETH_RSS_MODE_REGULAR:
06073         break;
06074 
06075     case ETH_RSS_MODE_VLAN_PRI:
06076     case ETH_RSS_MODE_E1HOV_PRI:
06077     case ETH_RSS_MODE_IP_DSCP:
06078         bp->cmng.safc_vars.safc_timeout_usec = 200;
06079         for (i = 0; i < BNX2X_MAX_PRIORITY; i++)
06080             bp->cmng.safc_vars.cos_to_pause_mask[i] =
06081                             (1 << bp->pri_map[i]);
06082         break;
06083 
06084     default:
06085         break;
06086     }
06087 #endif
06088 
06089     /* Store cmng structures to internal memory */
06090     if (bp->port.pmf)
06091         for (i = 0; i < sizeof(struct cmng_struct_per_port) / 4; i++)
06092             REG_WR(bp, BAR_XSTRORM_INTMEM +
06093                    XSTORM_CMNG_PER_PORT_VARS_OFFSET(port) + i * 4,
06094                    ((u32 *)(&bp->cmng))[i]);
06095 }
06096 
06097 static void bnx2x_init_internal(struct bnx2x *bp, u32 load_code)
06098 {
06099     switch (load_code) {
06100     case FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_LOAD_COMMON:
06101         bnx2x_init_internal_common(bp);
06102         /* no break */
06103 
06104     case FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_LOAD_PORT:
06105         bnx2x_init_internal_port(bp);
06106         /* no break */
06107 
06108     case FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_LOAD_FUNCTION:
06109         bnx2x_init_internal_func(bp);
06110         break;
06111 
06112     default:
06113         BNX2X_ERR("Unknown load_code (0x%x) from MCP\n", load_code);
06114         break;
06115     }
06116 }
06117 
06118 static void bnx2x_nic_init(struct bnx2x *bp, u32 load_code)
06119 {
06120     int i;
06121 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
06122     int cos, num_queues;
06123 #endif
06124 
06125     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
06126         struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[i];
06127 
06128         fp->bp = bp;
06129         fp->state = BNX2X_FP_STATE_CLOSED;
06130         fp->index = i;
06131         fp->cl_id = BP_L_ID(bp) + i;
06132 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
06133         fp->sb_id = fp->cl_id + 1;
06134 #else
06135         fp->sb_id = fp->cl_id;
06136 #endif
06137 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC
06138         num_queues = 0;
06139         for (cos = 0; cos < BNX2X_MAX_COS; cos++) {
06140             if (i < (num_queues + bp->qs_per_cos[cos])) {
06141                 fp->cos = cos;
06142                 break;
06143             } else
06144                 num_queues += bp->qs_per_cos[cos];
06145         }
06146         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "queue[%d]:  bnx2x_init_sb(%p,%p)  "
06147                    "cl_id %d  sb %d  cos %d\n",
06148            i, bp, fp->status_blk, fp->cl_id, fp->sb_id, fp->cos);
06149 #else /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
06150         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP,
06151            "queue[%d]:  bnx2x_init_sb(%p,%p)  cl_id %d  sb %d\n",
06152            i, bp, fp->status_blk, fp->cl_id, fp->sb_id);
06153 #endif
06154         bnx2x_init_sb(bp, fp->status_blk, fp->status_blk_mapping,
06155                   fp->sb_id);
06156         bnx2x_update_fpsb_idx(fp);
06157     }
06158 
06159     /* ensure status block indices were read */
06160     rmb();
06161 
06162 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
06163     for (cos = 0; cos < BNX2X_MAX_COS; cos++) {
06164         bp->cos_map[cos] = 0;
06165         for_each_queue(bp, i) {
06166             /* take the 1st queue that belongs to this cos */
06167             if (bp->fp[i].cos == cos) {
06168                 bp->cos_map[cos] = i;
06169                 break;
06170             }
06171         }
06172     }
06173 #endif
06174 
06175     bnx2x_init_def_sb(bp, bp->def_status_blk, bp->def_status_blk_mapping,
06176               DEF_SB_ID);
06177     bnx2x_update_dsb_idx(bp);
06178     bnx2x_update_coalesce(bp);
06179     bnx2x_init_rx_rings(bp);
06180     bnx2x_init_tx_ring(bp);
06181     bnx2x_init_sp_ring(bp);
06182     bnx2x_init_context(bp);
06183     bnx2x_init_internal(bp, load_code);
06184     bnx2x_init_ind_table(bp);
06185     bnx2x_stats_init(bp);
06186 
06187     /* At this point, we are ready for interrupts */
06188     atomic_set(&bp->intr_sem, 0);
06189 
06190     /* flush all before enabling interrupts */
06191     mb();
06192     mmiowb();
06193 
06194     bnx2x_int_enable(bp);
06195 
06196     /* Check for SPIO5 */
06197     bnx2x_attn_int_deasserted0(bp,
06198         REG_RD(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_AFTER_INVERT_1_FUNC_0 + BP_PORT(bp)*4) &
06199                    AEU_INPUTS_ATTN_BITS_SPIO5);
06200 }
06201 
06202 /* end of nic init */
06203 
06204 /*
06205  * gzip service functions
06206  */
06207 
06208 static int bnx2x_gunzip_init(struct bnx2x *bp)
06209 {
06210     bp->gunzip_buf = pci_alloc_consistent(bp->pdev, FW_BUF_SIZE,
06211                           &bp->gunzip_mapping);
06212     if (bp->gunzip_buf  == NULL)
06213         goto gunzip_nomem1;
06214 
06215     bp->strm = kmalloc(sizeof(*bp->strm), GFP_KERNEL);
06216     if (bp->strm  == NULL)
06217         goto gunzip_nomem2;
06218 
06219     bp->strm->workspace = kmalloc(zlib_inflate_workspacesize(),
06220                       GFP_KERNEL);
06221     if (bp->strm->workspace == NULL)
06222         goto gunzip_nomem3;
06223 
06224     return 0;
06225 
06226 gunzip_nomem3:
06227     kfree(bp->strm);
06228     bp->strm = NULL;
06229 
06230 gunzip_nomem2:
06231     pci_free_consistent(bp->pdev, FW_BUF_SIZE, bp->gunzip_buf,
06232                 bp->gunzip_mapping);
06233     bp->gunzip_buf = NULL;
06234 
06235 gunzip_nomem1:
06236     printk(KERN_ERR PFX "%s: Cannot allocate firmware buffer for"
06237            " un-compression\n", bp->dev->name);
06238     return -ENOMEM;
06239 }
06240 
06241 static void bnx2x_gunzip_end(struct bnx2x *bp)
06242 {
06243     kfree(bp->strm->workspace);
06244 
06245     kfree(bp->strm);
06246     bp->strm = NULL;
06247 
06248     if (bp->gunzip_buf) {
06249         pci_free_consistent(bp->pdev, FW_BUF_SIZE, bp->gunzip_buf,
06250                     bp->gunzip_mapping);
06251         bp->gunzip_buf = NULL;
06252     }
06253 }
06254 
06255 static int bnx2x_gunzip(struct bnx2x *bp, const u8 *zbuf, int len)
06256 {
06257     int n, rc;
06258 
06259     /* check gzip header */
06260     if ((zbuf[0] != 0x1f) || (zbuf[1] != 0x8b) || (zbuf[2] != Z_DEFLATED)) {
06261         BNX2X_ERR("Bad gzip header\n");
06262         return -EINVAL;
06263     }
06264 
06265     n = 10;
06266 
06267 #define FNAME               0x8
06268 
06269     if (zbuf[3] & FNAME)
06270         while ((zbuf[n++] != 0) && (n < len));
06271 
06272     bp->strm->next_in = (typeof(bp->strm->next_in))zbuf + n;
06273     bp->strm->avail_in = len - n;
06274     bp->strm->next_out = bp->gunzip_buf;
06275     bp->strm->avail_out = FW_BUF_SIZE;
06276 
06277     rc = zlib_inflateInit2(bp->strm, -MAX_WBITS);
06278     if (rc != Z_OK)
06279         return rc;
06280 
06281     rc = zlib_inflate(bp->strm, Z_FINISH);
06282     if ((rc != Z_OK) && (rc != Z_STREAM_END))
06283         printk(KERN_ERR PFX "%s: Firmware decompression error: %s\n",
06284                bp->dev->name, bp->strm->msg);
06285 
06286     bp->gunzip_outlen = (FW_BUF_SIZE - bp->strm->avail_out);
06287     if (bp->gunzip_outlen & 0x3)
06288         printk(KERN_ERR PFX "%s: Firmware decompression error:"
06289                     " gunzip_outlen (%d) not aligned\n",
06290                bp->dev->name, bp->gunzip_outlen);
06291     bp->gunzip_outlen >>= 2;
06292 
06293     zlib_inflateEnd(bp->strm);
06294 
06295     if (rc == Z_STREAM_END)
06296         return 0;
06297 
06298     return rc;
06299 }
06300 
06301 /* nic load/unload */
06302 
06303 /*
06304  * General service functions
06305  */
06306 
06307 /* send a NIG loopback debug packet */
06308 static void bnx2x_lb_pckt(struct bnx2x *bp)
06309 {
06310     u32 wb_write[3];
06311 
06312     /* Ethernet source and destination addresses */
06313     wb_write[0] = 0x55555555;
06314     wb_write[1] = 0x55555555;
06315     wb_write[2] = 0x20;     /* SOP */
06316     REG_WR_DMAE(bp, NIG_REG_DEBUG_PACKET_LB, wb_write, 3);
06317 
06318     /* NON-IP protocol */
06319     wb_write[0] = 0x09000000;
06320     wb_write[1] = 0x55555555;
06321     wb_write[2] = 0x10;     /* EOP, eop_bvalid = 0 */
06322     REG_WR_DMAE(bp, NIG_REG_DEBUG_PACKET_LB, wb_write, 3);
06323 }
06324 
06325 /* some of the internal memories
06326  * are not directly readable from the driver
06327  * to test them we send debug packets
06328  */
06329 static int bnx2x_int_mem_test(struct bnx2x *bp)
06330 {
06331     int factor;
06332     int count, i;
06333     u32 val = 0;
06334 
06335     if (CHIP_REV_IS_FPGA(bp))
06336         factor = 120;
06337     else if (CHIP_REV_IS_EMUL(bp))
06338         factor = 200;
06339     else
06340         factor = 1;
06341 
06342     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "start part1\n");
06343 
06344     /* Disable inputs of parser neighbor blocks */
06345     REG_WR(bp, TSDM_REG_ENABLE_IN1, 0x0);
06346     REG_WR(bp, TCM_REG_PRS_IFEN, 0x0);
06347     REG_WR(bp, CFC_REG_DEBUG0, 0x1);
06348     REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_PRS_REQ_IN_EN, 0x0);
06349 
06350     /*  Write 0 to parser credits for CFC search request */
06351     REG_WR(bp, PRS_REG_CFC_SEARCH_INITIAL_CREDIT, 0x0);
06352 
06353     /* send Ethernet packet */
06354     bnx2x_lb_pckt(bp);
06355 
06356     /* TODO do i reset NIG statistic? */
06357     /* Wait until NIG register shows 1 packet of size 0x10 */
06358     count = 1000 * factor;
06359     while (count) {
06360 
06361         bnx2x_read_dmae(bp, NIG_REG_STAT2_BRB_OCTET, 2);
06362         val = *bnx2x_sp(bp, wb_data[0]);
06363         if (val == 0x10)
06364             break;
06365 
06366         msleep(10);
06367         count--;
06368     }
06369     if (val != 0x10) {
06370         BNX2X_ERR("NIG timeout  val = 0x%x\n", val);
06371         return -1;
06372     }
06373 
06374     /* Wait until PRS register shows 1 packet */
06375     count = 1000 * factor;
06376     while (count) {
06377         val = REG_RD(bp, PRS_REG_NUM_OF_PACKETS);
06378         if (val == 1)
06379             break;
06380 
06381         msleep(10);
06382         count--;
06383     }
06384     if (val != 0x1) {
06385         BNX2X_ERR("PRS timeout val = 0x%x\n", val);
06386         return -2;
06387     }
06388 
06389     /* Reset and init BRB, PRS */
06390     REG_WR(bp, GRCBASE_MISC + MISC_REGISTERS_RESET_REG_1_CLEAR, 0x03);
06391     msleep(50);
06392     REG_WR(bp, GRCBASE_MISC + MISC_REGISTERS_RESET_REG_1_SET, 0x03);
06393     msleep(50);
06394     bnx2x_init_block(bp, BRB1_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06395     bnx2x_init_block(bp, PRS_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06396 
06397     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "part2\n");
06398 
06399     /* Disable inputs of parser neighbor blocks */
06400     REG_WR(bp, TSDM_REG_ENABLE_IN1, 0x0);
06401     REG_WR(bp, TCM_REG_PRS_IFEN, 0x0);
06402     REG_WR(bp, CFC_REG_DEBUG0, 0x1);
06403     REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_PRS_REQ_IN_EN, 0x0);
06404 
06405     /* Write 0 to parser credits for CFC search request */
06406     REG_WR(bp, PRS_REG_CFC_SEARCH_INITIAL_CREDIT, 0x0);
06407 
06408     /* send 10 Ethernet packets */
06409     for (i = 0; i < 10; i++)
06410         bnx2x_lb_pckt(bp);
06411 
06412     /* Wait until NIG register shows 10 + 1
06413        packets of size 11*0x10 = 0xb0 */
06414     count = 1000 * factor;
06415     while (count) {
06416 
06417         bnx2x_read_dmae(bp, NIG_REG_STAT2_BRB_OCTET, 2);
06418         val = *bnx2x_sp(bp, wb_data[0]);
06419         if (val == 0xb0)
06420             break;
06421 
06422         msleep(10);
06423         count--;
06424     }
06425     if (val != 0xb0) {
06426         BNX2X_ERR("NIG timeout  val = 0x%x\n", val);
06427         return -3;
06428     }
06429 
06430     /* Wait until PRS register shows 2 packets */
06431     val = REG_RD(bp, PRS_REG_NUM_OF_PACKETS);
06432     if (val != 2)
06433         BNX2X_ERR("PRS timeout  val = 0x%x\n", val);
06434 
06435     /* Write 1 to parser credits for CFC search request */
06436     REG_WR(bp, PRS_REG_CFC_SEARCH_INITIAL_CREDIT, 0x1);
06437 
06438     /* Wait until PRS register shows 3 packets */
06439     msleep(10 * factor);
