06440     /* Wait until NIG register shows 1 packet of size 0x10 */
06441     val = REG_RD(bp, PRS_REG_NUM_OF_PACKETS);
06442     if (val != 3)
06443         BNX2X_ERR("PRS timeout  val = 0x%x\n", val);
06444 
06445     /* clear NIG EOP FIFO */
06446     for (i = 0; i < 11; i++)
06447         REG_RD(bp, NIG_REG_INGRESS_EOP_LB_FIFO);
06448     val = REG_RD(bp, NIG_REG_INGRESS_EOP_LB_EMPTY);
06449     if (val != 1) {
06450         BNX2X_ERR("clear of NIG failed\n");
06451         return -4;
06452     }
06453 
06454     /* Reset and init BRB, PRS, NIG */
06455     REG_WR(bp, GRCBASE_MISC + MISC_REGISTERS_RESET_REG_1_CLEAR, 0x03);
06456     msleep(50);
06457     REG_WR(bp, GRCBASE_MISC + MISC_REGISTERS_RESET_REG_1_SET, 0x03);
06458     msleep(50);
06459     bnx2x_init_block(bp, BRB1_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06460     bnx2x_init_block(bp, PRS_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06461 #ifndef BCM_CNIC
06462     /* set NIC mode */
06463     REG_WR(bp, PRS_REG_NIC_MODE, 1);
06464 #endif
06465 
06466     /* Enable inputs of parser neighbor blocks */
06467     REG_WR(bp, TSDM_REG_ENABLE_IN1, 0x7fffffff);
06468     REG_WR(bp, TCM_REG_PRS_IFEN, 0x1);
06469     REG_WR(bp, CFC_REG_DEBUG0, 0x0);
06470     REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_PRS_REQ_IN_EN, 0x1);
06471 
06472     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "done\n");
06473 
06474     return 0; /* OK */
06475 }
06476 
06477 static void enable_blocks_attention(struct bnx2x *bp)
06478 {
06479     REG_WR(bp, PXP_REG_PXP_INT_MASK_0, 0);
06480     REG_WR(bp, PXP_REG_PXP_INT_MASK_1, 0);
06481     REG_WR(bp, DORQ_REG_DORQ_INT_MASK, 0);
06482     REG_WR(bp, CFC_REG_CFC_INT_MASK, 0);
06483     REG_WR(bp, QM_REG_QM_INT_MASK, 0);
06484     REG_WR(bp, TM_REG_TM_INT_MASK, 0);
06485     REG_WR(bp, XSDM_REG_XSDM_INT_MASK_0, 0);
06486     REG_WR(bp, XSDM_REG_XSDM_INT_MASK_1, 0);
06487     REG_WR(bp, XCM_REG_XCM_INT_MASK, 0);
06488 /*  REG_WR(bp, XSEM_REG_XSEM_INT_MASK_0, 0); */
06489 /*  REG_WR(bp, XSEM_REG_XSEM_INT_MASK_1, 0); */
06490     REG_WR(bp, USDM_REG_USDM_INT_MASK_0, 0);
06491     REG_WR(bp, USDM_REG_USDM_INT_MASK_1, 0);
06492     REG_WR(bp, UCM_REG_UCM_INT_MASK, 0);
06493 /*  REG_WR(bp, USEM_REG_USEM_INT_MASK_0, 0); */
06494 /*  REG_WR(bp, USEM_REG_USEM_INT_MASK_1, 0); */
06495     REG_WR(bp, GRCBASE_UPB + PB_REG_PB_INT_MASK, 0);
06496     REG_WR(bp, CSDM_REG_CSDM_INT_MASK_0, 0);
06497     REG_WR(bp, CSDM_REG_CSDM_INT_MASK_1, 0);
06498     REG_WR(bp, CCM_REG_CCM_INT_MASK, 0);
06499 /*  REG_WR(bp, CSEM_REG_CSEM_INT_MASK_0, 0); */
06500 /*  REG_WR(bp, CSEM_REG_CSEM_INT_MASK_1, 0); */
06501     if (CHIP_REV_IS_FPGA(bp))
06502         REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_PXP2_INT_MASK_0, 0x580000);
06503     else
06504         REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_PXP2_INT_MASK_0, 0x480000);
06505     REG_WR(bp, TSDM_REG_TSDM_INT_MASK_0, 0);
06506     REG_WR(bp, TSDM_REG_TSDM_INT_MASK_1, 0);
06507     REG_WR(bp, TCM_REG_TCM_INT_MASK, 0);
06508 /*  REG_WR(bp, TSEM_REG_TSEM_INT_MASK_0, 0); */
06509 /*  REG_WR(bp, TSEM_REG_TSEM_INT_MASK_1, 0); */
06510     REG_WR(bp, CDU_REG_CDU_INT_MASK, 0);
06511     REG_WR(bp, DMAE_REG_DMAE_INT_MASK, 0);
06512 /*  REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_MISC_INT_MASK, 0); */
06513     REG_WR(bp, PBF_REG_PBF_INT_MASK, 0X18);     /* bit 3,4 masked */
06514 }
06515 
06516 #ifdef BNX2X_EXTRA_DEBUG /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
06517 static void enable_blocks_parity(struct bnx2x *bp)
06518 {
06519     REG_WR(bp, PXP_REG_PXP_PRTY_MASK, 0x80000); /* bit 19 masked */
06520     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_PXP2_PRTY_MASK_0, 0xfff40020);/* bit 5,18,20-31 */
06521     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_PXP2_PRTY_MASK_1, 0x20);    /* bit 5 */
06522     REG_WR(bp, QM_REG_QM_PRTY_MASK, 0x0);
06523     REG_WR(bp, DORQ_REG_DORQ_PRTY_MASK, 0x0);
06524     REG_WR(bp, GRCBASE_UPB + PB_REG_PB_PRTY_MASK, 0x0);
06525     REG_WR(bp, GRCBASE_XPB + PB_REG_PB_PRTY_MASK, 0x0);
06526     REG_WR(bp, SRC_REG_SRC_PRTY_MASK, 0x4);     /* bit 2 */
06527     REG_WR(bp, CDU_REG_CDU_PRTY_MASK, 0x0);
06528     REG_WR(bp, CFC_REG_CFC_PRTY_MASK, 0x0);
06529     REG_WR(bp, HC_REG_HC_PRTY_MASK, 0x0);
06530     REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_MISC_PRTY_MASK, 0x0);
06531     REG_WR(bp, DBG_REG_DBG_PRTY_MASK, 0x0);
06532     REG_WR(bp, DMAE_REG_DMAE_PRTY_MASK, 0x0);
06533     REG_WR(bp, BRB1_REG_BRB1_PRTY_MASK, 0x0);
06534     REG_WR(bp, PRS_REG_PRS_PRTY_MASK, (1<<6));  /* bit 6 */
06535     REG_WR(bp, TSDM_REG_TSDM_PRTY_MASK, 0x8);   /* bit 3 */
06536     REG_WR(bp, CSDM_REG_CSDM_PRTY_MASK, 0x8);   /* bit 3 */
06537     REG_WR(bp, USDM_REG_USDM_PRTY_MASK, 0x28);  /* bit 3,5 */
06538     REG_WR(bp, XSDM_REG_XSDM_PRTY_MASK, 0x8);   /* bit 3 */
06539     REG_WR(bp, TSEM_REG_TSEM_PRTY_MASK_0, 0x0);
06540     REG_WR(bp, TSEM_REG_TSEM_PRTY_MASK_1, 0x0);
06541     REG_WR(bp, USEM_REG_USEM_PRTY_MASK_0, 0x0);
06542     REG_WR(bp, USEM_REG_USEM_PRTY_MASK_1, 0x0);
06543     REG_WR(bp, CSEM_REG_CSEM_PRTY_MASK_0, 0x0);
06544     REG_WR(bp, CSEM_REG_CSEM_PRTY_MASK_1, 0x0);
06545     REG_WR(bp, XSEM_REG_XSEM_PRTY_MASK_0, 0x0);
06546     REG_WR(bp, XSEM_REG_XSEM_PRTY_MASK_1, 0x0);
06547 }
06548 #endif
06549 
06550 static void bnx2x_reset_common(struct bnx2x *bp)
06551 {
06552     /* reset_common */
06553     REG_WR(bp, GRCBASE_MISC + MISC_REGISTERS_RESET_REG_1_CLEAR,
06554            0xd3ffff7f);
06555     REG_WR(bp, GRCBASE_MISC + MISC_REGISTERS_RESET_REG_2_CLEAR, 0x1403);
06556 }
06557 
06558 static void bnx2x_init_pxp(struct bnx2x *bp)
06559 {
06560     u16 devctl;
06561     int r_order, w_order;
06562 
06563     pci_read_config_word(bp->pdev,
06564                  bp->pcie_cap + PCI_EXP_DEVCTL, &devctl);
06565     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "read 0x%x from devctl\n", devctl);
06566     w_order = ((devctl & PCI_EXP_DEVCTL_PAYLOAD) >> 5);
06567     if (bp->mrrs == -1)
06568         r_order = ((devctl & PCI_EXP_DEVCTL_READRQ) >> 12);
06569     else {
06570         DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "force read order to %d\n", bp->mrrs);
06571         r_order = bp->mrrs;
06572     }
06573 
06574     bnx2x_init_pxp_arb(bp, r_order, w_order);
06575 }
06576 
06577 static void bnx2x_setup_fan_failure_detection(struct bnx2x *bp)
06578 {
06579     int is_required;
06580     u32 val;
06581     int port;
06582 
06583     if (BP_NOMCP(bp))
06584         return;
06585 
06586     is_required = 0;
06587     val = SHMEM_RD(bp, dev_info.shared_hw_config.config2) &
06588           SHARED_HW_CFG_FAN_FAILURE_MASK;
06589 
06590     if (val == SHARED_HW_CFG_FAN_FAILURE_ENABLED)
06591         is_required = 1;
06592 
06593     /*
06594      * The fan failure mechanism is usually related to the PHY type since
06595      * the power consumption of the board is affected by the PHY. Currently,
06596      * fan is required for most designs with SFX7101, BCM8727 and BCM8481.
06597      */
06598     else if (val == SHARED_HW_CFG_FAN_FAILURE_PHY_TYPE)
06599         for (port = PORT_0; port < PORT_MAX; port++) {
06600             u32 phy_type =
06601                 SHMEM_RD(bp, dev_info.port_hw_config[port].
06602                      external_phy_config) &
06603                 PORT_HW_CFG_XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE_MASK;
06604             is_required |=
06605                 ((phy_type ==
06606                   PORT_HW_CFG_XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE_SFX7101) ||
06607                  (phy_type ==
06608                   PORT_HW_CFG_XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE_BCM8727) ||
06609                  (phy_type ==
06610                   PORT_HW_CFG_XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE_BCM8481));
06611         }
06612 
06613     DP(NETIF_MSG_HW, "fan detection setting: %d\n", is_required);
06614 
06615     if (is_required == 0)
06616         return;
06617 
06618     /* Fan failure is indicated by SPIO 5 */
06619     bnx2x_set_spio(bp, MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_5,
06620                MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_INPUT_HI_Z);
06621 
06622     /* set to active low mode */
06623     val = REG_RD(bp, MISC_REG_SPIO_INT);
06624     val |= ((1 << MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_5) <<
06625                     MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_INT_OLD_SET_POS);
06626     REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_SPIO_INT, val);
06627 
06628     /* enable interrupt to signal the IGU */
06629     val = REG_RD(bp, MISC_REG_SPIO_EVENT_EN);
06630     val |= (1 << MISC_REGISTERS_SPIO_5);
06631     REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_SPIO_EVENT_EN, val);
06632 }
06633 
06634 static int bnx2x_init_common(struct bnx2x *bp)
06635 {
06636     u32 val, i;
06637 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
06638     u32 wb_write[2];
06639 #endif
06640 
06641     DP(BNX2X_MSG_MCP, "starting common init  func %d\n", BP_FUNC(bp));
06642 
06643     bnx2x_reset_common(bp);
06644     REG_WR(bp, GRCBASE_MISC + MISC_REGISTERS_RESET_REG_1_SET, 0xffffffff);
06645     REG_WR(bp, GRCBASE_MISC + MISC_REGISTERS_RESET_REG_2_SET, 0xfffc);
06646 
06647     bnx2x_init_block(bp, MISC_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06648     if (CHIP_IS_E1H(bp))
06649         REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_E1HMF_MODE, IS_E1HMF(bp));
06650 
06651     REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_LCPLL_CTRL_REG_2, 0x100);
06652     msleep(30);
06653     REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_LCPLL_CTRL_REG_2, 0x0);
06654 
06655     bnx2x_init_block(bp, PXP_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06656     if (CHIP_IS_E1(bp)) {
06657         /* enable HW interrupt from PXP on USDM overflow
06658            bit 16 on INT_MASK_0 */
06659         REG_WR(bp, PXP_REG_PXP_INT_MASK_0, 0);
06660     }
06661 
06662     bnx2x_init_block(bp, PXP2_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06663     bnx2x_init_pxp(bp);
06664 
06665 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN
06666     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_QM_ENDIAN_M, 1);
06667     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_TM_ENDIAN_M, 1);
06668     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_SRC_ENDIAN_M, 1);
06669     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_CDU_ENDIAN_M, 1);
06670     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_DBG_ENDIAN_M, 1);
06671     /* make sure this value is 0 */
06672     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_HC_ENDIAN_M, 0);
06673 
06674 /*  REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RD_PBF_SWAP_MODE, 1); */
06675     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RD_QM_SWAP_MODE, 1);
06676     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RD_TM_SWAP_MODE, 1);
06677     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RD_SRC_SWAP_MODE, 1);
06678     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RD_CDURD_SWAP_MODE, 1);
06679 #endif
06680 
06681     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_CDU_P_SIZE, 2);
06682 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
06683     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_TM_P_SIZE, 5);
06684     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_QM_P_SIZE, 5);
06685     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_SRC_P_SIZE, 5);
06686 #endif
06687 
06688     if (CHIP_REV_IS_FPGA(bp) && CHIP_IS_E1H(bp))
06689         REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_PGL_TAGS_LIMIT, 0x1);
06690 
06691     /* let the HW do it's magic ... */
06692     msleep(100);
06693     /* finish PXP init */
06694     val = REG_RD(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_CFG_DONE);
06695     if (val != 1) {
06696         BNX2X_ERR("PXP2 CFG failed\n");
06697         return -EBUSY;
06698     }
06699     val = REG_RD(bp, PXP2_REG_RD_INIT_DONE);
06700     if (val != 1) {
06701         BNX2X_ERR("PXP2 RD_INIT failed\n");
06702         return -EBUSY;
06703     }
06704 
06705     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_DISABLE_INPUTS, 0);
06706     REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RD_DISABLE_INPUTS, 0);
06707 
06708     bnx2x_init_block(bp, DMAE_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06709 
06710     /* clean the DMAE memory */
06711     bp->dmae_ready = 1;
06712     bnx2x_init_fill(bp, TSEM_REG_PRAM, 0, 8);
06713 
06714     bnx2x_init_block(bp, TCM_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06715     bnx2x_init_block(bp, UCM_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06716     bnx2x_init_block(bp, CCM_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06717     bnx2x_init_block(bp, XCM_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06718 
06719     bnx2x_read_dmae(bp, XSEM_REG_PASSIVE_BUFFER, 3);
06720     bnx2x_read_dmae(bp, CSEM_REG_PASSIVE_BUFFER, 3);
06721     bnx2x_read_dmae(bp, TSEM_REG_PASSIVE_BUFFER, 3);
06722     bnx2x_read_dmae(bp, USEM_REG_PASSIVE_BUFFER, 3);
06723 
06724     bnx2x_init_block(bp, QM_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06725 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
06726     switch (bp->multi_mode) {
06727     case ETH_RSS_MODE_DISABLED:
06728     case ETH_RSS_MODE_REGULAR:
06729         break;
06730 
06731     case ETH_RSS_MODE_VLAN_PRI:
06732     case ETH_RSS_MODE_E1HOV_PRI:
06733     case ETH_RSS_MODE_IP_DSCP:
06734         REG_WR(bp, QM_REG_BYTECRDINITVAL, 0x5dc0);
06735         break;
06736 
06737     default:
06738         break;
06739     }
06740 #endif
06741 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
06742     wb_write[0] = 0;
06743     wb_write[1] = 0;
06744     for (i = 0; i < 64; i++) {
06745         REG_WR(bp, QM_REG_BASEADDR + i*4, 1024 * 4 * (i%16));
06746         bnx2x_init_ind_wr(bp, QM_REG_PTRTBL + i*8, wb_write, 2);
06747 
06748         if (CHIP_IS_E1H(bp)) {
06749             REG_WR(bp, QM_REG_BASEADDR_EXT_A + i*4, 1024*4*(i%16));
06750             bnx2x_init_ind_wr(bp, QM_REG_PTRTBL_EXT_A + i*8,
06751                       wb_write, 2);
06752         }
06753     }
06754 #endif
06755     /* soft reset pulse */
06756     REG_WR(bp, QM_REG_SOFT_RESET, 1);
06757     REG_WR(bp, QM_REG_SOFT_RESET, 0);
06758 
06759 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
06760     bnx2x_init_block(bp, TIMERS_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06761 #endif
06762 
06763     bnx2x_init_block(bp, DQ_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06764     REG_WR(bp, DORQ_REG_DPM_CID_OFST, BCM_PAGE_SHIFT);
06765     if (!CHIP_REV_IS_SLOW(bp)) {
06766         /* enable hw interrupt from doorbell Q */
06767         REG_WR(bp, DORQ_REG_DORQ_INT_MASK, 0);
06768     }
06769 
06770     bnx2x_init_block(bp, BRB1_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06771     bnx2x_init_block(bp, PRS_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06772     REG_WR(bp, PRS_REG_A_PRSU_20, 0xf);
06773 #ifndef BCM_CNIC
06774     /* set NIC mode */
06775     REG_WR(bp, PRS_REG_NIC_MODE, 1);
06776 #endif
06777 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC
06778     if (CHIP_IS_E1H(bp)) {
06779         val = (IS_E1HMF(bp) ||
06780                (bp->multi_mode == ETH_RSS_MODE_E1HOV_PRI)) ? 1 : 0;
06781         REG_WR(bp, PRS_REG_E1HOV_MODE, val);
06782     }
06783 #else /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
06784     if (CHIP_IS_E1H(bp))
06785         REG_WR(bp, PRS_REG_E1HOV_MODE, IS_E1HMF(bp));
06786 #endif
06787 
06788     bnx2x_init_block(bp, TSDM_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06789     bnx2x_init_block(bp, CSDM_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06790     bnx2x_init_block(bp, USDM_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06791     bnx2x_init_block(bp, XSDM_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06792 
06793     bnx2x_init_fill(bp, TSEM_REG_FAST_MEMORY, 0, STORM_INTMEM_SIZE(bp));
06794     bnx2x_init_fill(bp, USEM_REG_FAST_MEMORY, 0, STORM_INTMEM_SIZE(bp));
06795     bnx2x_init_fill(bp, CSEM_REG_FAST_MEMORY, 0, STORM_INTMEM_SIZE(bp));
06796     bnx2x_init_fill(bp, XSEM_REG_FAST_MEMORY, 0, STORM_INTMEM_SIZE(bp));
06797 
06798     bnx2x_init_block(bp, TSEM_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06799     bnx2x_init_block(bp, USEM_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06800     bnx2x_init_block(bp, CSEM_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06801     bnx2x_init_block(bp, XSEM_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06802 
06803     /* sync semi rtc */
06804     REG_WR(bp, GRCBASE_MISC + MISC_REGISTERS_RESET_REG_1_CLEAR,
06805            0x80000000);
06806     REG_WR(bp, GRCBASE_MISC + MISC_REGISTERS_RESET_REG_1_SET,
06807            0x80000000);
06808 
06809     bnx2x_init_block(bp, UPB_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06810     bnx2x_init_block(bp, XPB_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06811     bnx2x_init_block(bp, PBF_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06812 
06813     REG_WR(bp, SRC_REG_SOFT_RST, 1);
06814     for (i = SRC_REG_KEYRSS0_0; i <= SRC_REG_KEYRSS1_9; i += 4) {
06815         REG_WR(bp, i, 0xc0cac01a);
06816         /* TODO: replace with something meaningful */
06817     }
06818     bnx2x_init_block(bp, SRCH_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06819 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
06820     REG_WR(bp, SRC_REG_KEYSEARCH_0, 0x63285672);
06821     REG_WR(bp, SRC_REG_KEYSEARCH_1, 0x24b8f2cc);
06822     REG_WR(bp, SRC_REG_KEYSEARCH_2, 0x223aef9b);
06823     REG_WR(bp, SRC_REG_KEYSEARCH_3, 0x26001e3a);
06824     REG_WR(bp, SRC_REG_KEYSEARCH_4, 0x7ae91116);
06825     REG_WR(bp, SRC_REG_KEYSEARCH_5, 0x5ce5230b);
06826     REG_WR(bp, SRC_REG_KEYSEARCH_6, 0x298d8adf);
06827     REG_WR(bp, SRC_REG_KEYSEARCH_7, 0x6eb0ff09);
06828     REG_WR(bp, SRC_REG_KEYSEARCH_8, 0x1830f82f);
06829     REG_WR(bp, SRC_REG_KEYSEARCH_9, 0x01e46be7);
06830 #endif
06831     REG_WR(bp, SRC_REG_SOFT_RST, 0);
06832 
06833     if (sizeof(union cdu_context) != 1024)
06834         /* we currently assume that a context is 1024 bytes */
06835         printk(KERN_ALERT PFX "please adjust the size of"
06836                " cdu_context(%ld)\n", (long)sizeof(union cdu_context));
06837 
06838     bnx2x_init_block(bp, CDU_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06839     val = (4 << 24) + (0 << 12) + 1024;
06840     REG_WR(bp, CDU_REG_CDU_GLOBAL_PARAMS, val);
06841 
06842     bnx2x_init_block(bp, CFC_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06843     REG_WR(bp, CFC_REG_INIT_REG, 0x7FF);
06844     /* enable context validation interrupt from CFC */
06845     REG_WR(bp, CFC_REG_CFC_INT_MASK, 0);
06846 
06847     /* set the thresholds to prevent CFC/CDU race */
06848     REG_WR(bp, CFC_REG_DEBUG0, 0x20020000);
06849 
06850     bnx2x_init_block(bp, HC_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06851     bnx2x_init_block(bp, MISC_AEU_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06852 
06853     bnx2x_init_block(bp, PXPCS_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06854     /* Reset PCIE errors for debug */
06855     REG_WR(bp, 0x2814, 0xffffffff);
06856     REG_WR(bp, 0x3820, 0xffffffff);
06857 
06858     bnx2x_init_block(bp, EMAC0_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06859     bnx2x_init_block(bp, EMAC1_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06860     bnx2x_init_block(bp, DBU_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06861     bnx2x_init_block(bp, DBG_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06862 
06863     bnx2x_init_block(bp, NIG_BLOCK, COMMON_STAGE);
06864     if (CHIP_IS_E1H(bp)) {
06865         REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_LLH_MF_MODE, IS_E1HMF(bp));
06866         REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_LLH_E1HOV_MODE, IS_E1HMF(bp));
06867     }
06868 
06869     if (CHIP_REV_IS_SLOW(bp))
06870         msleep(200);
06871 
06872     /* finish CFC init */
06873     val = reg_poll(bp, CFC_REG_LL_INIT_DONE, 1, 100, 10);
06874     if (val != 1) {
06875         BNX2X_ERR("CFC LL_INIT failed\n");
06876         return -EBUSY;
06877     }
06878     val = reg_poll(bp, CFC_REG_AC_INIT_DONE, 1, 100, 10);
06879     if (val != 1) {
06880         BNX2X_ERR("CFC AC_INIT failed\n");
06881         return -EBUSY;
06882     }
06883     val = reg_poll(bp, CFC_REG_CAM_INIT_DONE, 1, 100, 10);
06884     if (val != 1) {
06885         BNX2X_ERR("CFC CAM_INIT failed\n");
06886         return -EBUSY;
06887     }
06888     REG_WR(bp, CFC_REG_DEBUG0, 0);
06889 
06890     /* read NIG statistic
06891        to see if this is our first up since powerup */
06892     bnx2x_read_dmae(bp, NIG_REG_STAT2_BRB_OCTET, 2);
06893     val = *bnx2x_sp(bp, wb_data[0]);
06894 
06895     /* do internal memory self test */
06896     if ((CHIP_IS_E1(bp)) && (val == 0) && bnx2x_int_mem_test(bp)) {
06897         BNX2X_ERR("internal mem self test failed\n");
06898         return -EBUSY;
06899     }
06900 
06901     switch (XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE(bp->link_params.ext_phy_config)) {
06902     case PORT_HW_CFG_XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE_BCM8072:
06903     case PORT_HW_CFG_XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE_BCM8073:
06904     case PORT_HW_CFG_XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE_BCM8726:
06905     case PORT_HW_CFG_XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE_BCM8727:
06906         bp->port.need_hw_lock = 1;
06907         break;
06908 
06909     default:
06910         break;
06911     }
06912 
06913     bnx2x_setup_fan_failure_detection(bp);
06914 
06915     /* clear PXP2 attentions */
06916     REG_RD(bp, PXP2_REG_PXP2_INT_STS_CLR_0);
06917 
06918     enable_blocks_attention(bp);
06919 #ifdef BNX2X_EXTRA_DEBUG /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
06920     enable_blocks_parity(bp);
06921 #endif
06922 
06923     if (!BP_NOMCP(bp)) {
06924         bnx2x_acquire_phy_lock(bp);
06925         bnx2x_common_init_phy(bp, bp->common.shmem_base);
06926         bnx2x_release_phy_lock(bp);
06927     } else
06928         BNX2X_ERR("Bootcode is missing - can not initialize link\n");
06929 
06930     return 0;
06931 }
06932 
06933 static int bnx2x_init_port(struct bnx2x *bp)
06934 {
06935     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
06936     int init_stage = port ? PORT1_STAGE : PORT0_STAGE;
06937     u32 low, high;
06938     u32 val;
06939 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
06940     int i;
06941 #endif
06942 
06943     DP(BNX2X_MSG_MCP, "starting port init  port %d\n", port);
06944 
06945     REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_MASK_INTERRUPT_PORT0 + port*4, 0);
06946 
06947     bnx2x_init_block(bp, PXP_BLOCK, init_stage);
06948     bnx2x_init_block(bp, PXP2_BLOCK, init_stage);
06949 
06950     bnx2x_init_block(bp, TCM_BLOCK, init_stage);
06951     bnx2x_init_block(bp, UCM_BLOCK, init_stage);
06952     bnx2x_init_block(bp, CCM_BLOCK, init_stage);
06953     bnx2x_init_block(bp, XCM_BLOCK, init_stage);
06954 
06955 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
06956     REG_WR(bp, QM_REG_CONNNUM_0 + port*4, 1024/16 - 1);
06957 
06958     bnx2x_init_block(bp, TIMERS_BLOCK, init_stage);
06959     REG_WR(bp, TM_REG_LIN0_SCAN_TIME + port*4, 20);
06960     REG_WR(bp, TM_REG_LIN0_MAX_ACTIVE_CID + port*4, 31);
06961 #endif
06962 
06963     bnx2x_init_block(bp, DQ_BLOCK, init_stage);
06964 
06965     bnx2x_init_block(bp, BRB1_BLOCK, init_stage);
06966     if (CHIP_REV_IS_SLOW(bp) && !CHIP_IS_E1H(bp)) {
06967         /* no pause for emulation and FPGA */
06968         low = 0;
06969         high = 513;
06970     } else {
06971         if (IS_E1HMF(bp))
06972             low = ((bp->flags & ONE_PORT_FLAG) ? 160 : 246);
06973         else if (bp->dev->mtu > 4096) {
06974             if (bp->flags & ONE_PORT_FLAG)
06975                 low = 160;
06976             else {
06977                 val = bp->dev->mtu;
06978                 /* (24*1024 + val*4)/256 */
06979                 low = 96 + (val/64) + ((val % 64) ? 1 : 0);
06980             }
06981         } else
06982             low = ((bp->flags & ONE_PORT_FLAG) ? 80 : 160);
06983         high = low + 56;    /* 14*1024/256 */
06984     }
06985     REG_WR(bp, BRB1_REG_PAUSE_LOW_THRESHOLD_0 + port*4, low);
06986     REG_WR(bp, BRB1_REG_PAUSE_HIGH_THRESHOLD_0 + port*4, high);
06987 
06988 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
06989     if (bp->flags & SAFC_TX_FLAG) {
06990         REG_WR(bp, BRB1_REG_HIGH_LLFC_LOW_THRESHOLD_0 + port*4, 0xa0);
06991         REG_WR(bp, BRB1_REG_HIGH_LLFC_HIGH_THRESHOLD_0 + port*4, 0xd8);
06992         REG_WR(bp, BRB1_REG_LOW_LLFC_LOW_THRESHOLD_0 + port*4, 0xa0);
06993         REG_WR(bp, BRB1_REG_LOW_LLFC_HIGH_THRESHOLD_0 + port*4, 0xd8);
06994     }
06995 #endif
06996 
06997     bnx2x_init_block(bp, PRS_BLOCK, init_stage);
06998 
06999     bnx2x_init_block(bp, TSDM_BLOCK, init_stage);
07000     bnx2x_init_block(bp, CSDM_BLOCK, init_stage);
07001     bnx2x_init_block(bp, USDM_BLOCK, init_stage);
07002     bnx2x_init_block(bp, XSDM_BLOCK, init_stage);
07003 
07004     bnx2x_init_block(bp, TSEM_BLOCK, init_stage);
07005     bnx2x_init_block(bp, USEM_BLOCK, init_stage);
07006     bnx2x_init_block(bp, CSEM_BLOCK, init_stage);
07007     bnx2x_init_block(bp, XSEM_BLOCK, init_stage);
07008 
07009     bnx2x_init_block(bp, UPB_BLOCK, init_stage);
07010     bnx2x_init_block(bp, XPB_BLOCK, init_stage);
07011 
07012     bnx2x_init_block(bp, PBF_BLOCK, init_stage);
07013 
07014     /* configure PBF to work without PAUSE mtu 9000 */
07015     REG_WR(bp, PBF_REG_P0_PAUSE_ENABLE + port*4, 0);
07016 
07017     /* update threshold */
07018     REG_WR(bp, PBF_REG_P0_ARB_THRSH + port*4, (9040/16));
07019     /* update init credit */
07020     REG_WR(bp, PBF_REG_P0_INIT_CRD + port*4, (9040/16) + 553 - 22);
07021 
07022     /* probe changes */
07023     REG_WR(bp, PBF_REG_INIT_P0 + port*4, 1);
07024     msleep(5);
07025     REG_WR(bp, PBF_REG_INIT_P0 + port*4, 0);
07026 
07027 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
07028     bnx2x_init_block(bp, SRCH_BLOCK, init_stage);
07029 #endif
07030     bnx2x_init_block(bp, CDU_BLOCK, init_stage);
07031     bnx2x_init_block(bp, CFC_BLOCK, init_stage);
07032 
07033     if (CHIP_IS_E1(bp)) {
07034         REG_WR(bp, HC_REG_LEADING_EDGE_0 + port*8, 0);
07035         REG_WR(bp, HC_REG_TRAILING_EDGE_0 + port*8, 0);
07036     }
07037     bnx2x_init_block(bp, HC_BLOCK, init_stage);
07038 
07039     bnx2x_init_block(bp, MISC_AEU_BLOCK, init_stage);
07040     /* init aeu_mask_attn_func_0/1:
07041      *  - SF mode: bits 3-7 are masked. only bits 0-2 are in use
07042      *  - MF mode: bit 3 is masked. bits 0-2 are in use as in SF
07043      *             bits 4-7 are used for "per vn group attention" */
07044     REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_MASK_ATTN_FUNC_0 + port*4,
07045            (IS_E1HMF(bp) ? 0xF7 : 0x7));
07046 
07047     bnx2x_init_block(bp, PXPCS_BLOCK, init_stage);
07048     bnx2x_init_block(bp, EMAC0_BLOCK, init_stage);
07049     bnx2x_init_block(bp, EMAC1_BLOCK, init_stage);
07050     bnx2x_init_block(bp, DBU_BLOCK, init_stage);
07051     bnx2x_init_block(bp, DBG_BLOCK, init_stage);
07052 
07053     bnx2x_init_block(bp, NIG_BLOCK, init_stage);
07054 
07055     REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_XGXS_SERDES0_MODE_SEL + port*4, 1);
07056 
07057     if (CHIP_IS_E1H(bp)) {
07058         /* 0x2 disable e1hov, 0x1 enable */
07059         REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_LLH0_BRB1_DRV_MASK_MF + port*4,
07060                (IS_E1HMF(bp) ? 0x1 : 0x2));
07061 
07062 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC
07063         if (bp->flags & SAFC_TX_FLAG) {
07064             high = 0;
07065             for (i = 0; i < BNX2X_MAX_PRIORITY; i++)
07066                 if (bp->pri_map[i] == 1)
07067                     high |= (1 << i);
07068             REG_WR(bp,
07069                    NIG_REG_LLFC_HIGH_PRIORITY_CLASSES_0 + port*4,
07070                    high);
07071             low = 0;
07072             for (i = 0; i < BNX2X_MAX_PRIORITY; i++)
07073                 if (bp->pri_map[i] == 0)
07074                     low |= (1 << i);
07075             REG_WR(bp,
07076                    NIG_REG_LLFC_LOW_PRIORITY_CLASSES_0 + port*4,
07077                    low);
07078 
07079             REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_PAUSE_ENABLE_0 + port*4, 0);
07080             REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_LLFC_ENABLE_0 + port*4, 1);
07081             REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_LLFC_OUT_EN_0 + port*4, 1);
07082         } else {
07083 #else /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
07084         {
07085 #endif
07086             REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_LLFC_ENABLE_0 + port*4, 0);
07087             REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_LLFC_OUT_EN_0 + port*4, 0);
07088             REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_PAUSE_ENABLE_0 + port*4, 1);
07089         }
07090     }
07091 
07092     bnx2x_init_block(bp, MCP_BLOCK, init_stage);
07093     bnx2x_init_block(bp, DMAE_BLOCK, init_stage);
07094 
07095     switch (XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE(bp->link_params.ext_phy_config)) {
07096     case PORT_HW_CFG_XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE_BCM8726:
07097         {
07098         u32 swap_val, swap_override, aeu_gpio_mask, offset;
07099 
07100         bnx2x_set_gpio(bp, MISC_REGISTERS_GPIO_3,
07101                    MISC_REGISTERS_GPIO_INPUT_HI_Z, port);
07102 
07103         /* The GPIO should be swapped if the swap register is
07104            set and active */
07105         swap_val = REG_RD(bp, NIG_REG_PORT_SWAP);
07106         swap_override = REG_RD(bp, NIG_REG_STRAP_OVERRIDE);
07107 
07108         /* Select function upon port-swap configuration */
07109         if (port == 0) {
07110             offset = MISC_REG_AEU_ENABLE1_FUNC_0_OUT_0;
07111             aeu_gpio_mask = (swap_val && swap_override) ?
07112                 AEU_INPUTS_ATTN_BITS_GPIO3_FUNCTION_1 :
07113                 AEU_INPUTS_ATTN_BITS_GPIO3_FUNCTION_0;
07114         } else {
07115             offset = MISC_REG_AEU_ENABLE1_FUNC_1_OUT_0;
07116             aeu_gpio_mask = (swap_val && swap_override) ?
07117                 AEU_INPUTS_ATTN_BITS_GPIO3_FUNCTION_0 :
07118                 AEU_INPUTS_ATTN_BITS_GPIO3_FUNCTION_1;
07119         }
07120         val = REG_RD(bp, offset);
07121         /* add GPIO3 to group */
07122         val |= aeu_gpio_mask;
07123         REG_WR(bp, offset, val);
07124         }
07125         break;
07126 
07127     case PORT_HW_CFG_XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE_SFX7101:
07128     case PORT_HW_CFG_XGXS_EXT_PHY_TYPE_BCM8727:
07129         /* add SPIO 5 to group 0 */
07130         {
07131         u32 reg_addr = (port ? MISC_REG_AEU_ENABLE1_FUNC_1_OUT_0 :
07132                        MISC_REG_AEU_ENABLE1_FUNC_0_OUT_0);
07133         val = REG_RD(bp, reg_addr);
07134         val |= AEU_INPUTS_ATTN_BITS_SPIO5;
07135         REG_WR(bp, reg_addr, val);
07136         }
07137         break;
07138 
07139     default:
07140         break;
07141     }
07142 
07143     bnx2x__link_reset(bp);
07144 
07145     return 0;
07146 }
07147 
07148 #define ILT_PER_FUNC        (768/2)
07149 #define FUNC_ILT_BASE(func) (func * ILT_PER_FUNC)
07150 /* the phys address is shifted right 12 bits and has an added
07151    1=valid bit added to the 53rd bit
07152    then since this is a wide register(TM)
07153    we split it into two 32 bit writes
07154  */
07155 #define ONCHIP_ADDR1(x)     ((u32)(((u64)x >> 12) & 0xFFFFFFFF))
07156 #define ONCHIP_ADDR2(x)     ((u32)((1 << 20) | ((u64)x >> 44)))
07157 #define PXP_ONE_ILT(x)      (((x) << 10) | x)
07158 #define PXP_ILT_RANGE(f, l) (((l) << 10) | f)
07159 
07160 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
07161 #define CNIC_ILT_LINES      127
07162 #define CNIC_CTX_PER_ILT    16
07163 #else
07164 #define CNIC_ILT_LINES      0
07165 #endif
07166 
07167 static void bnx2x_ilt_wr(struct bnx2x *bp, u32 index, dma_addr_t addr)
07168 {
07169     int reg;
07170 
07171     if (CHIP_IS_E1H(bp))
07172         reg = PXP2_REG_RQ_ONCHIP_AT_B0 + index*8;
07173     else /* E1 */
07174         reg = PXP2_REG_RQ_ONCHIP_AT + index*8;
07175 
07176     bnx2x_wb_wr(bp, reg, ONCHIP_ADDR1(addr), ONCHIP_ADDR2(addr));
07177 }
07178 
07179 static int bnx2x_init_func(struct bnx2x *bp)
07180 {
07181     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
07182     int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
07183     u32 addr, val;
07184     int i;
07185 
07186     DP(BNX2X_MSG_MCP, "starting func init  func %d\n", func);
07187 
07188     /* set MSI reconfigure capability */
07189     addr = (port ? HC_REG_CONFIG_1 : HC_REG_CONFIG_0);
07190     val = REG_RD(bp, addr);
07191     val |= HC_CONFIG_0_REG_MSI_ATTN_EN_0;
07192     REG_WR(bp, addr, val);
07193 
07194     i = FUNC_ILT_BASE(func);
07195 
07196     bnx2x_ilt_wr(bp, i, bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, context));
07197     if (CHIP_IS_E1H(bp)) {
07198         REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_CDU_FIRST_ILT, i);
07199         REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_CDU_LAST_ILT, i + CNIC_ILT_LINES);
07200     } else /* E1 */
07201         REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_PSWRQ_CDU0_L2P + func*4,
07202                PXP_ILT_RANGE(i, i + CNIC_ILT_LINES));
07203 
07204 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
07205     i += 1 + CNIC_ILT_LINES;
07206     bnx2x_ilt_wr(bp, i, bp->timers_mapping);
07207     if (CHIP_IS_E1(bp))
07208         REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_PSWRQ_TM0_L2P + func*4, PXP_ONE_ILT(i));
07209     else {
07210         REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_TM_FIRST_ILT, i);
07211         REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_TM_LAST_ILT, i);
07212     }
07213 
07214     i++;
07215     bnx2x_ilt_wr(bp, i, bp->qm_mapping);
07216     if (CHIP_IS_E1(bp))
07217         REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_PSWRQ_QM0_L2P + func*4, PXP_ONE_ILT(i));
07218     else {
07219         REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_QM_FIRST_ILT, i);
07220         REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_QM_LAST_ILT, i);
07221     }
07222 
07223     i++;
07224     bnx2x_ilt_wr(bp, i, bp->t1_mapping);
07225     if (CHIP_IS_E1(bp))
07226         REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_PSWRQ_SRC0_L2P + func*4, PXP_ONE_ILT(i));
07227     else {
07228         REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_SRC_FIRST_ILT, i);
07229         REG_WR(bp, PXP2_REG_RQ_SRC_LAST_ILT, i);
07230     }
07231 
07232     /* tell the searcher where the T2 table is */
07233     REG_WR(bp, SRC_REG_COUNTFREE0 + port*4, 16*1024/64);
07234 
07235     bnx2x_wb_wr(bp, SRC_REG_FIRSTFREE0 + port*16,
07236             U64_LO(bp->t2_mapping), U64_HI(bp->t2_mapping));
07237 
07238     bnx2x_wb_wr(bp, SRC_REG_LASTFREE0 + port*16,
07239             U64_LO((u64)bp->t2_mapping + 16*1024 - 64),
07240             U64_HI((u64)bp->t2_mapping + 16*1024 - 64));
07241 
07242     REG_WR(bp, SRC_REG_NUMBER_HASH_BITS0 + port*4, 10);
07243 #endif
07244 
07245     if (CHIP_IS_E1H(bp)) {
07246         bnx2x_init_block(bp, MISC_BLOCK, FUNC0_STAGE + func);
07247         bnx2x_init_block(bp, TCM_BLOCK, FUNC0_STAGE + func);
07248         bnx2x_init_block(bp, UCM_BLOCK, FUNC0_STAGE + func);
07249         bnx2x_init_block(bp, CCM_BLOCK, FUNC0_STAGE + func);
07250         bnx2x_init_block(bp, XCM_BLOCK, FUNC0_STAGE + func);
07251         bnx2x_init_block(bp, TSEM_BLOCK, FUNC0_STAGE + func);
07252         bnx2x_init_block(bp, USEM_BLOCK, FUNC0_STAGE + func);
07253         bnx2x_init_block(bp, CSEM_BLOCK, FUNC0_STAGE + func);
07254         bnx2x_init_block(bp, XSEM_BLOCK, FUNC0_STAGE + func);
07255 
07256         REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_LLH0_FUNC_EN + port*8, 1);
07257         REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_LLH0_FUNC_VLAN_ID + port*8, bp->e1hov);
07258     }
07259 
07260     /* HC init per function */
07261     if (CHIP_IS_E1H(bp)) {
07262         REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_GENERAL_ATTN_12 + func*4, 0);
07263 
07264         REG_WR(bp, HC_REG_LEADING_EDGE_0 + port*8, 0);
07265         REG_WR(bp, HC_REG_TRAILING_EDGE_0 + port*8, 0);
07266     }
07267     bnx2x_init_block(bp, HC_BLOCK, FUNC0_STAGE + func);
07268 
07269     /* Reset PCIE errors for debug */
07270     REG_WR(bp, 0x2114, 0xffffffff);
07271     REG_WR(bp, 0x2120, 0xffffffff);
07272 
07273     return 0;
07274 }
07275 
07276 static int bnx2x_init_hw(struct bnx2x *bp, u32 load_code)
07277 {
07278     int i, rc = 0;
07279 
07280     DP(BNX2X_MSG_MCP, "function %d  load_code %x\n",
07281        BP_FUNC(bp), load_code);
07282 
07283     bp->dmae_ready = 0;
07284     mutex_init(&bp->dmae_mutex);
07285     rc = bnx2x_gunzip_init(bp);
07286     if (rc)
07287         return rc;
07288 
07289     switch (load_code) {
07290     case FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_LOAD_COMMON:
07291         rc = bnx2x_init_common(bp);
07292         if (rc)
07293             goto init_hw_err;
07294         /* no break */
07295 
07296     case FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_LOAD_PORT:
07297         bp->dmae_ready = 1;
07298         rc = bnx2x_init_port(bp);
07299         if (rc)
07300             goto init_hw_err;
07301         /* no break */
07302 
07303     case FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_LOAD_FUNCTION:
07304         bp->dmae_ready = 1;
07305         rc = bnx2x_init_func(bp);
07306         if (rc)
07307             goto init_hw_err;
07308         break;
07309 
07310     default:
07311         BNX2X_ERR("Unknown load_code (0x%x) from MCP\n", load_code);
07312         break;
07313     }
07314 
07315     if (!BP_NOMCP(bp)) {
07316         int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
07317 
07318         bp->fw_drv_pulse_wr_seq =
07319                 (SHMEM_RD(bp, func_mb[func].drv_pulse_mb) &
07320                  DRV_PULSE_SEQ_MASK);
07321         DP(BNX2X_MSG_MCP, "drv_pulse 0x%x\n", bp->fw_drv_pulse_wr_seq);
07322     }
07323 
07324     /* this needs to be done before gunzip end */
07325     bnx2x_zero_def_sb(bp);
07326     for_each_queue(bp, i)
07327         bnx2x_zero_sb(bp, BP_L_ID(bp) + i);
07328 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
07329     bnx2x_zero_sb(bp, BP_L_ID(bp) + i);
07330 #endif
07331 
07332 init_hw_err:
07333     bnx2x_gunzip_end(bp);
07334 
07335     return rc;
07336 }
07337 
07338 static void bnx2x_free_mem(struct bnx2x *bp)
07339 {
07340 
07341 #define BNX2X_PCI_FREE(x, y, size) \
07342     do { \
07343         if (x) { \
07344             pci_free_consistent(bp->pdev, size, x, y); \
07345             x = NULL; \
07346             y = 0; \
07347         } \
07348     } while (0)
07349 
07350 #define BNX2X_FREE(x) \
07351     do { \
07352         if (x) { \
07353             vfree(x); \
07354             x = NULL; \
07355         } \
07356     } while (0)
07357 
07358     int i;
07359 
07360     /* fastpath */
07361     /* Common */
07362     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
07363 
07364         /* status blocks */
07365         BNX2X_PCI_FREE(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, status_blk),
07366                    bnx2x_fp(bp, i, status_blk_mapping),
07367                    sizeof(struct host_status_block));
07368     }
07369     /* Rx */
07370     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
07371 
07372         /* fastpath rx rings: rx_buf rx_desc rx_comp */
07373         BNX2X_FREE(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_buf_ring));
07374         BNX2X_PCI_FREE(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_desc_ring),
07375                    bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_desc_mapping),
07376                    sizeof(struct eth_rx_bd) * NUM_RX_BD);
07377 
07378         BNX2X_PCI_FREE(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_comp_ring),
07379                    bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_comp_mapping),
07380                    sizeof(struct eth_fast_path_rx_cqe) *
07381                    NUM_RCQ_BD);
07382 
07383         /* SGE ring */
07384         BNX2X_FREE(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_page_ring));
07385         BNX2X_PCI_FREE(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_sge_ring),
07386                    bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_sge_mapping),
07387                    BCM_PAGE_SIZE * NUM_RX_SGE_PAGES);
07388     }
07389     /* Tx */
07390     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
07391 
07392         /* fastpath tx rings: tx_buf tx_desc */
07393         BNX2X_FREE(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, tx_buf_ring));
07394         BNX2X_PCI_FREE(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, tx_desc_ring),
07395                    bnx2x_fp(bp, i, tx_desc_mapping),
07396                    sizeof(union eth_tx_bd_types) * NUM_TX_BD);
07397     }
07398     /* end of fastpath */
07399 
07400     BNX2X_PCI_FREE(bp->def_status_blk, bp->def_status_blk_mapping,
07401                sizeof(struct host_def_status_block));
07402 
07403     BNX2X_PCI_FREE(bp->slowpath, bp->slowpath_mapping,
07404                sizeof(struct bnx2x_slowpath));
07405 
07406 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
07407     BNX2X_PCI_FREE(bp->t1, bp->t1_mapping, 64*1024);
07408     BNX2X_PCI_FREE(bp->t2, bp->t2_mapping, 16*1024);
07409     BNX2X_PCI_FREE(bp->timers, bp->timers_mapping, 8*1024);
07410     BNX2X_PCI_FREE(bp->qm, bp->qm_mapping, 128*1024);
07411     BNX2X_PCI_FREE(bp->cnic_sb, bp->cnic_sb_mapping,
07412                sizeof(struct host_status_block));
07413 #endif
07414     BNX2X_PCI_FREE(bp->spq, bp->spq_mapping, BCM_PAGE_SIZE);
07415 
07416 #undef BNX2X_PCI_FREE
07417 #undef BNX2X_KFREE
07418 }
07419 
07420 static int bnx2x_alloc_mem(struct bnx2x *bp)
07421 {
07422 
07423 #define BNX2X_PCI_ALLOC(x, y, size) \
07424     do { \
07425         x = pci_alloc_consistent(bp->pdev, size, y); \
07426         if (x == NULL) \
07427             goto alloc_mem_err; \
07428         memset(x, 0, size); \
07429     } while (0)
07430 
07431 #define BNX2X_ALLOC(x, size) \
07432     do { \
07433         x = vmalloc(size); \
07434         if (x == NULL) \
07435             goto alloc_mem_err; \
07436         memset(x, 0, size); \
07437     } while (0)
07438 
07439     int i;
07440 
07441     /* fastpath */
07442     /* Common */
07443     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
07444         bnx2x_fp(bp, i, bp) = bp;
07445 
07446         /* status blocks */
07447         BNX2X_PCI_ALLOC(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, status_blk),
07448                 &bnx2x_fp(bp, i, status_blk_mapping),
07449                 sizeof(struct host_status_block));
07450     }
07451     /* Rx */
07452     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
07453 
07454         /* fastpath rx rings: rx_buf rx_desc rx_comp */
07455         BNX2X_ALLOC(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_buf_ring),
07456                 sizeof(struct sw_rx_bd) * NUM_RX_BD);
07457         BNX2X_PCI_ALLOC(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_desc_ring),
07458                 &bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_desc_mapping),
07459                 sizeof(struct eth_rx_bd) * NUM_RX_BD);
07460 
07461         BNX2X_PCI_ALLOC(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_comp_ring),
07462                 &bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_comp_mapping),
07463                 sizeof(struct eth_fast_path_rx_cqe) *
07464                 NUM_RCQ_BD);
07465 
07466         /* SGE ring */
07467         BNX2X_ALLOC(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_page_ring),
07468                 sizeof(struct sw_rx_page) * NUM_RX_SGE);
07469         BNX2X_PCI_ALLOC(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_sge_ring),
07470                 &bnx2x_fp(bp, i, rx_sge_mapping),
07471                 BCM_PAGE_SIZE * NUM_RX_SGE_PAGES);
07472     }
07473     /* Tx */
07474     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
07475 
07476         /* fastpath tx rings: tx_buf tx_desc */
07477         BNX2X_ALLOC(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, tx_buf_ring),
07478                 sizeof(struct sw_tx_bd) * NUM_TX_BD);
07479         BNX2X_PCI_ALLOC(bnx2x_fp(bp, i, tx_desc_ring),
07480                 &bnx2x_fp(bp, i, tx_desc_mapping),
07481                 sizeof(union eth_tx_bd_types) * NUM_TX_BD);
07482     }
07483     /* end of fastpath */
07484 
07485     BNX2X_PCI_ALLOC(bp->def_status_blk, &bp->def_status_blk_mapping,
07486             sizeof(struct host_def_status_block));
07487 
07488     BNX2X_PCI_ALLOC(bp->slowpath, &bp->slowpath_mapping,
07489             sizeof(struct bnx2x_slowpath));
07490 
07491 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
07492     BNX2X_PCI_ALLOC(bp->t1, &bp->t1_mapping, 64*1024);
07493 
07494     /* allocate searcher T2 table
07495        we allocate 1/4 of alloc num for T2
07496       (which is not entered into the ILT) */
07497     BNX2X_PCI_ALLOC(bp->t2, &bp->t2_mapping, 16*1024);
07498 
07499     /* Initialize T2 (for 1024 connections) */
07500     for (i = 0; i < 16*1024; i += 64)
07501         *(u64 *)((char *)bp->t2 + i + 56) = bp->t2_mapping + i + 64;
07502 
07503     /* Timer block array (8*MAX_CONN) phys uncached for now 1024 conns */
07504     BNX2X_PCI_ALLOC(bp->timers, &bp->timers_mapping, 8*1024);
07505 
07506     /* QM queues (128*MAX_CONN) */
07507     BNX2X_PCI_ALLOC(bp->qm, &bp->qm_mapping, 128*1024);
07508 
07509     BNX2X_PCI_ALLOC(bp->cnic_sb, &bp->cnic_sb_mapping,
07510             sizeof(struct host_status_block));
07511 #endif
07512 
07513     /* Slow path ring */
07514     BNX2X_PCI_ALLOC(bp->spq, &bp->spq_mapping, BCM_PAGE_SIZE);
07515 
07516     return 0;
07517 
07518 alloc_mem_err:
07519     bnx2x_free_mem(bp);
07520     return -ENOMEM;
07521 
07522 #undef BNX2X_PCI_ALLOC
07523 #undef BNX2X_ALLOC
07524 }
07525 
07526 static void bnx2x_free_tx_skbs(struct bnx2x *bp)
07527 {
07528     int i;
07529 
07530     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
07531         struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[i];
07532 
07533         u16 bd_cons = fp->tx_bd_cons;
07534         u16 sw_prod = fp->tx_pkt_prod;
07535         u16 sw_cons = fp->tx_pkt_cons;
07536 
07537         while (sw_cons != sw_prod) {
07538             bd_cons = bnx2x_free_tx_pkt(bp, fp, TX_BD(sw_cons));
07539             sw_cons++;
07540         }
07541     }
07542 }
07543 
07544 static void bnx2x_free_rx_skbs(struct bnx2x *bp)
07545 {
07546     int i, j;
07547 
07548     for_each_queue(bp, j) {
07549         struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[j];
07550 
07551         for (i = 0; i < NUM_RX_BD; i++) {
07552             struct sw_rx_bd *rx_buf = &fp->rx_buf_ring[i];
07553             struct sk_buff *skb = rx_buf->skb;
07554 
07555             if (skb == NULL)
07556                 continue;
07557 
07558             pci_unmap_single(bp->pdev,
07559                      pci_unmap_addr(rx_buf, mapping),
07560                      bp->rx_buf_size, PCI_DMA_FROMDEVICE);
07561 
07562             rx_buf->skb = NULL;
07563             dev_kfree_skb(skb);
07564         }
07565         if (!fp->disable_tpa)
07566             bnx2x_free_tpa_pool(bp, fp, CHIP_IS_E1(bp) ?
07567                         ETH_MAX_AGGREGATION_QUEUES_E1 :
07568                         ETH_MAX_AGGREGATION_QUEUES_E1H);
07569     }
07570 }
07571 
07572 static void bnx2x_free_skbs(struct bnx2x *bp)
07573 {
07574     bnx2x_free_tx_skbs(bp);
07575     bnx2x_free_rx_skbs(bp);
07576 }
07577 
07578 #ifdef CONFIG_PCI_MSI /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
07579 static void bnx2x_free_msix_irqs(struct bnx2x *bp)
07580 {
07581     int i, offset = 1;
07582 
07583     free_irq(bp->msix_table[0].vector, bp->dev);
07584     DP(NETIF_MSG_IFDOWN, "released sp irq (%d)\n",
07585        bp->msix_table[0].vector);
07586 
07587 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
07588     offset++;
07589 #endif
07590     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
07591         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFDOWN, "about to release fp #%d->%d irq  "
07592            "state %x\n", i, bp->msix_table[i + offset].vector,
07593            bnx2x_fp(bp, i, state));
07594 
07595         free_irq(bp->msix_table[i + offset].vector, &bp->fp[i]);
07596     }
07597 }
07598 #endif
07599 
07600 static void bnx2x_free_irq(struct bnx2x *bp)
07601 {
07602 #ifdef CONFIG_PCI_MSI /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
07603     if (bp->flags & USING_MSIX_FLAG) {
07604         bnx2x_free_msix_irqs(bp);
07605         pci_disable_msix(bp->pdev);
07606         bp->flags &= ~USING_MSIX_FLAG;
07607 
07608     } else if (bp->flags & USING_MSI_FLAG) {
07609         free_irq(bp->pdev->irq, bp->dev);
07610         pci_disable_msi(bp->pdev);
07611         bp->flags &= ~USING_MSI_FLAG;
07612 
07613     } else
07614 #endif
07615         free_irq(bp->pdev->irq, bp->dev);
07616 }
07617 
07618 static int bnx2x_enable_msix(struct bnx2x *bp)
07619 {
07620 #ifdef CONFIG_PCI_MSI /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
07621     int i, rc, offset = 1;
07622     int igu_vec = 0;
07623 
07624     bp->msix_table[0].entry = igu_vec;
07625     DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "msix_table[0].entry = %d (slowpath)\n", igu_vec);
07626 
07627 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
07628     igu_vec = BP_L_ID(bp) + offset;
07629     bp->msix_table[1].entry = igu_vec;
07630     DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "msix_table[1].entry = %d (CNIC)\n", igu_vec);
07631     offset++;
07632 #endif
07633     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
07634         igu_vec = BP_L_ID(bp) + offset + i;
07635         bp->msix_table[i + offset].entry = igu_vec;
07636         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "msix_table[%d].entry = %d "
07637            "(fastpath #%u)\n", i + offset, igu_vec, i);
07638     }
07639 
07640     rc = pci_enable_msix(bp->pdev, &bp->msix_table[0],
07641                  BNX2X_NUM_QUEUES(bp) + offset);
07642 
07643     /* 
07644      * reconfigure number of tx/rx queues according to available
07645      * MSI-X vectors
07646      */
07647     if (rc >= BNX2X_MIN_MSIX_VEC_CNT) {
07648         /* vectors available for FP */
07649         int fp_vec = rc - BNX2X_MSIX_VEC_FP_START;
07650 
07651         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP,
07652            "Trying to use less MSI-X vectors: %d\n", rc);
07653 
07654         rc = pci_enable_msix(bp->pdev, &bp->msix_table[0], rc);
07655 
07656         if (rc) {
07657             DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP,
07658                "MSI-X is not attainable  rc %d\n", rc);
07659             return rc;
07660         }
07661 
07662         bp->num_queues = min(bp->num_queues, fp_vec);
07663 
07664         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "New queue configuration set: %d\n",
07665                   bp->num_queues);
07666     } else if (rc) {
07667         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "MSI-X is not attainable  rc %d\n", rc);
07668         return rc;
07669     }
07670 
07671     bp->flags |= USING_MSIX_FLAG;
07672 
07673     return 0;
07674 #else
07675     return -1;
07676 #endif
07677 }
07678 
07679 #ifdef CONFIG_PCI_MSI /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
07680 static int bnx2x_req_msix_irqs(struct bnx2x *bp)
07681 {
07682     int i, rc, offset = 1;
07683 
07684     rc = request_irq(bp->msix_table[0].vector, bnx2x_msix_sp_int, 0,
07685              bp->dev->name, bp->dev);
07686     if (rc) {
07687         BNX2X_ERR("request sp irq failed\n");
07688         return -EBUSY;
07689     }
07690 
07691 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
07692     offset++;
07693 #endif
07694     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
07695         struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[i];
07696         snprintf(fp->name, sizeof(fp->name), "%s-fp-%d",
07697              bp->dev->name, i);
07698 
07699         rc = request_irq(bp->msix_table[i + offset].vector,
07700                  bnx2x_msix_fp_int, 0, fp->name, fp);
07701         if (rc) {
07702             BNX2X_ERR("request fp #%d irq failed  rc %d\n", i, rc);
07703             bnx2x_free_msix_irqs(bp);
07704             return -EBUSY;
07705         }
07706 
07707         fp->state = BNX2X_FP_STATE_IRQ;
07708     }
07709 
07710     i = BNX2X_NUM_QUEUES(bp);
07711     printk(KERN_INFO PFX "%s: using MSI-X  IRQs: sp %d  fp[%d] %d"
07712            " ... fp[%d] %d\n",
07713            bp->dev->name, bp->msix_table[0].vector,
07714            0, bp->msix_table[offset].vector,
07715            i - 1, bp->msix_table[offset + i - 1].vector);
07716 
07717     return 0;
07718 }
07719 
07720 static int bnx2x_enable_msi(struct bnx2x *bp)
07721 {
07722     int rc;
07723 
07724     rc = pci_enable_msi(bp->pdev);
07725     if (rc) {
07726         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "MSI is not attainable\n");
07727         return -1;
07728     }
07729     bp->flags |= USING_MSI_FLAG;
07730 
07731     return 0;
07732 }
07733 #endif
07734 
07735 static int bnx2x_req_irq(struct bnx2x *bp)
07736 {
07737     unsigned long flags;
07738     int rc;
07739 
07740     if (bp->flags & USING_MSI_FLAG)
07741         flags = 0;
07742     else
07743         flags = IRQF_SHARED;
07744 
07745     rc = request_irq(bp->pdev->irq, bnx2x_interrupt, flags,
07746              bp->dev->name, bp->dev);
07747     if (!rc)
07748         bnx2x_fp(bp, 0, state) = BNX2X_FP_STATE_IRQ;
07749 
07750     return rc;
07751 }
07752 
07753 static void bnx2x_napi_enable(struct bnx2x *bp)
07754 {
07755     int i;
07756 
07757     for_each_queue(bp, i)
07758 #ifdef BNX2X_NEW_NAPI /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
07759         napi_enable(&bnx2x_fp(bp, i, napi));
07760 #else
07761         netif_poll_enable(&bnx2x_fp(bp, i, dummy_netdev));
07762 #endif
07763 }
07764 
07765 static void bnx2x_napi_disable(struct bnx2x *bp)
07766 {
07767     int i;
07768 
07769     for_each_queue(bp, i)
07770 #ifdef BNX2X_NEW_NAPI /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
07771         napi_disable(&bnx2x_fp(bp, i, napi));
07772 #else
07773         netif_poll_disable(&bnx2x_fp(bp, i, dummy_netdev));
07774 #endif
07775 }
07776 
07777 static void bnx2x_netif_start(struct bnx2x *bp)
07778 {
07779     int intr_sem;
07780 
07781     intr_sem = atomic_dec_and_test(&bp->intr_sem);
07782     smp_wmb(); /* Ensure that bp->intr_sem update is SMP-safe */
07783 
07784     if (intr_sem) {
07785         if (netif_running(bp->dev)) {
07786             bnx2x_napi_enable(bp);
07787             bnx2x_int_enable(bp);
07788             if (bp->state == BNX2X_STATE_OPEN)
07789                 netif_tx_wake_all_queues(bp->dev);
07790         }
07791     }
07792 }
07793 
07794 static void bnx2x_netif_stop(struct bnx2x *bp, int disable_hw)
07795 {
07796     bnx2x_int_disable_sync(bp, disable_hw);
07797 #if defined(BNX2X_NEW_NAPI) || defined(USE_NAPI_GRO) /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
07798     bnx2x_napi_disable(bp);
07799 #else
07800     if (netif_running(bp->dev))
07801         bnx2x_napi_disable(bp);
07802 #endif
07803     netif_tx_disable(bp->dev);
07804 #if (LINUX_VERSION_CODE < 0x02061f) /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
07805     /* In kernels starting from 2.6.31 netdev layer does this */
07806     bp->dev->trans_start = jiffies; /* prevent tx timeout */
07807 #endif
07808 }
07809 
07810 /*
07811  * Init service functions
07812  */
07813 
07824 static void bnx2x_set_mac_addr_e1_gen(struct bnx2x *bp, int set, u8 *mac,
07825                       u32 cl_bit_vec, u8 cam_offset,
07826                       u8 with_bcast)
07827 {
07828     struct mac_configuration_cmd *config = bnx2x_sp(bp, mac_config);
07829     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
07830 
07831     /* CAM allocation
07832      * unicasts 0-31:port0 32-63:port1
07833      * multicast 64-127:port0 128-191:port1
07834      */
07835     config->hdr.length = 1 + (with_bcast ? 1 : 0);
07836     config->hdr.offset = cam_offset;
07837     config->hdr.client_id = 0xff;
07838     config->hdr.reserved1 = 0;
07839 
07840     /* primary MAC */
07841     config->config_table[0].cam_entry.msb_mac_addr =
07842                     swab16(*(u16 *)&mac[0]);
07843     config->config_table[0].cam_entry.middle_mac_addr =
07844                     swab16(*(u16 *)&mac[2]);
07845     config->config_table[0].cam_entry.lsb_mac_addr =
07846                     swab16(*(u16 *)&mac[4]);
07847     config->config_table[0].cam_entry.flags = cpu_to_le16(port);
07848     if (set)
07849         config->config_table[0].target_table_entry.flags = 0;
07850     else
07851         CAM_INVALIDATE(config->config_table[0]);
07852     config->config_table[0].target_table_entry.clients_bit_vector =
07853                         cpu_to_le32(cl_bit_vec);
07854     config->config_table[0].target_table_entry.vlan_id = 0;
07855 
07856     DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "%s MAC (%04x:%04x:%04x)\n",
07857        (set ? "setting" : "clearing"),
07858        config->config_table[0].cam_entry.msb_mac_addr,
07859        config->config_table[0].cam_entry.middle_mac_addr,
07860        config->config_table[0].cam_entry.lsb_mac_addr);
07861 
07862     /* broadcast */
07863     if (with_bcast) {
07864         config->config_table[1].cam_entry.msb_mac_addr =
07865             cpu_to_le16(0xffff);
07866         config->config_table[1].cam_entry.middle_mac_addr =
07867             cpu_to_le16(0xffff);
07868         config->config_table[1].cam_entry.lsb_mac_addr =
07869             cpu_to_le16(0xffff);
07870         config->config_table[1].cam_entry.flags = cpu_to_le16(port);
07871         if (set)
07872             config->config_table[1].target_table_entry.flags =
07873                     TSTORM_CAM_TARGET_TABLE_ENTRY_BROADCAST;
07874         else
07875             CAM_INVALIDATE(config->config_table[1]);
07876         config->config_table[1].target_table_entry.clients_bit_vector =
07877                             cpu_to_le32(cl_bit_vec);
07878         config->config_table[1].target_table_entry.vlan_id = 0;
07879     }
07880 
07881     bnx2x_sp_post(bp, RAMROD_CMD_ID_ETH_SET_MAC, 0,
07882               U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mac_config)),
07883               U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mac_config)), 0);
07884 }
07885 
07895 static void bnx2x_set_mac_addr_e1h_gen(struct bnx2x *bp, int set, u8 *mac,
07896                        u32 cl_bit_vec, u8 cam_offset)
07897 {
07898     struct mac_configuration_cmd_e1h *config =
07899         (struct mac_configuration_cmd_e1h *)bnx2x_sp(bp, mac_config);
07900 
07901     config->hdr.length = 1;
07902     config->hdr.offset = cam_offset;
07903     config->hdr.client_id = 0xff;
07904     config->hdr.reserved1 = 0;
07905 
07906     /* primary MAC */
07907     config->config_table[0].msb_mac_addr =
07908                     swab16(*(u16 *)&mac[0]);
07909     config->config_table[0].middle_mac_addr =
07910                     swab16(*(u16 *)&mac[2]);
07911     config->config_table[0].lsb_mac_addr =
07912                     swab16(*(u16 *)&mac[4]);
07913     config->config_table[0].clients_bit_vector =
07914                     cpu_to_le32(cl_bit_vec);
07915     config->config_table[0].vlan_id = 0;
07916     config->config_table[0].e1hov_id = cpu_to_le16(bp->e1hov);
07917     if (set)
07918         config->config_table[0].flags = BP_PORT(bp);
07919     else
07920         config->config_table[0].flags =
07921                 MAC_CONFIGURATION_ENTRY_E1H_ACTION_TYPE;
07922 
07923     DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "%s MAC (%04x:%04x:%04x)  E1HOV %d  CLID mask %d\n",
07924        (set ? "setting" : "clearing"),
07925        config->config_table[0].msb_mac_addr,
07926        config->config_table[0].middle_mac_addr,
07927        config->config_table[0].lsb_mac_addr, bp->e1hov, cl_bit_vec);
07928 
07929     bnx2x_sp_post(bp, RAMROD_CMD_ID_ETH_SET_MAC, 0,
07930               U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mac_config)),
07931               U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mac_config)), 0);
07932 }
07933 
07934 static int bnx2x_wait_ramrod(struct bnx2x *bp, int state, int idx,
07935                  int *state_p, int poll)
07936 {
07937     /* can take a while if any port is running */
07938     int cnt = 5000;
07939 
07940     DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "%s for state to become %x on IDX [%d]\n",
07941        poll ? "polling" : "waiting", state, idx);
07942 
07943     might_sleep();
07944     while (cnt--) {
07945         if (poll) {
07946             bnx2x_rx_int(bp->fp, 10);
07947             /* if index is different from 0
07948              * the reply for some commands will
07949              * be on the non default queue
07950              */
07951             if (idx)
07952                 bnx2x_rx_int(&bp->fp[idx], 10);
07953         }
07954 
07955         mb(); /* state is changed by bnx2x_sp_event() */
07956         if (*state_p == state) {
07957 #ifdef BNX2X_STOP_ON_ERROR
07958             DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "exit  (cnt %d)\n", 5000 - cnt);
07959 #endif
07960             return 0;
07961         }
07962 
07963         msleep(1);
07964 
07965         if (bp->panic)
07966             return -EIO;
07967     }
07968 
07969     /* timeout! */
07970     BNX2X_ERR("timeout %s for state %x on IDX [%d]\n",
07971           poll ? "polling" : "waiting", state, idx);
07972 #ifdef BNX2X_STOP_ON_ERROR
07973     bnx2x_panic();
07974 #endif
07975 
07976     return -EBUSY;
07977 }
07978 
07979 static void bnx2x_set_eth_mac_addr_e1h(struct bnx2x *bp, int set)
07980 {
07981     bp->set_mac_pending++;
07982     smp_wmb();
07983 
07984     bnx2x_set_mac_addr_e1h_gen(bp, set, bp->dev->dev_addr,
07985                    (1 << bp->fp->cl_id), BP_FUNC(bp));
07986 
07987     /* Wait for a completion */
07988     bnx2x_wait_ramrod(bp, 0, 0, &bp->set_mac_pending, set ? 0 : 1);
07989 }
07990 
07991 static void bnx2x_set_eth_mac_addr_e1(struct bnx2x *bp, int set)
07992 {
07993     bp->set_mac_pending++;
07994     smp_wmb();
07995 
07996     bnx2x_set_mac_addr_e1_gen(bp, set, bp->dev->dev_addr,
07997                   (1 << bp->fp->cl_id), (BP_PORT(bp) ? 32 : 0),
07998                   1);
07999 
08000     /* Wait for a completion */
08001     bnx2x_wait_ramrod(bp, 0, 0, &bp->set_mac_pending, set ? 0 : 1);
08002 }
08003 
08004 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
08005 
08015 int bnx2x_set_iscsi_eth_mac_addr(struct bnx2x *bp, int set)
08016 {
08017     u32 cl_bit_vec = (1 << BCM_ISCSI_ETH_CL_ID);
08018 
08019     bp->set_mac_pending++;
08020     smp_wmb();
08021 
08022     /* Send a SET_MAC ramrod */
08023     if (CHIP_IS_E1(bp))
08024         bnx2x_set_mac_addr_e1_gen(bp, set, bp->iscsi_mac,
08025                   cl_bit_vec, (BP_PORT(bp) ? 32 : 0) + 2,
08026                   1);
08027     else
08028         /* CAM allocation for E1H
08029         * unicasts: by func number
08030         * multicast: 20+FUNC*20, 20 each
08031         */
08032         bnx2x_set_mac_addr_e1h_gen(bp, set, bp->iscsi_mac,
08033                    cl_bit_vec, E1H_FUNC_MAX + BP_FUNC(bp));
08034 
08035     /* Wait for a completion when setting */
08036     bnx2x_wait_ramrod(bp, 0, 0, &bp->set_mac_pending, set ? 0 : 1);
08037 
08038     return 0;
08039 }
08040 
08041 EXPORT_SYMBOL(bnx2x_set_iscsi_eth_mac_addr);
08042 #endif
08043 
08044 static int bnx2x_setup_leading(struct bnx2x *bp)
08045 {
08046     int rc;
08047 
08048     /* reset IGU state */
08049     bnx2x_ack_sb(bp, bp->fp[0].sb_id, CSTORM_ID, 0, IGU_INT_ENABLE, 0);
08050 
08051     /* SETUP ramrod */
08052     bnx2x_sp_post(bp, RAMROD_CMD_ID_ETH_PORT_SETUP, 0, 0, 0, 0);
08053 
08054     /* Wait for completion */
08055     rc = bnx2x_wait_ramrod(bp, BNX2X_STATE_OPEN, 0, &(bp->state), 0);
08056 
08057     return rc;
08058 }
08059 
08060 static int bnx2x_setup_multi(struct bnx2x *bp, int index)
08061 {
08062     struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[index];
08063 
08064     /* reset IGU state */
08065     bnx2x_ack_sb(bp, fp->sb_id, CSTORM_ID, 0, IGU_INT_ENABLE, 0);
08066 
08067     /* SETUP ramrod */
08068     fp->state = BNX2X_FP_STATE_OPENING;
08069     bnx2x_sp_post(bp, RAMROD_CMD_ID_ETH_CLIENT_SETUP, index, 0,
08070               fp->cl_id, 0);
08071 
08072     /* Wait for completion */
08073     return bnx2x_wait_ramrod(bp, BNX2X_FP_STATE_OPEN, index,
08074                  &(fp->state), 0);
08075 }
08076 
08077 #if defined(BNX2X_NEW_NAPI) || defined(USE_NAPI_GRO) /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
08078 static int bnx2x_poll(struct napi_struct *napi, int budget);
08079 #else
08080 static int bnx2x_poll(struct net_device *dev, int *budget);
08081 #endif
08082 
08083 static void bnx2x_set_num_queues_msix(struct bnx2x *bp)
08084 {
08085 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
08086     int i;
08087 #endif
08088 
08089     switch (bp->multi_mode) {
08090     case ETH_RSS_MODE_DISABLED:
08091         bp->num_queues = 1;
08092         break;
08093 
08094     case ETH_RSS_MODE_REGULAR:
08095         if (num_queues)
08096             bp->num_queues = min_t(u32, num_queues,
08097                           BNX2X_MAX_QUEUES(bp));
08098         else
08099             bp->num_queues = min_t(u32, num_online_cpus(),
08100                           BNX2X_MAX_QUEUES(bp));
08101         break;
08102 
08103 #ifdef BNX2X_SAFC /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
08104     case ETH_RSS_MODE_VLAN_PRI:
08105     case ETH_RSS_MODE_E1HOV_PRI:
08106     case ETH_RSS_MODE_IP_DSCP:
08107         bp->num_queues = 0;
08108         for (i = 0; i < BNX2X_MAX_COS; i++)
08109             bp->num_queues += bp->qs_per_cos[i];
08110         break;
08111 #endif
08112 
08113     default:
08114         bp->num_queues = 1;
08115         break;
08116     }
08117 }
08118 
08119 static int bnx2x_set_num_queues(struct bnx2x *bp)
08120 {
08121     int rc = 0;
08122 
08123     switch (int_mode) {
08124     case INT_MODE_INTx:
08125     case INT_MODE_MSI:
08126         bp->num_queues = 1;
08127         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "set number of queues to 1\n");
08128         break;
08129     default:
08130         /* Set number of queues according to bp->multi_mode value */
08131         bnx2x_set_num_queues_msix(bp);
08132 
08133         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "set number of queues to %d\n",
08134            bp->num_queues);
08135 
08136         /* if we can't use MSI-X we only need one fp,
08137          * so try to enable MSI-X with the requested number of fp's
08138          * and fallback to MSI or legacy INTx with one fp
08139          */
08140         rc = bnx2x_enable_msix(bp);
08141         if (rc)
08142             /* failed to enable MSI-X */
08143             bp->num_queues = 1;
08144         break;
08145     }
08146 #ifdef BNX2X_MULTI_QUEUE /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
08147     bp->dev->real_num_tx_queues = bp->num_queues;
08148 #endif
08149     return rc;
08150 }
08151 
08152 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
08153 static int bnx2x_cnic_notify(struct bnx2x *bp, int cmd);
08154 static void bnx2x_setup_cnic_irq_info(struct bnx2x *bp);
08155 #endif
08156 
08157 /* must be called with rtnl_lock */
08158 static int bnx2x_nic_load(struct bnx2x *bp, int load_mode)
08159 {
08160     u32 load_code;
08161     int i, rc;
08162 
08163 #ifdef BNX2X_STOP_ON_ERROR
08164     if (unlikely(bp->panic))
08165         return -EPERM;
08166 #endif
08167 
08168     bp->state = BNX2X_STATE_OPENING_WAIT4_LOAD;
08169 
08170     rc = bnx2x_set_num_queues(bp);
08171 
08172     if (bnx2x_alloc_mem(bp))
08173         return -ENOMEM;
08174 
08175     for_each_queue(bp, i)
08176         bnx2x_fp(bp, i, disable_tpa) =
08177                     ((bp->flags & TPA_ENABLE_FLAG) == 0);
08178 
08179 #ifdef BNX2X_NEW_NAPI /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
08180     for_each_queue(bp, i)
08181 #ifdef __VMKLNX__
08182         if (!bnx2x_fp(bp, i, napi).worldlet)
08183 #endif /* __VMKLNX__ */
08184         netif_napi_add(bp->dev, &bnx2x_fp(bp, i, napi),
08185                    bnx2x_poll, 128);
08186 #else /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
08187     /* initialize net_device for each rx queue */
08188     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
08189         struct net_device *dummy_netdev = &bnx2x_fp(bp, i, dummy_netdev);
08190         dummy_netdev->priv = &bp->fp[i];
08191 #if defined(USE_NAPI_GRO)
08192         netif_napi_add(dummy_netdev, &bnx2x_fp(bp, i, napi),
08193                    bnx2x_poll, 128);
08194 #else
08195         dummy_netdev->poll = bnx2x_poll;
08196         dummy_netdev->weight = 128;
08197         set_bit(__LINK_STATE_START, &dummy_netdev->state);
08198 #endif
08199     }
08200 
08201 #endif
08202 
08203     bnx2x_napi_enable(bp);
08204 
08205 #ifdef CONFIG_PCI_MSI /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
08206     if (bp->flags & USING_MSIX_FLAG) {
08207         rc = bnx2x_req_msix_irqs(bp);
08208         if (rc) {
08209             pci_disable_msix(bp->pdev);
08210             goto load_error1;
08211         }
08212     } else {
08213         /* Fall to INTx if failed to enable MSI-X due to lack of
08214            memory (in bnx2x_set_num_queues()) */
08215         if ((rc != -ENOMEM) && (int_mode != INT_MODE_INTx))
08216             bnx2x_enable_msi(bp);
08217 #else
08218     {
08219 #endif
08220         bnx2x_ack_int(bp);
08221         rc = bnx2x_req_irq(bp);
08222         if (rc) {
08223             BNX2X_ERR("IRQ request failed  rc %d, aborting\n", rc);
08224 #ifdef CONFIG_PCI_MSI /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
08225             if (bp->flags & USING_MSI_FLAG)
08226                 pci_disable_msi(bp->pdev);
08227 #endif
08228             goto load_error1;
08229         }
08230         if (bp->flags & USING_MSI_FLAG) {
08231             bp->dev->irq = bp->pdev->irq;
08232             printk(KERN_INFO PFX "%s: using MSI  IRQ %d\n",
08233                    bp->dev->name, bp->pdev->irq);
08234         }
08235     }
08236 
08237     /* Send LOAD_REQUEST command to MCP
08238        Returns the type of LOAD command:
08239        if it is the first port to be initialized
08240        common blocks should be initialized, otherwise - not
08241     */
08242     if (!BP_NOMCP(bp)) {
08243         load_code = bnx2x_fw_command(bp, DRV_MSG_CODE_LOAD_REQ);
08244         if (!load_code) {
08245             BNX2X_ERR("MCP response failure, aborting\n");
08246             rc = -EBUSY;
08247             goto load_error2;
08248         }
08249         if (load_code == FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_LOAD_REFUSED) {
08250             rc = -EBUSY; /* other port in diagnostic mode */
08251             goto load_error2;
08252         }
08253 
08254     } else {
08255         int port = BP_PORT(bp);
08256 
08257         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "NO MCP - load counts      %d, %d, %d\n",
08258            load_count[0], load_count[1], load_count[2]);
08259         load_count[0]++;
08260         load_count[1 + port]++;
08261         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "NO MCP - new load counts  %d, %d, %d\n",
08262            load_count[0], load_count[1], load_count[2]);
08263         if (load_count[0] == 1)
08264             load_code = FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_LOAD_COMMON;
08265         else if (load_count[1 + port] == 1)
08266             load_code = FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_LOAD_PORT;
08267         else
08268             load_code = FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_LOAD_FUNCTION;
08269     }
08270 
08271     if ((load_code == FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_LOAD_COMMON) ||
08272         (load_code == FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_LOAD_PORT))
08273         bp->port.pmf = 1;
08274     else
08275         bp->port.pmf = 0;
08276     DP(NETIF_MSG_LINK, "pmf %d\n", bp->port.pmf);
08277 
08278     /* Initialize HW */
08279     rc = bnx2x_init_hw(bp, load_code);
08280     if (rc) {
08281         BNX2X_ERR("HW init failed, aborting\n");
08282         bnx2x_fw_command(bp, DRV_MSG_CODE_LOAD_DONE);
08283         bnx2x_fw_command(bp, DRV_MSG_CODE_UNLOAD_REQ_WOL_MCP);
08284         bnx2x_fw_command(bp, DRV_MSG_CODE_UNLOAD_DONE);
08285         goto load_error2;
08286     }
08287 
08288     /* Setup NIC internals and enable interrupts */
08289     bnx2x_nic_init(bp, load_code);
08290 
08291     if ((load_code == FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_LOAD_COMMON) &&
08292         (bp->common.shmem2_base))
08293         SHMEM2_WR(bp, dcc_support,
08294               (SHMEM_DCC_SUPPORT_DISABLE_ENABLE_PF_TLV |
08295                SHMEM_DCC_SUPPORT_BANDWIDTH_ALLOCATION_TLV));
08296 
08297     /* Send LOAD_DONE command to MCP */
08298     if (!BP_NOMCP(bp)) {
08299         load_code = bnx2x_fw_command(bp, DRV_MSG_CODE_LOAD_DONE);
08300         if (!load_code) {
08301             BNX2X_ERR("MCP response failure, aborting\n");
08302             rc = -EBUSY;
08303             goto load_error3;
08304         }
08305     }
08306 
08307     bp->state = BNX2X_STATE_OPENING_WAIT4_PORT;
08308 
08309     rc = bnx2x_setup_leading(bp);
08310     if (rc) {
08311         BNX2X_ERR("Setup leading failed!\n");
08312 #ifndef BNX2X_STOP_ON_ERROR
08313         goto load_error3;
08314 #else
08315         bp->panic = 1;
08316         return -EBUSY;
08317 #endif
08318     }
08319 
08320     if (CHIP_IS_E1H(bp))
08321         if (bp->mf_config & FUNC_MF_CFG_FUNC_DISABLED) {
08322             DP(NETIF_MSG_IFUP, "mf_cfg function disabled\n");
08323             bp->flags |= MF_FUNC_DIS;
08324         }
08325 
08326     if (bp->state == BNX2X_STATE_OPEN) {
08327 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
08328         /* Enable Timer scan */
08329         REG_WR(bp, TM_REG_EN_LINEAR0_TIMER + BP_PORT(bp)*4, 1);
08330 #endif
08331         for_each_nondefault_queue(bp, i) {
08332             rc = bnx2x_setup_multi(bp, i);
08333             if (rc)
08334 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
08335                 goto load_error4;
08336 #else
08337                 goto load_error3;
08338 #endif
08339         }
08340 
08341         if (CHIP_IS_E1(bp))
08342             bnx2x_set_eth_mac_addr_e1(bp, 1);
08343         else
08344             bnx2x_set_eth_mac_addr_e1h(bp, 1);
08345 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
08346         /* Set iSCSI L2 MAC */
08347         mutex_lock(&bp->cnic_mutex);
08348         if (bp->cnic_eth_dev.drv_state & CNIC_DRV_STATE_REGD) {
08349             bnx2x_set_iscsi_eth_mac_addr(bp, 1);
08350             bp->cnic_flags |= BNX2X_CNIC_FLAG_MAC_SET;
08351             bnx2x_init_sb(bp, bp->cnic_sb, bp->cnic_sb_mapping,
08352                       CNIC_SB_ID(bp));
08353         }
08354         mutex_unlock(&bp->cnic_mutex);
08355 #endif
08356     }
08357 
08358     if (bp->port.pmf)
08359         bnx2x_initial_phy_init(bp, load_mode);
08360 
08361     /* Start fast path */
08362     switch (load_mode) {
08363     case LOAD_NORMAL:
08364         if (bp->state == BNX2X_STATE_OPEN) {
08365             /* Tx queue should be only reenabled */
08366             netif_tx_wake_all_queues(bp->dev);
08367         }
08368         /* Initialize the receive filter. */
08369         bnx2x_set_rx_mode(bp->dev);
08370         break;
08371 
08372     case LOAD_OPEN:
08373         netif_tx_start_all_queues(bp->dev);
08374         if (bp->state != BNX2X_STATE_OPEN)
08375             netif_tx_disable(bp->dev);
08376         /* Initialize the receive filter. */
08377         bnx2x_set_rx_mode(bp->dev);
08378         break;
08379 
08380     case LOAD_DIAG:
08381         /* Initialize the receive filter. */
08382         bnx2x_set_rx_mode(bp->dev);
08383         bp->state = BNX2X_STATE_DIAG;
08384         break;
08385 
08386     default:
08387         break;
08388     }
08389 
08390     if (!bp->port.pmf)
08391         bnx2x__link_status_update(bp);
08392 
08393     /* start the timer */
08394     mod_timer(&bp->timer, jiffies + bp->current_interval);
08395 
08396 #if defined(__VMKLNX__) && defined(__VMKNETDDI_QUEUEOPS__) /* ! BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
08397     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
08398         struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[i];
08399 
08400         fp->netq_flags &= ~(BNX2X_NETQ_RX_QUEUE_ALLOCATED |
08401                     BNX2X_NETQ_TX_QUEUE_ALLOCATED);
08402     }
08403     bp->n_rx_queues_allocated = 0;
08404     bp->n_tx_queues_allocated = 0;
08405     if (bp->netq_enabled) {
08406         /* workaround for packets duplicated issue when NetQ enabled */
08407         bp->rx_mode = BNX2X_RX_MODE_NORMAL;
08408         bnx2x_set_storm_rx_mode(bp);
08409     }
08410 #endif
08411 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
08412     bnx2x_setup_cnic_irq_info(bp);
08413     if (bp->state == BNX2X_STATE_OPEN)
08414         bnx2x_cnic_notify(bp, CNIC_CTL_START_CMD);
08415 #endif
08416 
08417     return 0;
08418 
08419 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
08420 load_error4:
08421     /* Disable Timer scan */
08422     REG_WR(bp, TM_REG_EN_LINEAR0_TIMER + BP_PORT(bp)*4, 0);
08423 #endif
08424 load_error3:
08425     bnx2x_int_disable_sync(bp, 1);
08426     if (!BP_NOMCP(bp)) {
08427         bnx2x_fw_command(bp, DRV_MSG_CODE_UNLOAD_REQ_WOL_MCP);
08428         bnx2x_fw_command(bp, DRV_MSG_CODE_UNLOAD_DONE);
08429     }
08430     bp->port.pmf = 0;
08431     /* Free SKBs, SGEs, TPA pool and driver internals */
08432     bnx2x_free_skbs(bp);
08433     for_each_queue(bp, i)
08434         bnx2x_free_rx_sge_range(bp, bp->fp + i, NUM_RX_SGE);
08435 load_error2:
08436     /* Release IRQs */
08437     bnx2x_free_irq(bp);
08438 load_error1:
08439     bnx2x_napi_disable(bp);
08440 #if (defined(BNX2X_NEW_NAPI) && (LINUX_VERSION_CODE >= 0x02061b)) || defined(USE_NAPI_GRO) /* BNX2X_UPSTREAM */
08441     for_each_queue(bp, i)
08442         netif_napi_del(&bnx2x_fp(bp, i, napi));
08443 #endif
08444     bnx2x_free_mem(bp);
08445 
08446     return rc;
08447 }
08448 
08449 static int bnx2x_stop_multi(struct bnx2x *bp, int index)
08450 {
08451     struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[index];
08452     int rc;
08453 
08454     /* halt the connection */
08455     fp->state = BNX2X_FP_STATE_HALTING;
08456     bnx2x_sp_post(bp, RAMROD_CMD_ID_ETH_HALT, index, 0, fp->cl_id, 0);
08457 
08458     /* Wait for completion */
08459     rc = bnx2x_wait_ramrod(bp, BNX2X_FP_STATE_HALTED, index,
08460                    &(fp->state), 1);
08461     if (rc) /* timeout */
08462         return rc;
08463 
08464     /* delete cfc entry */
08465     bnx2x_sp_post(bp, RAMROD_CMD_ID_ETH_CFC_DEL, index, 0, 0, 1);
08466 
08467     /* Wait for completion */
08468     rc = bnx2x_wait_ramrod(bp, BNX2X_FP_STATE_CLOSED, index,
08469                    &(fp->state), 1);
08470     return rc;
08471 }
08472 
08473 static int bnx2x_stop_leading(struct bnx2x *bp)
08474 {
08475     __le16 dsb_sp_prod_idx;
08476     /* if the other port is handling traffic,
08477        this can take a lot of time */
08478     int cnt = 500;
08479     int rc;
08480 
08481     might_sleep();
08482 
08483     /* Send HALT ramrod */
08484     bp->fp[0].state = BNX2X_FP_STATE_HALTING;
08485     bnx2x_sp_post(bp, RAMROD_CMD_ID_ETH_HALT, 0, 0, bp->fp->cl_id, 0);
08486 
08487     /* Wait for completion */
08488     rc = bnx2x_wait_ramrod(bp, BNX2X_FP_STATE_HALTED, 0,
08489                    &(bp->fp[0].state), 1);
08490     if (rc) /* timeout */
08491         return rc;
08492 
08493     dsb_sp_prod_idx = *bp->dsb_sp_prod;
08494 
08495     /* Send PORT_DELETE ramrod */
08496     bnx2x_sp_post(bp, RAMROD_CMD_ID_ETH_PORT_DEL, 0, 0, 0, 1);
08497 
08498     /* Wait for completion to arrive on default status block
08499        we are going to reset the chip anyway
08500        so there is not much to do if this times out
08501      */
08502     while (dsb_sp_prod_idx == *bp->dsb_sp_prod) {
08503         if (!cnt) {
08504             DP(NETIF_MSG_IFDOWN, "timeout waiting for port del "
08505                "dsb_sp_prod 0x%x != dsb_sp_prod_idx 0x%x\n",
08506                *bp->dsb_sp_prod, dsb_sp_prod_idx);
08507 #ifdef BNX2X_STOP_ON_ERROR
08508             bnx2x_panic();
08509 #endif
08510             rc = -EBUSY;
08511             break;
08512         }
08513         cnt--;
08514         msleep(1);
08515         rmb(); /* Refresh the dsb_sp_prod */
08516     }
08517     bp->state = BNX2X_STATE_CLOSING_WAIT4_UNLOAD;
08518     bp->fp[0].state = BNX2X_FP_STATE_CLOSED;
08519 
08520     return rc;
08521 }
08522 
08523 static void bnx2x_reset_func(struct bnx2x *bp)
08524 {
08525     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
08526     int func = BP_FUNC(bp);
08527     int base, i;
08528 
08529     /* Configure IGU */
08530     REG_WR(bp, HC_REG_LEADING_EDGE_0 + port*8, 0);
08531     REG_WR(bp, HC_REG_TRAILING_EDGE_0 + port*8, 0);
08532 
08533 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
08534     /* Disable Timer scan */
08535     REG_WR(bp, TM_REG_EN_LINEAR0_TIMER + port*4, 0);
08536     /*
08537      * Wait for at least 10ms and up to 2 second for the timers scan to
08538      * complete
08539      */
08540     for (i = 0; i < 200; i++) {
08541         msleep(10);
08542         if (!REG_RD(bp, TM_REG_LIN0_SCAN_ON + port*4))
08543             break;
08544     }
08545 #endif
08546     /* Clear ILT */
08547     base = FUNC_ILT_BASE(func);
08548     for (i = base; i < base + ILT_PER_FUNC; i++)
08549         bnx2x_ilt_wr(bp, i, 0);
08550 }
08551 
08552 static void bnx2x_reset_port(struct bnx2x *bp)
08553 {
08554     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
08555     u32 val;
08556 
08557     REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_MASK_INTERRUPT_PORT0 + port*4, 0);
08558 
08559     /* Do not rcv packets to BRB */
08560     REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_LLH0_BRB1_DRV_MASK + port*4, 0x0);
08561     /* Do not direct rcv packets that are not for MCP to the BRB */
08562     REG_WR(bp, (port ? NIG_REG_LLH1_BRB1_NOT_MCP :
08563                NIG_REG_LLH0_BRB1_NOT_MCP), 0x0);
08564 
08565     /* Configure AEU */
08566     REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_AEU_MASK_ATTN_FUNC_0 + port*4, 0);
08567 
08568     msleep(100);
08569     /* Check for BRB port occupancy */
08570     val = REG_RD(bp, BRB1_REG_PORT_NUM_OCC_BLOCKS_0 + port*4);
08571     if (val)
08572         DP(NETIF_MSG_IFDOWN,
08573            "BRB1 is not empty  %d blocks are occupied\n", val);
08574 
08575     /* TODO: Close Doorbell port? */
08576 }
08577 
08578 static void bnx2x_reset_chip(struct bnx2x *bp, u32 reset_code)
08579 {
08580     DP(BNX2X_MSG_MCP, "function %d  reset_code %x\n",
08581        BP_FUNC(bp), reset_code);
08582 
08583     switch (reset_code) {
08584     case FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_UNLOAD_COMMON:
08585         bnx2x_reset_port(bp);
08586         bnx2x_reset_func(bp);
08587         bnx2x_reset_common(bp);
08588         break;
08589 
08590     case FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_UNLOAD_PORT:
08591         bnx2x_reset_port(bp);
08592         bnx2x_reset_func(bp);
08593         break;
08594 
08595     case FW_MSG_CODE_DRV_UNLOAD_FUNCTION:
08596         bnx2x_reset_func(bp);
08597         break;
08598 
08599     default:
08600         BNX2X_ERR("Unknown reset_code (0x%x) from MCP\n", reset_code);
08601         break;
08602     }
08603 }
08604 
08605 /* must be called with rtnl_lock */
08606 static int bnx2x_nic_unload(struct bnx2x *bp, int unload_mode)
08607 {
08608     int port = BP_PORT(bp);
08609     u32 reset_code = 0;
08610     int i, cnt, rc;
08611 
08612 #ifdef BCM_CNIC
08613     bnx2x_cnic_notify(bp, CNIC_CTL_STOP_CMD);
08614 #endif
08615     bp->state = BNX2X_STATE_CLOSING_WAIT4_HALT;
08616 
08617     /* Set "drop all" */
08618     bp->rx_mode = BNX2X_RX_MODE_NONE;
08619     bnx2x_set_storm_rx_mode(bp);
08620 
08621     /* Disable HW interrupts, NAPI and Tx */
08622     bnx2x_netif_stop(bp, 1);
08623 
08624     del_timer_sync(&bp->timer);
08625     SHMEM_WR(bp, func_mb[BP_FUNC(bp)].drv_pulse_mb,
08626          (DRV_PULSE_ALWAYS_ALIVE | bp->fw_drv_pulse_wr_seq));
08627     bnx2x_stats_handle(bp, STATS_EVENT_STOP);
08628 
08629     /* Release IRQs */
08630     bnx2x_free_irq(bp);
08631 
08632     /* Wait until tx fastpath tasks complete */
08633     for_each_queue(bp, i) {
08634         struct bnx2x_fastpath *fp = &bp->fp[i];
08635 
08636         cnt = 1000;
08637         while (bnx2x_has_tx_work_unload(fp)) {
08638 
08639             bnx2x_tx_int(fp);
08640             if (!cnt) {
08641                 BNX2X_ERR("timeout waiting for queue[%d]\n",
08642                       i);
08643 #ifdef BNX2X_STOP_ON_ERROR
08644                 bnx2x_panic();
08645                 return -EBUSY;
08646 #else
08647                 break;
08648 #endif
08649             }
08650             cnt--;
08651             msleep(1);
08652         }
08653     }
08654     /* Give HW time to discard old tx messages */
08655     msleep(1);
08656 
08657     if (CHIP_IS_E1(bp)) {
08658         struct mac_configuration_cmd *config =
08659                         bnx2x_sp(bp, mcast_config);
08660 
08661         bnx2x_set_eth_mac_addr_e1(bp, 0);
08662 
08663         for (i = 0; i < config->hdr.length; i++)
08664             CAM_INVALIDATE(config->config_table[i]);
08665 
08666         config->hdr.length = i;
08667         if (CHIP_REV_IS_SLOW(bp))
08668             config->hdr.offset = BNX2X_MAX_EMUL_MULTI*(1 + port);
08669         else
08670             config->hdr.offset = BNX2X_MAX_MULTICAST*(1 + port);
08671         config->hdr.client_id = bp->fp->cl_id;
08672         config->hdr.reserved1 = 0;
08673 
08674         bp->set_mac_pending++;
08675         smp_wmb();
08676 
08677         bnx2x_sp_post(bp, RAMROD_CMD_ID_ETH_SET_MAC, 0,
08678                   U64_HI(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mcast_config)),
08679                   U64_LO(bnx2x_sp_mapping(bp, mcast_config)), 0);
08680 
08681     } else { /* E1H */
08682         REG_WR(bp, NIG_REG_LLH0_FUNC_EN + port*8, 0);
08683 
08684         bnx2x_set_eth_mac_addr_e1h(bp, 0);
08685 
08686         for (i = 0; i < MC_HASH_SIZE; i++)
08687             REG_WR(bp, MC_HASH_OFFSET(bp, i), 0);
08688 
08689         REG_WR(bp, MISC_REG_E1HMF_MODE, 0);
